71.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “Should we call upon, other than Allâh, those (fabled gods) which cannot  benefit or harm us, and turn back to spiritual darkness  after Allâh has shown us the right path? If we do so, we will be like the one whom the devils entice away, leaving him blindly bewildered in the land, and who has companions trying to bring him back to the right path, calling (him), “Come to us.”  Say: "Indeed, the Revelation knowledge given by Allâh is the only True Knowledge of Truth (i.e. Islam). And we have been commanded to submit  to the Lord of all the beings,

72.MunirMezyed2023: To establish regular Prayer and to act piously towards Him. To Him you will all be gathered together.

73.MunirMezyed2023: And it is He Who created the heavens and earth in truth. When He says: "Be,"then there it is. His word is the (ultimate) truth, and His is the (absolute) sovereignty on the day when the trumpet will be blown. He is the All-Knowing (of the world) of unseen and the visible. He is the All- Wise, the All-Aware.

74.MunirMezyed2023: And (Mention) when Abraham said to his father, Azar: “Do you take idols for gods? Indeed, I see you and your people living in spiritual darkness."

75.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We showed Abraham the supremacy of the heavens and earth so that he might be of those who believe (in Allâh) with absolute certainty.

76.MunirMezyed2023: When the night darkened upon him, he saw a star. He said: “This is my Lord.” But when it set, he said: “I do not like those that set.”

77.MunirMezyed2023: Then, when he beheld the moon appearing in all its splendour, he said: “This is my Lord.” But when it set, he said: “If it happens that my Lord will not show me the right path, I will definitely be of those who deviate from the path of truth.”

78.MunirMezyed2023: Then, when he beheld the sun shining in all its splendor, he said: "This is my lord. This is greater." But when it also set, he said: “O’ my people, surely I am free from all that which you associate with Allâh."

79.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, I have turned my face towards the One who created the heavens and the earth, as a true monotheist -(wholly devoted to Allâh). And I am not of those who believe in a plurality of gods."

80.MunirMezyed2023: His people argued with him. He said: "Do you argue with me concerning Allâh when He has shown me the right path? I stand  not in awe of any of those which you associate with Him in worship. (No harm will touch me) except when my Lord wills something. My Lord comprehends all things in His knowledge. Will you not then be admonished?

81.MunirMezyed2023: How should I be in awe of that which you associate in worship with Allâh when you are not afraid of associating in worship with Allâh things for which He has not sent down on you any authority? Which, then, of the two parties has more right to safety, if you (think that you) have sufficient knowledge?

82.MunirMezyed2023: Those who live by Faith and do not befoul their faith with falsehood, those will achieve genuine security, and they are those who have the awesome opportunity for receiving salvation.

83.MunirMezyed2023: That was Our decisive argument which We gave to Abraham against his people. We exalt in decrees of rank whomsoever We will. Indeed, your Lord is All-Wise, All-Knowing.

84.MunirMezyed2023: And We bestowed upon him Isaac and Jacob. We guided each of them (into all the truth) as We had guided Noah (into all the truth) aforetime. And of his progeny, (We guided into all the truth) David, Solomon, Job, Joseph, Moses and Aaron. This is how We reward those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

85.MunirMezyed2023: We guided (into all the truth) Zachariah , John , Jesus and Elias. Each one of them was of the righteous.

86.MunirMezyed2023: (We also guided into all the truth) Ishmael , Elisha , Jonah and Lot. Each one of them We preferred above all beings.

87.MunirMezyed2023: We preferred some of their forefathers, their descendants, and their brothers. We chose them  and guided them (by Our Spirit) to a straight path.

88.MunirMezyed2023: This is the Word of Allâh- a Light for the path of Truth- with which He inspires whoever He wills of His servants.  Had they associated others with Him in worship,  their good deeds would have been nullified.

89.MunirMezyed2023: Those were the Ones to whom We gave the Scripture, the Authority of Moral Judgments and the Gift of Prophecy. But if these (Arab Pagans) gave no credence to these favors, We would entrusted them to a people who will pay complete attention to them.

90.MunirMezyed2023: Those (Prophets) to whom Allâh gave the revelation in the knowledge of Him, follow their instruction. Say: "I ask of you no reward for (my efforts to direct you the path of truth). This Qur’ān is only a Book of Enlightenment for all the worlds of mankind and jinn."

91.MunirMezyed2023: They do not show honor and reverence for Allâh in accordance with what is required when they say: “Allâh has not revealed anything to any human being.” Say: "Who then revealed the Scripture which Moses brought as a Light and a True Source of the Enlightenment for the people? You put it into parchments, some of which you show, whereas you hide much thereof; and you have been taught (by it) that which neither you nor your fathers knew (before).” Say: "Allâh (sent it down)." Then leave them to amuse themselves with idle talk.

92.MunirMezyed2023: This Qur’ān is a Blessed Book which We have revealed confirming that which preceded It so that you may warn the mother of towns (-Mecca-) and those around it. Those who acknowledge (the existence of) the Hereafter believe  in It and strictly observe their prayers.

93.MunirMezyed2023: Who then does greater evil than one who attributes falsehood to Allâh,  or says: “It has been revealed to me,” whereas nothing has been revealed to him, and who claims: "I will produce the like of what Allâh has revealed?" If you could only see those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims when they are in the agonies of death, and the Angels stretch forth their hands (saying), "Yield up your souls! This day you will be awarded with the chastisement of degradation because of the falsehood which you used to attribute Allâh- other than the truth- and because you turned away from His Revelations (in a very repulsive manner).”

94.MunirMezyed2023: Now assuredly  you have come to Us one by one  as We created you for the first time and you have left what We bestowed upon you (in the worldly life) behind your backs. And We do not see with you your intercessors whom you presumed that they were associates of Allâh in your affairs. Indeed, the bond between you and them has now been severed, and all your claims have caused  you to go away into perdition.

95.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, it is Allâh who causes the seed-grain and the date-stones to sprout. He brings forth the living from the dead and the dead from the living. That is Allâh!  So  How can you then be deceived into going away from the established course?

96.MunirMezyed2023: He is the Cleaver of the daybreak. He made the night for rest, the sun and the moon for the reckoning of time. That is the measuring of the All-Mighty, the All-Knowing.

97.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One who made the stars for you so that you may be able to follow the right direction with their help amid the darkness of the land and sea. Verily We have distinctly explained the Revelations for a people who have (spiritual gift of) knowledge.

98.MunirMezyed2023: It is He is who has produced you from a single Human Person (Adam) and gave you a temporary resort and a permanent abode. Verily, We have distinctly explained the Revelations for a people who understand (& distinguish truth and falsehood, and they prefer truth).

99.MunirMezyed2023: It is He is who sends down water from the sky. We bring forth therewith every kind of growth, then We bring forth with that green foliage where from We bring forth thick clustered grain. From the date-palm, out of its sheaths, come forth bunches of dates hanging low and near. We produce therewith gardens of grapes, olives and pomegranates, each similar in kind yet different (in types and taste). Look at the fruit thereof when it bears fruit, and the ripening thereof. Verily, in this, there are Signs (of Allâh’s power & glory) for a people who live a life of Genuine Faith.

100.MunirMezyed2023: And yet, some people regarded the jinn as partners with Allâh, although He created them; and they falsely ascribe to Him sons and daughters without any knowledge. All Praise and Glory Be To Him, and Highly Exalted is He above that which they attribute to Him.

101.MunirMezyed2023: He is the (Brilliant) Originator of the heaven and the earth. How can He have a son when He has no consort? He has created all things; and He has perfect knowledge of everything (-past, present, and future—both of what is actual and what is possible).

102.MunirMezyed2023: Such is Allâh (Almighty), your Lord. There is no god but He, the creator of all things. So worship (& venerate) Him alone. He is the Guardian over all things.

103.MunirMezyed2023: No vision can perceive Him, but He perceives all vision. And He is the All-Subtle, the All-Aware.

104.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, enlightenment and decisive arguments have come to you from your Lord. So Whoever sees does so for his own good, and whoever chooses to be (spiritually blind) does so to his own loss. And (Say): “I am not a guardian over you.”

105.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We distinctly explain the Revelations in various ways so that the Polytheists may say: "You have learned it (from somebody else)”, and that We may make it evident to a people who have spiritual gift of knowledge.

106.MunirMezyed2023: Follow that which has been revealed to you from your Lord. There is no god but He. And turn away from the Polytheists.

107.MunirMezyed2023: Had Allâh willed, they would not have set up gods with Him. We have not appointed you a watcher over them, nor are you a guardian over them to take full responsibility for their affairs."

108.MunirMezyed2023: And do not revile those who invoke other than Allâh, lest (if you do so), they would wrongfully revile Allâh through ignorance. Thus, to every community have We made their deed appealing. Verily, they are (destined) to return to their Lord. He will inform them of whatever they used to do.

109.MunirMezyed2023: They swear by Allâh with their most solemn oaths that if it happens that a (miraculous) sign is shown to them, they will definitely come to Faith. Say: “Surely, All signs are only in the power of Allâh. (O’ you who live by Faith), what will make you know exactly that even if a sign were sent to them, they would still have no tendency to live by Faith?.

110.MunirMezyed2023: We shall confound their hearts and eyes for they believe not therein the first time. And We shall leave them blindly wandering in their transgression.

111.MunirMezyed2023: Even if We had sent down to them Angels, made the dead to speak to them and gathered together before them all things in one view, they would not have come to Faith- unless Allâh had willed it. But most of them are ignorant (of this truth).

112.MunirMezyed2023: And thus We have appointed to every Prophet an enemy ,- evil ones among men and jinn- whispering to one another with flowery words of deception. However, if your Lord had willed, they would not have done so. Thus, leave them alone with that which they  fabricate.

113.MunirMezyed2023: To such (deceit), let the hearts of those who refuse to acknowledge (the existence of) the Hereafter be inclined. Let them take pleasure in it and gain what they are gaining.

114.MunirMezyed2023: (Say): “Shall I then seek a judge, other than Allâh, to judge between us, whereas He is the One who has sent down to you the Qur’ān, well-distinguished?” Those to whom We gave the Scripture know that it is sent down from your Lord with truth. Now, therefore, do not be of those who harbour doubts.

115.MunirMezyed2023: The Word of your Lord is perfectly fulfilled in truth and in justice. There is none who has the power to alter His Word- ( there is no authority to change what has been established and authorized by Allâh). He is the All-Hearer, the All-Knowing.

116.MunirMezyed2023: If it happens that you yield to the whims of most part of those on the earth, they will deceive you into going away  from the path of (Knowing) Allâh. They only  follow assumptions and only speak lies.

117.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, your Lord knows the one who deviates from his path and those who walk on the path of truth.

118.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, eat only of that whereon the name of Allâh is commemorated if you have Faith in His Revelations:

119.MunirMezyed2023: Why should you not eat such flesh on which the name of Allâh has been commemorated (at the time of slaughtering the animal), since He has clearly declared to you what He had forbidden you, except under compulsion of necessity? Surely many deviants lead others into temptation by their whims through ignorance. Indeed, your Lord is the One Who knows those who transgress.

120.MunirMezyed2023: Shun the outward aspect of sin and its inward aspect!  Surely those who commit sin shall be requited for what they perpetrate.

121.MunirMezyed2023: And do not eat of that (flesh) on which the name of Allâh has not been mentioned (at the time of slaughtering the animal). It is certainly (a clear sign of) disobedience. Indeed, the devils entice their confidants to argue with you. If it happens that you were tempted to yield to their whims, then you will certainly be of the Polytheists."

122.MunirMezyed2023: Is he who was dead, then We gave him life and set for him light whereby he may walk among men, be as he whose similitude is sunk in the depths of darkness from whence he cannot come forth? This is how the evil deeds of the spiritually dead and blind have been made more appealing to them.

123.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We placed in every town ringleaders of its Ungodly Sinners to be involved in plots and intrigues therein. But they only plot against their own selves. And they lack the ability to perceive it.

124.MunirMezyed2023: Whenever a Sign comes to them, they say: “We shall not come to Faith til we receive the like of that which the Messengers of Allâh received." Allâh already knows where to place His Message. Humiliation from Allâh and extremely severe punishment shall smite those who willfully persist in sin for what they used to plot.

125.MunirMezyed2023: Whomsoever Allâh desires to guide (into all the truth), He expands his breast to (embrace) Islam. But whomsoever He desires to let go away form the Faith, He makes his breast tight and constricted, as though he would mount up into the sky. This is how Allâh lets abomination befall upon those who have no tendency to live by Faith.

126.MunirMezyed2023: Such is the path of your Lord- a straight path. We have distinctly explained the Revelations for those who are mindful.

127.MunirMezyed2023: They will have the abode of peace (Al-Jannah) with their Lord, and He will be their guardian because of what they used to do.

128.MunirMezyed2023: And, (mention), the day when He shall gather them all together, (and it will be said unto them): "O' assembly of jinn, You have caused many to stumble by your instruction.” And their allies among mankind will say: “O’ our Lord, we enjoyed one another, but now we have arrived at the appointed term which You have appointed for us." He will say: "The Fire is your dwelling place, wherein you will abide, except for what Allâh wills. Indeed your Lord is All-Wise, All-Knowing."

129.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We let some of those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims have power over others because of what they are accustomed to earn.

130.MunirMezyed2023: O’ assembly of jinn and mankind, did not (Our) Messengers from among your own race come to you, reciting to you My (Holy) Verses and warning you of the meeting of this day of yours? They will say, "We bear witness against our selves." It was the worldly life that deceived them. So they will bear witness against their own selves that they were spiritually dead and blind

131.MunirMezyed2023: And so it is that your Lord would not destroy villages through injustice, on their part, so long as their inhabitants were unaware (of the spiritual realities).

132.MunirMezyed2023: All will have degrees according to what they have done. Your Lord has complete knowledge of what they do.

133.MunirMezyed2023: Your Lord is the Self-sufficient One, the Lord of Mercy. If He so wills, He may put an end to your existence and thereafter cause whom He wills to succeed you in like manner as He produced you from the seed of other people.

134.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! What you are promised will definitely come to pass, and you have no power at all to frustrate it.

135.MunirMezyed2023: Say, "O’ my people, act according to your strength. Verily, I will act according to my duty. In the Hereafter, you will come to know the one whose fate will be the ultimate abode of ecstasy. And those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims can never achieve  their aims.”

136.MunirMezyed2023: And the polytheists assign to Allâh from what He created of crops and cattle a share and say: "This is for Allâh" - so they assert - “and this is for our associate-gods." However, that which is intended for their associate-gods reaches not Allâh, and that which is intended for Allâh reaches their associate-gods. Evil is that, provision of theirs, which they decree!

137.MunirMezyed2023: Thus have (their associate-gods) made the killing of their children to seem fair to many of the Polytheists in order to lead them to their ruin, and to make their faith obscure for them. Had Allâh willed, they would not have done so. Now, therefore, leave them alone with that which they fabricate.

138.MunirMezyed2023: They also say: “Such cattle and crops are  sacrosanct, forbidden. No one will eat thereof except those whom we allow”- so they assert -:  and cattle whose backs are forbidden (to be ridden on or loaded with burdens), and cattle on which the name of Allâh is not mentioned,”(when they slaughter them, mentioning instead the names of their deities). All that is a lie against Him. Consequently, He will chastise them for what they were forging.

139.MunirMezyed2023: And they say: "What is in the bellies of these cattle is reserved exclusively for our males, and forbidden to our women.” But if it is born dead, then they are both partakers thereof. He will chastise them for their (false) attribution. Indeed , He is All-Wise, All-Knowing.

140.MunirMezyed2023: Lost, indeed, are those who slay their own children foolishly without knowledge, and forbid that which Allâh has provided for them, attributing  falsehood to Allâh. Surely they have fallen away from the Faith.

141.MunirMezyed2023: And he is the One Who produces gardens, trellised and untrellised, palm-trees, corn affording various food, olives and pomegranates, alike and unlike to one another. Eat of its fruit when it bears fruit and pay the due thereof on the day of its reaping. But do not act extravagantly. Verily Allâh does not demonstrates His own love for the prodigals.

142.MunirMezyed2023: Of cattle are there some for carrying burdens and some for making carpets. Eat of that which Allâh has bestowed upon you, and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Surely he is a fierce enemy of you.

143.MunirMezyed2023: Four kinds of cattle in pairs has Allâh given you: of sheep one pair, and of goats one pair. Say: “Has Allâh forbidden the two males or the two females or that which the wombs of the two females enclose? Inform me with knowledge if you speak the truth.

144.MunirMezyed2023: Then a pair of camels and a pair of oxen. Say: "Has He forbidden the two males or the two females? Or that which the wombs of the two females enclose? Were you present when Allâh commanded you this? Then who does greater evil than one who attributes falsehood to Allâh to deceive men into  falling away ( from the Faith) without knowledge? Surely Allâh holds back the Light of His inspiration from a people who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

145.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "I  do not find in that which has been revealed to me anything forbidden to eat if one desires to eat thereof, unless it be a dead (animal), or running blood, or the flesh of swine for that certainly is filthy, or impious thing that has been hallowed to other than Allâh. But, whosoever is forced (to eat), not willfully or transgressing, (can rest assured that) your Lord is absolutely Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful."

146.MunirMezyed2023: And to those who are Jews, We forbade every beast having claws, and of bullocks and sheep We forbade them the fat of both except that which their backs carry, or their entrails, or what is intermixed with the bone. This was a punishment We impose on them because of their iniquity. And We are absolutely truthful.

147.MunirMezyed2023: If it happens that they, (the Jews), deny you, then say: “Your Lord is Possessor of all Encompassing Mercy. And His might (His chastisement when it comes) will never be driven back from those who are Ungodly Sinners.

148.MunirMezyed2023: Those who are Polytheists will say: "If Allâh had willed, we would not have been Polytheists, neither would our forefathers, nor would we have forbidden anything.” Even so those who were before them denied until they tasted Our punishment. Say: "Do you have any knowledge that you can produce it to us?" Surely you only follow false assumptions and only speak lies.

149.MunirMezyed2023: Say, “Unto Allâh belongs the decisive argument. Had it been His Will, He would have surely guided you all together (into all the truth).”

150.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Bring forward your witnesses, who can bear testimony that Allâh has forbidden this”. If it happens that they bear testimony of this, do not bear testimony with them and do not yield to the whims of those who deny Our Revelations and have no Faith in the Hereafter. Lo! They hold others as equal (in worship) with their Lord."

151.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Come, let me recite to you what Allâh has (really) forbidden to you: associate naught with Him: be kind and dutiful to your parents: do not kill your children for fear of poverty- We will provide for you and for them-: do not come near to indecencies, openly or in secret: kill none whom Allâh has forbidden except in the course of justice. This is what He has charged you with so that you may achieve a higher level of consciousness.

152.MunirMezyed2023: Do not come near to the property of the orphan except to improve it, until he attains his maturity. And give full measure and weight in justice. We do not task any Person beyond his scope. When you pronounce judgment, observe justice, even if the matter is related to a near relative, and fulfill the covenant of Allâh. This is what He has charged you with so that you may be mindful.

153.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, this is My right path. So  follow it and do not follow other ways, lest you go away  from His Path. This is what He has ordained for you so that you may act piously.

154.MunirMezyed2023: Then We gave Moses the Book- completing (Our favour) to those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith and distinguishing every thing- as a Source of Enlightenment and Mercy so that they would be convinced of the meeting with their Lord.

155.MunirMezyed2023: This is a Blessed Book (the Qur’ān) which We have sent down. So follow It and act piously so that you may be delivered from all the consequences of your iniquitous deeds.

156.MunirMezyed2023: (We have sent it down) lest you should say: “The Scripture was revealed only to two groups before us, and we had no knowledge of their teachings,

157.MunirMezyed2023: Or lest you should say: "If only the Book had been sent down to us, we would definitely have made more efforts to gain the knowledge of truth and live before the Face of Allâh than them.” Now there has come to you from your Lord a Decisive Argument (he Qur’ān) as a True Source of Source of Enlightenment and Mercy. Who then does greater evil than one who persistently refuses to acknowledge what Allâh has revealed and walks away from them? Consequently, We will chastise those who walk away from what We have revealed with an extremely severe chastisement for their aversion.

158.MunirMezyed2023: Are they waiting for nothing less than that the Angels should come to them, or that your Lord Himself should come, or that some of the (miraculous) signs of your Lord should come? On the day that one of the (miraculous) signs of your Lord comes, no Human Person will be benefited by his belief had he not believed before or earned good in his belief.  Say: “Wait! We too are waiting!”

159.MunirMezyed2023: As for those who broke the unity of their Faith and became sects, you have nothing to do with them. Their matter is only with Allâh Who will inform them of what they used to do.

160.MunirMezyed2023: Whoever brings a single righteous deed will receive tenfold of its like, but he who brings an ubiquitous deed shall be recompensed only for its like. None shall be wronged.

161.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “As for me, my Lord has directed me to a straight path- an upright religion- the creed of Abraham, who was a monotheist - having a deep, pure, focused Faith in Allâh- He was not among the Polytheists.”

162.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “Surely, my Prayer and my Sacrifice, my life and my death are (all) for Allâh- the Lord of all the beings.

163.MunirMezyed2023: No partner has He: this is what I have been commanded. And I am the first of those who wholly submit (themselves to His authority).”

164.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “Shall I seek a lord other than Allâh while He is the Lord of all things? No Human Person earns anything except to his own account, and no bearer of burdens shall bear the burden of another. Verily , you are all (destined) to return to Him, and then He will inform you of that which you used to differ."

165.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One who has made you successors in the land and exalted some of you in rank above others so that He might try you by means of what He has bestowed upon you. Most certainly your Lord is Swift in punishment.  And most surely He is Oft-Forgiving- Most Merciful.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Alif. La’am. Meem. Sa’ad.

2.MunirMezyed2023: Irrefutable Book has been sent down to you- let there be no distress in your heart concerning it- so that you may warn thereby, and doses of Enlightenment to those who live a life of Genuine Faith.

3.MunirMezyed2023: Yield to the Revelation Knowledge of truth which has been sent down to you from your Lord. And do not take others as guardians besides Him. How seldom do you keep this in mind!

4.MunirMezyed2023: So many towns We destroyed (their inhabitants for their iniquitous deeds). Our retribution came upon them (unexpectedly) by night, or while they were reposing themselves at noon-day.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Their exclamation, when Our retribution came upon them, was nothing but that they said: "Surely, we have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of our whims.”

6.MunirMezyed2023: Then verily We shall question those to whom the Message was sent, as well as  those by whom We sent it.

7.MunirMezyed2023: And We shall narrate to them their actions with knowledge, for we have never been absent.

8.MunirMezyed2023: The weighing on that day is precisely true. As for those whose scale is heavy, they are the ones who  will ultimately attain full salvation.

9.MunirMezyed2023: And as for those whose scale is light, they are the ones who are doomed to eternal perdition because they were unfair to what We have revealed of the Knowledge of truth.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We have established you on earth and provided you with a means of livelihood. Little thanks you show.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Verily it is We Who created you, then shaped you, then said to the Angels: "Prostrate yourselves before Adam!" So they did prostrate except ‘Iblīs (Satan). He was not among those who prostrated.

12.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord) said: "What prevented you from prostrating when I commanded you?" ‘Iblīs’ said: "I am better than him. You created me of fire and him of clay.”

13.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord) said: "Now, therefore, get down from here. You have no right to display an arrogant attitude here. Now, therefore, get out! You are indeed of those who are degraded."

14.MunirMezyed2023: Then ‘Iblīs said: “Reprieve me until the day of their resurrection.”

15.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord) said: “Surely you are of those who are given a respite."

16.MunirMezyed2023: (‘Iblīs) said: “For letting me fall into temptation, I'll certainly lie in wait for them in Your straight path.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Then I‘ll definitely come upon them from before and behind, from their right and left. You will find the greater part of them ungrateful.”

18.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord) said: "Now, get out of here, disgraced and expelled! Whoever of them follows you, I’ll definitely fill Gehenna with you altogether.”

19.MunirMezyed2023: Then He said: “O’ Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Al- Jannah, and eat from whence you will, but don’t come near this tree lest you both become of those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.”

20.MunirMezyed2023: But the devil whispered lies into them in order to make manifest to them that which was concealed from them of their private parts. He said: "Your Lord has forbidden you (to eat from) this tree lest you both become Angels or immortals.”

21.MunirMezyed2023: And he swore to them: “I am truly a sincere adviser to you.”

22.MunirMezyed2023: So he deceived them into falling into temptation. As soon as they tasted of the tree, their private parts became visible to them. And they both began to cover themselves with the leaves from the Garden. So the Lord God called out to them and said: “Did I not forbid you both (to eat) from that tree and did I not warn you that Satan is your sworn enemy?"

23.MunirMezyed2023: They said: "Our Lord, we have been unfair ourselves. But If it happens that You do not forgive us and bestow Your Mercy upon us, we will definitely be of those who are doomed to perdition."

24.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord) said: "Go down (all of you) as enemies of one another. And you will have on the earth an abode and a provision for a while.”

25.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "Therein you shall live, and therein you shall die, and from it you shall be brought forth.”

26.MunirMezyed2023: O’ children of Adam! We have bestowed raiment upon you to cover your nakedness. But the raiment of the Unfeigned Piety is far better. This is one of Allâh's graceful gifts so that you may take close heed.

27.MunirMezyed2023: O’ children of Adam! Do not let Satan tempt you as he deceived your parents  into being expelled from Al-Jannah, stripping them of their raiment in order to expose their nakedness. Verily, he and his tribe watch you from where you cannot see them. We have made the devils allies of those who have no tendency to live by Faith.

28.MunirMezyed2023: When they commit a gross sin, they say: "We found our fathers doing it and Allâh has commanded us to do it." Say: "Allâh most certainly does not enjoin indecency. Do you attribute to Allâh that which you do not encompass  in knowledge?"

29.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “My Lord has commanded me to maintain justice.” So set your faces to pray at every place of worship. And call upon Him (alone) with sincere devotion and purity of Faith. Just as He originated you in the beginning, you will be brought to life again.”

30.MunirMezyed2023: Some He intended to save, whereas others have deserved to go into perdition, Verily, they have taken devils as guardians instead of Allâh, thinking they are on the right path (to salvation)

31.MunirMezyed2023: O’ children of Adam! Do take your adornment whenever you go to the Mosque. Eat and drink, but avoid reckless extravagance. Indeed, Allâh does not demonstrates His own love for the prodigals.

32.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “Who has forbidden the adornment of Allâh which He has produced for his servants, and the pure, wholesome means of sustenance?” Say: "These are for the pleasure of those who live by Faith in this worldly life, but they will be exclusively theirs on the Day of Resurrection.” This is how We distinctly explain what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth  to a people who have spiritual gift of knowledge.

33.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “My Lord has only prohibited indecencies, whether committed openly or in secret, and all manner of iniquitous deed and wrongful oppression. And He has forbidden you to associate with Allâh that for which He has never authorized or attribute to Allâh that which you do not encompass in knowledge.

34.MunirMezyed2023: And every nation has an appointed term. And when its term comes, they can neither delay it for a moment, nor advance it.

35.MunirMezyed2023: O’ children of Adam! When Messengers of your own race come to recite to you My verses, those who act piously and make amends will have nothing whatsoever to fear, neither shall they grieve.

36.MunirMezyed2023: But as for those who persistently refuse to acknowledge what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth and display an arrogant attitude towards it, they will be the Denizens of the Hellfire. They will dwell therein forever.

37.MunirMezyed2023: Who then does greater evil than one who attributes falsehood to Allâh, or persistently refuse to acknowledge what He has revealed of the knowledge of truth? These will continue to receive their full portion written for them in the Preserved Tablet- until, when Our Messengers- (the Angel of death & his assistants)- come to them to take their souls; saying: "Where are those whom you used to implore and worship instead of Allah?" They will reply: "They have gone away from us. So they will bear witness against their own selves that they were spiritually dead and blind.

38.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord God) will say: “Now enter you in the company of (the impious) nations which have preceded you, of jinn and mankind, into the Fire."  Every time a nation enter, it curses its sister, until, they will all have successively entered therein. The last of them will say to the first of them: "Our Lord, these are the ones who deceived us. Now, therefore, let them have a double punishment of the Fire. He will say: "Everyone will have a double punishment but you have no knowledge of it."

39.MunirMezyed2023: Then, the first will say to the last of them: "You have no preference over us, so taste the chastisement for that which you used to earn."

40.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, those who persistently refuse to acknowledge what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth and display an arrogant attitude towards it, the gates of heaven will not be opened for them, nor will they enter into Al- Jannah, until the thick rope goes through the eye of the needle. And this how We will requite the Ungodly Sinners.

41.MunirMezyed2023: Gehenna will be their cradle, and over them will be coverings of Fire. And this how We will requite those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

42.MunirMezyed2023: But as for those who Live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts - We do not burden any human person beyond his scope - they are the Denizens of Al-Jannah. And therein they dwell forever.

43.MunirMezyed2023: We will remove all grudges from their breasts. Rivers will flow beneath them.  And they will say: “All the praise is due to Allâh, who has guided us into this (eternal abode of ecstasy). It would have been (impossible) for us to obtain guidance if Allâh had not guided us. Most surely  the Messengers of  Our Lord came to us with the Truth." It will be proclaimed to them: "This is Al- Jannah which you have been promised to inherit for what you used to do."

44.MunirMezyed2023: The Denizens of Al-Jannah will call out to the Denizens of the Hellfire, (saying): "We have indeed found that which our Lord had promised us to be true. Have you also found that which your Lord had promised you to be true?" They will reply: "Yes Indeed.” Then a crier will proclaim between them, “The curse of Allâh will be abide in those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.”

45.MunirMezyed2023: Who hinder (the people) from the way of Allâh, seek to render it crooked, and persistently refuse to acknowledge the existence of Hereafter.

46.MunirMezyed2023: And there will be a barrier (between Al- Jannah & Gehenna). And on the Heights will be men who know all by their appearance. They call out to the Denizens of Al-Jannah: "Peace Be Upon You”: They will have not yet entered Al- Jannah, but earnestly hope so.

47.MunirMezyed2023: When their eyes are turned towards the Denizens of the Hell, they will say: “O Lord, do not place us among those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.”

48.MunirMezyed2023: The men who stand upon the heights will call to certain men, whom they know by their marks, (saying): “Of what benefit to you were your extensive properties, and your arrogant attitude (toward the authority of Allâh).”

49.MunirMezyed2023: Are these whom you had sworn that Allâh would show them no Mercy ?  (O’ people of the heights): “Enter Al- Jannah, (you have been delivered from the consequence of your iniquitous deeds)- No fear shall come upon you, nor shall you  grieve.”

50.MunirMezyed2023: The Denizens of the Hell will call out to the Denizens of Al-Jannah, (saying): "Pour some water upon us, or some of the sustenance (of Al- Jannah) of which Allâh has provided for you.” They will say: "Allâh has forbidden both (water and provision) to those who are spiritually dead and blind,”

51.MunirMezyed2023: Who took their religion as an idle sport and pastime, and whom the worldly life deluded. So We are not concerned about them today as they were not concerned about the meeting of this day of theirs, For they persistently refuse to acknowledge what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth.

52.MunirMezyed2023: Verily We brought to them Irrefutable Book- (the Qur’ān) -which We have distinctly explained with knowledge - A True Source of Enlightenment and Mercy for a people who live a life of Genuine Faith.

53.MunirMezyed2023: Do they wait for aught but its final sequel? On the day when its fulfillment comes, those who neglected it before will say: "Verily, the Messengers of Our Lord came to us with (Ultimate) Truth: Shall we therefore have any intercessors, who will intercede on our behalf? Or could we be sent back to the worldly life so that we may do other works different form what we used to do?” Verily, they have lost their own selves, and that which they used to fabricate has fallen away from them.

54.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, your Lord is Allâh who created the heavens and the earth in six days. Then He ascended the Throne (of the ultimate power & glory). He causes the night to cover the day, which it pursues constantly. He also created the sun, the moon and the stars, which are absolutely subservient to his command. Indeed, His is the creation and the command. Blessed Be Allâh, the Lord of  all beings.

55.MunirMezyed2023: Then Call upon your Lord, humbly and in secret. Surely, He does not demonstrate his own love for those who keep on trespassing (against the law of Allâh).

56.MunirMezyed2023: And do not spread corruption on the earth after it has been perfectly adjusted. And invoke Him with the apprehension (of His wrath), and with hope (of salvation). Surely the Mercy of Allâh is near to those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

57.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One who sends the winds as heralds of glad tidings,  going before His Mercy (i.e. rain). Till when they bear a laden cloud, which We drive to a dead land, then We cause water to descend thereon Then We bring forth all sorts of fruits therewith. This is how We shall raise up the dead so that you may take close heed.

58.MunirMezyed2023: The vegetation of a good land comes forth abundantly by the will of its Lord, and that which is bad, brings forth nothing but little with greatest difficulty. This is how We distinctly explain what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth to a people who express their gratitude (to Allâh for His endless blessings).

59.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We previously sent Noah (as Our Messenger) to his people. He said: "Worship (& venerate) Allâh. You have no other God than Him. Indeed, I fear for you the doom of a great day!"

60.MunirMezyed2023: The chieftains of his people said: “We definitely see you living in utter deception.”

61.MunirMezyed2023: He replied: “O’ my people, I do not have a delusional disorder. I am but a Messenger from the Lord of all beings.

62.MunirMezyed2023: I (have come to) convey to you the Messages of my Lord, giving you sincere advice. And I know from Allâh what you have no knowledge of it.”

63.MunirMezyed2023: Then do you wonder that an admonition has come to you from your Lord through a man of your own race in order to warn you so that you may act piously, and that you may be delivered from all the consequences of your iniquitous deeds?”

64.MunirMezyed2023: But they belied him, so We saved him and those along with him in the ark. And We drowned those who  persistently refused to acknowledge what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth.  Most certainly they were (spiritually) blind people.

65.MunirMezyed2023: To (the people of) ‘Ād' We sent their brother Hūd. He said: "O’ my people worship (& venerate) Allâh. You have no other god beside Him. Will you not then act piously (towards Allâh)?”

66.MunirMezyed2023: The chieftains of his people, who persistently refuse to Yield to the Truth, said: “Indeed, we presume that you are guided by gross imbecility. And we definitely come to believe that you are of those who invent lies.”

67.MunirMezyed2023: He replied: “O’ my people, I am not guided by such gross imbecility. I am but a Messenger to you from the Lord of all the beings.

68.MunirMezyed2023: I was sent (by Him) to convey (& preach) to you the Messages of my Lord and I am a faithful counselor to you, (giving you good advice on how to obtain eternal salvation).

69.MunirMezyed2023: Then do you wonder that an admonition has come to you from your Lord through a man of your own race in order to warn you? Remember when He has appointed you successors to the people of Noah, and increased you in stature extensively. So recall the blessings of Allâh so that you may achieve eternal salvation.”

70.MunirMezyed2023: They said: "Have you come to us (with an idea) to worship Allâh (alone), and to renounce what our fathers worshiped? So bring us that wherewith you have threatened us if you speak the truth.”

71.MunirMezyed2023: (Hūd) replied: "Filth and exasperation have already fallen on you from your Lord. Do you dispute with me regrading names which you have named- you and forefathers, with no authority from Allâh? Then wait, I shall be with you waiting."

72.MunirMezyed2023: So We saved him and those along with him by Our Mercy. And We cut off the uttermost part of those who persistently refused to acknowledge what We have revealed of the Knowledge of truth, and who had no tendcey to live by Faith.

73.MunirMezyed2023: To (the people of) Thamūd, We sent their brother Sālih. He said: "O’ my people worship (& venerate) Allâh (alone). You have no other god beside Him. Verily, the Decisive Sign has come to you from your Lord. This she-camel of Allâh is a Sign to you, so leave her freely to graze in the land of Allâh and do not harm her, lest a painful doom would befall you.

74.MunirMezyed2023: And remember when He has appointed you successors after (the people of) ‘Ād', and given you a habitation on the earth. You build for yourselves mansions in plains, and hew out houses in the mountains. So recall (the endless) blessings of Allâh, and do not act wickedly by spreading corruption on the earth.”

75.MunirMezyed2023: The chieftains of his people, who display an arrogant attitude, said to those whom they scorned- to those who live by Faith: “Do you really know that Sālih has been sent from his Lord?” They replied: “We certainly believe in that wherewith he has been sent.”

76.MunirMezyed2023: Those who display an arrogant attitude said: “Verily, we pledge not to give credence to the belief which you embrace.”

77.MunirMezyed2023: So they cruelly hamstrung the she-camel and insolently defied the commandment of their Lord, and said: "O’ Sālih, bring us that with which you have threatened us if you are indeed one of the Messengers of Allâh.”

78.MunirMezyed2023: So the earthquake seized them, and they were rendered lifeless in their homes.

79.MunirMezyed2023: And he walked away from them and said: "I conveyed to you, my people, the Message of my Lord, and gave you sincere advice. But you had no love for those who seek to give good counsel."

80.MunirMezyed2023: And (Mention) Lot, when he said to his people: “How can you commit such disgraceful immoral acts as none in all the worlds ever ventured to commit before you?

81.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed you approach men in lust instead of women. The fact is that you are a people who commit excesses.”

82.MunirMezyed2023: But their response was naught except that they said: "Drive them out of our town. Surely they are a people who seek to keep themselves pure.”

83.MunirMezyed2023: So We saved him and his family except for his (iniquitous) wife. She was one of those who stayed behind.

84.MunirMezyed2023: We dropped large hailstones upon them from the sky. Now, therefore, look and see how dreadful was the end of the Ungodly Sinners.

85.MunirMezyed2023: And, We sent to (the people of) Midian their brother Shu‘ayb. He said: "O’ my people, worship (& venerate) Allâh Alone. You have no other god beside Him. Verily, a Decisive Sign has come to you from your Lord. So give full measure, do not underestimate (the value of) the property of the people or spread corruption on the earth after it has been perfectly adjusted. This will be far better for you if you truly live a life of Genuine Faith.

86.MunirMezyed2023: Lurk not on every road, threatening, averting from the way of Allâh those who have Faith in Him, and seeking to make it crooked. Remember when you were few, and He multiplied you.” Behold, how (dreadful) was the end of those who spread corruption.

87.MunirMezyed2023: And if there is a party among you who believes in that wherewith I have been sent, and others who do not believe, then cling to patience until Allâh judges between us. He is the perfect judge.

88.MunirMezyed2023: The chieftains of his people who display an arrogant attitude said: "We shall definitely drive you out, O’ Shuʿayb, and those who follow your Faith  from our town, unless you will return to our creed." He said: “What! Even though we loathe it!

89.MunirMezyed2023: If it happens that we return to your creed after Allâh has saved us, then we will definitely confess that we have attributed falsehood to Allâh. It is not incumbent on us to return thereto except that Allâh, our Lord, should so will. Our Lord comprehends all things in His Knowledge. We depend on Allâh with full trust. So, Our Lord, decide between our people and us with truth, for You are the best of those who make decision.”

90.MunirMezyed2023: The chieftains of his people who persistently refuse to Yield to the Truth said to their own people: “If it happens that you follow Shuʿayb, then you definitely be in the grip of perdition."

91.MunirMezyed2023: So the earthquake seized them, and they were rendered lifeless in their homes.

92.MunirMezyed2023: Those who called Shu’ayb a lair (were rendered lifeless) as if they had never lived there. Those who called Shu'aib a liar were doomed to perdition.

93.MunirMezyed2023: And he walked away from them and said: "I conveyed to you, my people, the Message of my Lord, and gave you sincere advice: How can I then grieve for those who were spiritually dead and blind?”

94.MunirMezyed2023: Never did We send a Prophet to any town but We did afflict its people with adversity and hardship so that they may humble themselves.

95.MunirMezyed2023: Then We changed their tribulation into prosperity, until they grew affluent and began to say: “Our fathers (too) had been touched by adversity and prosperity.” So We seized them quickly and unexpectedly while they were not aware of (the perils of arrogance & spiritual darkness).

96.MunirMezyed2023: If only the people of those towns had lived by Faith and acted piously, We would have definitely opened for them (contentious) blessings from the heavens and the earth, but they belied (the Messengers). So We seized them for what they used to earn.

97.MunirMezyed2023: Did the people of those towns then feel secure against the coming of Our retribution by night while they are asleep?

98.MunirMezyed2023: Or did the people of those towns then feel secure against the coming of Our retribution in the forenoon while they play?

99.MunirMezyed2023: Did they think they were secure against the plan of Allâh? No one feels secure from the plan of Allâh except those who are doomed to perish.

100.MunirMezyed2023: Has it, then, not become apparent to those who inherit the earth after its inhabitants that if We will, We can easily punish them for the iniquitous deeds and set a seal upon their hearts, so that they do not hear?

101.MunirMezyed2023: These towns - We relate to you some of their stories. the Messengers (of Allâh) came to them with Decisive Signs, but they were not inclined to believe in what they had already rejected before. This is how Allâh has set a seal on the hearts of those who are spiritually dead and blind.

102.MunirMezyed2023: We did not find in most of them any observance of covenant. Surely We found most of them indulge in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

103.MunirMezyed2023: Then, after them, We sent Moses (as Our Messenger) with Our Signs to Pharaoh and his chiefs, but they wrongfully rejected them. Behold, then, how (dreadful) was the fate of those who spread corruption (on earth).

104.MunirMezyed2023: Moses said: "O’ Pharaoh, I am indeed a Messenger from the Lord of the all the beings.

105.MunirMezyed2023: It is incumbent on me to say only the truth about Allâh. I have come to you with a Decisive Sign from your Lord. Now, therefore, let the children of Israel go with me.”

106.MunirMezyed2023: Pharaoh replied: “If you have indeed come with a (miraculous) Sign (from the Lord), then produce it, if you were of the truthful."

107.MunirMezyed2023: So he cast his staff.  Suddenly it turned to veritable serpent.

108.MunirMezyed2023: And he drew forth his hand (from his armpit after placing it therein), it was glittering white in the eyes of the beholders.

109.MunirMezyed2023: The chiefs of Pharaoh said: “Indeed! This (man) is certainly an expert magician.

110.MunirMezyed2023: He seeks to drive you out of your land (by his sorcery). So what do you suggest?"

111.MunirMezyed2023: They said: "Give him and his brother respite, and (in the meantime) send forth heralds to all cities

112.MunirMezyed2023: To bring to your presence every expert magician.”

113.MunirMezyed2023: So the magicians came to Pharaoh and said: "We shall certainly obtain a (big) reward if we become victors, shall we?"

114.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "Yes indeed. You will then be among the closest senior advisors to me."

115.MunirMezyed2023: They said: “O’ Moses, either you throw first or we will be the first to throw!"

116.MunirMezyed2023: Moses replied: “You can throw first.” When they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people, struck them with awe and produced a mighty sorcery.

117.MunirMezyed2023: And We revealed to Moses: "Cast your staff!" At once it swallowed up all what they simulated.

118.MunirMezyed2023: So the truth was established and whatever they did proved to be vain.

119.MunirMezyed2023: They were vanquished on the spot, and completely humiliated.

120.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, the magicians were impelled to fall down prostrate.

121.MunirMezyed2023: Saying: "We believe in the Lord of all the beings.

122.MunirMezyed2023: The Lord of Moses and Aaron.”

123.MunirMezyed2023: (Pharaoh) said: “You have believed in him before I gave you the permission. Surely this is an evil plan which you have planned in the city in order to drive out its inhabitants. But you will soon see the (dire) consequences (of your evil plan).

124.MunirMezyed2023: I’ll most definitely have your hands and feet cut off alternately, and then I ‘ll definitely have you crucified all together."

125.MunirMezyed2023: They said: "No harm! Verily, we are bound to return to our Lord.

126.MunirMezyed2023: You take vengeance on us only because we believed in the Signs of our Lord when they came to us. Our Lord, shower us with patience and cause us to die in complete submission."

127.MunirMezyed2023: And the chiefs among the people of Pharaoh said: "Will you, (O’ Pharaoh), leave Moses and his people to cause corruption in the land, and renounce you and your gods?" He said: "We will kill their male children and preserve their females alive. Surely we can (easily) overpower them."

128.MunirMezyed2023: Moses said to his people: "Seek help from Allâh and cling to patience. Indeed, the earth belongs unto Allâh. He gives it as a heritage to whomsoever He wills of His servants. And the (happy) outcome is in the favor of the Pious .”

129.MunirMezyed2023: They said: “We were persecuted before you came to us and even after you came to us.” He said: "It may be that your Lord will cause your enemy to perish and make you successors on the earth so that He may see how you will act."

130.MunirMezyed2023: We afflicted the clan of Pharaoh with years of draught and scarcity of fruits so that they might be mindful.

131.MunirMezyed2023: But whenever good befell them, they said: "This is due to us."If evil afflicted them, they would attribute that to evil augury of Moses and those with him. Now, surely, the cause of their misfortune was with Allâh. But most of them don’t posses enough knowledge of the Truth.

132.MunirMezyed2023: They said to Moses: "No matter what kind of a (miraculous) Sign you may show us in order to cast a spell on us and gain control over us by magic, we are not inclined to believe in you.

133.MunirMezyed2023: Then We unleashed against them the cataclysm, the locust, the lice, the frogs and the blood. All of these were prominent Signs (of Allâh's power & glory). But they continued to display an arrogant attitude. They were a folk of Ungodly Sinners.

134.MunirMezyed2023: Every time the requital fell upon them, they said: "O' Moses! Implore and pray for us to your Lord due to that which He has promised to you. If it happens that He removes from us this filth, we will definitely believe you, and will definitely permit the Children of Israel to go with you.”

135.MunirMezyed2023: But Every time We removed the filth from them for a term which they should attain, lo! They broke their promise.

136.MunirMezyed2023: So We executed great vengeance upon them and drowned them in the sea because they persistently refused to acknowledge what We have revealed  of the knowledge of truth, not paying close attention to them.

137.MunirMezyed2023: We caused the people who were considered weak to inherit the eastern parts of the land and the western parts thereof, which We blessed. The honorable Word of your Lord was fulfilled for the Children of Israel because of that which they patiently endured. We completely destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had wrought and what they had built.

138.MunirMezyed2023: We brought the Children of Israel across the sea, and they came upon a people who were devoted to their idols. They said: "O’ Moses, make for us a god just as they have gods.” He said:“Indeed, you are a people who have no  knowledge of (Allâh)!"

139.MunirMezyed2023: (Moses added): “Surely, all that these people are engaged in will be destroyed, and all that they do will be in vain."

140.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "Shall I seek for you a god, other than Allâh, when He has preferred you above the peoples?”

141.MunirMezyed2023: (Remember) when We delivered you from the clan of Pharaoh who afflicted you with dreadful torment, slaughtering your sons and sparing your women. Therein was a great trial for you from your Lord.

142.MunirMezyed2023: We appointed for Moses thirty nights, and supplemented them with ten. So he completed the whole time appointed by his Lord of forty nights. Moses said to his brother, Aaron: "Take my place among my people during my absence, seek to reconcile between them and do not follow the way of those who indulge in corruption.

143.MunirMezyed2023: And when Moses came at the time and place appointed by Us, and his Lord spoke to him, he said: “My Lord, show Yourself to me so I may see You.” Allâh replied: "You will not be able to see Me. But look at the mountain!  If it happens that it remains firm in its place, then you will see Me." When His Lord manifested His Majestic Glory on the mountain, He made it crumble to dust and Moses fell down unconscious. When he regained full consciousness, he said: "Glory Be To You. I turn to You in repentance. And I am the first of those who believe (in the Absolute Oneness of Allâh, the Lord of all the beings)."

144.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh said: "O’ Moses, I have chosen you above the people by My Messages and My Word. So take a firm hold to that which I have given you and be of the grateful."

145.MunirMezyed2023: We inscribed for him in the Tablets all kinds of religious maxims and detailed explanation of all things (which his people needed in their religion). So hold them fast and bid your people to take the better therein. I shall show you the abode of those who indulge in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

146.MunirMezyed2023: I shall cause those who display an arrogant attitude without reason on the earth to walk away from My Signs, even if they see all the Signs, they will not believe in them. And if they see the path of integrity, they will not adopt it as their way. But if they see the path of error, they will adopt it as their way. That is because they persistently refuse to acknowledge what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth, not paying close attention to them.

147.MunirMezyed2023: Those who persistently refuse to acknowledge what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth and the meeting of the Hereafter, their deeds are in vain. Do they expect to be rewarded with anything except for what they used to do?

148.MunirMezyed2023: After (Moses had left them to meet with his Lord), his people made of their ornaments the image of Calf (for worship), which gave a mooing sound. Did they not see that it could neither speak to them nor guide them to the (right) path? They took it for worship, and voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

149.MunirMezyed2023: However, when they repented and saw that they had erred, they said: “If it should happen that our Lord did not show Mercy and deliver us from all the consequences of our iniquitous deeds, then we would be definitely be of those who are doomed to eternal perdition.”

150.MunirMezyed2023: When Moses returned to his people, furious and disappointed, he said: “Evil is that which you did in my absence. Did you hasten on the judgment of your Lord?" He cast down the Tablets, and seized his brother by the head, dragging him towards himself. Aaron said: “O’ son of my mother, the people surely reckoned me weak; and they were about to kill me. So let not the enemies rejoice over  my misery  and do not place me with those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

151.MunirMezyed2023: Moses said: “My Lord, forgive me and my brother, and admit us into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show Mercy."

152.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, those who took the Calf (in worship) will obtain wrath from their Lord and humiliation in this worldly life. This is how We reward those who invent falsehood.

153.MunirMezyed2023: And those who committed evil deeds then afterward repented and adhere to Faith (can rest assured that) your Lord after all that is indeed Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

154.MunirMezyed2023: When the anger of Moses subsided, he took up the Tablets, and in their inscription was a True Source of the Enlightenment  and Mercy  for those who showed honor and reverence for their Lord.

155.MunirMezyed2023: Moses chose out of his people seventy men for Our Appointment. So when the earthquake overtook them, he said: "My Lord, if it had been Your will, You could have destroyed them long ago, and me as well. Will you destroy us for that which the foolish among us have done? It is only Your trial by which You allow to go astray whom You will, and give Your light to whom You will. So deliver us from all the consequences of our iniquitous deeds, and show Mercy towards us, for You are the Best of those who forgive.

156.MunirMezyed2023: Ordain for us (that which is) good in this worldly life and the Hereafter. Indeed, we have turned unto you with repentance." (The Lord replied): “I will inflict My chastisement on whom I will. Yet my Mercy  encompasses all things. So I will ordain it for those who act piously, (willingly) give the Zakāt and believe in what We have revealed of the knowledge of truth.

157.MunirMezyed2023: Those who follow the Messenger, the Unlettered Prophet, whom they find mentioned in the Torah and the Gospel which are with them. He enjoins upon them what is good and forbids them what is wrong, makes lawful for them the pure and wholesome things, prohibits for them the evil and removes from them their burdens and shackles that were upon them. So those who believe in him, honor and support him, and follow the light which has been sent down with him, such are the ones who will ultimately achieve a blissful life/ or gain eternal salvation.

158.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “O’ mankind, indeed, I am a Messenger to all of you from Allâh unto whom belongs the (absolute) sovereignty of the heavens and of the earth. There is no god but Him. He gives life and causes death.” So believe in Allâh and His Messenger, the Unlettered Prophet who believes in Allâh and His Word. So follow him so that you may get the awesome opportunity for receiving salvation.”

159.MunirMezyed2023: Of the people of Moses, there was a community which guides by truth and establishes justice by it.

160.MunirMezyed2023: We divided them into twelve tribes, distinct nations. And We revealed to Moses when his people asked him for water, saying: "Strike the rock with your staff. And from it there gushed forth twelve springs. Each tribe knew their drinking place. We caused the clouds to overshadow them, sent down for them manna and quails, and said: "Eat of the pure and wholesome things We have provided for you." They wronged Us not, but it was their own selves that they wronged.

161.MunirMezyed2023: And (mention) when it was said unto them: "Dwell in this town and eat from it wherever you desire. Say: ‘O Allâh, lighten our burden’, and enter the gate in humility. We shall forgive you your iniquitous deeds.. And most assuredly We shall give increase (the portion of) of those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.”

162.MunirMezyed2023: But the workers of iniquity among them changed the word that had been told to them. So We sent upon them a plague from the sky because they  voluntarily and consciously used to abandon the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

163.MunirMezyed2023: Ask them (O’ Muhammad) about the town which stood by the sea: how its people were violating the Sabbath- when their fish came to them on their Sabbath day appearing on the surface of the water, but on the day when they did not keep the Sabbath, they did not come to them. So We made a trial of them because they were indulging in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

164.MunirMezyed2023: And when a group among them said unto another one: "Why do you admonish people whom Allâh is about to destroy or chastise with a severe chastisement?" They replied: “In order to be absolved from blame before your Lord and that they may act piously.”

165.MunirMezyed2023: When they forgot all that with which they had been admonished, we rescued those who forbade evil, and We seized those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims with a dreadful punishment because they were they indulging in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

166.MunirMezyed2023: When they insolently rebelled against that which they had been forbidden, We said to them: “Be you despicable apes."

167.MunirMezyed2023: And (remember) when your Lord declared that He would certainly raise against them those who would afflict them with an agonizing punishment till the Day of Resurrection. Swift is the retribution of your Lord, yet most assuredly he is Oft-Forgiving- Most Merciful (to those who live before the face of Allâh).

168.MunirMezyed2023: We broke them up into different parties on this earth- some were righteous, others were impious. We tried them with good and bad things so that they might revert to righteousness.

169.MunirMezyed2023: Then there came after them an (evil) posterity who inherited the Scripture. They chose to take the transient things of this wordily life, saying: "We will be forgiven." But if it happened that similar transient things were to come to them again, they would decide to adopt them. Did they not make a covenant to uphold the Scripture, that they would not attribute to Allâh anything except for the truth? Did they not study the Scripture? The abode of the Hereafter is better for those who act piously. Don't you have conscious thoughts at least in this sense?

170.MunirMezyed2023: Those who hold fast to the Scripture and establish the regular Prayer (can rest assured that) We shall never let the reward of the reformers go to waste.

171.MunirMezyed2023: And (remember the time) when We shook the mountain over them as though it had been a canopy, and they thought that it was going to fall upon them. We said: "Hold firmly to that which We have given you and remember what is therein so that you may act piously.

172.MunirMezyed2023: And (mention) when your Lord brought forth from the Children of Adam- out of their loins- their offspring and made them testify regarding themselves. (Allâh asked): “Am I not your Lord?” They said: “Yes! We testify.” Thus, He did lest you should say on the Day of Resurrection: “Surely we were not aware of this."

173.MunirMezyed2023: Or lest you should say: “It was only our forefathers who had associated partners with Allâh (in worship) in the past and we were merely descendants after them. Will you then chastise us for what those who denied the truth did?”

174.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We distinctly explain Our Revelations so that they may revert to righteousness.

175.MunirMezyed2023: And relate to them the story of him to whom We vouchsafed Our Signs, but he endeavored to detach them, so Satan followed him up and he became of those who are deceived into going away from the established course.

176.MunirMezyed2023: Had We willed, We would certainly have exalted him thereby. But he clung to the earth, yielding to his own whims. So his case, therefore, is like the case of a thirsty dog: if you drive it away, it hangs out its tongue, or if you leave it, still hangs out its tongue. Such is the case of the people who persistently refuses to acknowledge what We have revealed of the Knowledge of the Truth. So relate to them the tales so that they may ruminate (on this Glorious Qur’ān).

177.MunirMezyed2023: Evil is the likeness of the people who who persistently refuses to acknowledge what We have revealed of the Knowledge of the Truth. They are being unfair to their own selves.

178.MunirMezyed2023: And whomever Allâh enlightens his path is the one who will get this awesome opportunity for receiving salvation.” And Whomsoever He allows to go away from the Truth- such are the ones who are doomed to  perdition.

179.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We have allocated many men and jinn for Gehenna. They have hearts wherewith they don’t understand (neither do they distinguish the truth from falsehood). They have eyes wherewith they do not see. And they have ears wherewith they do not hear. They are like cattle- they are even more astray. They are the ones who are heedless and spiritually blind.

180.MunirMezyed2023: Unto Allâh belong the most Honorable Names. So call on Him by these Honorable Names. And leave alone those who act impiously towards his Honorable Names. They will be chastised for what they used to do.

181.MunirMezyed2023: Of those We have created, there is a community that seeks to guide others with truth and with it they are persistent in their pursuit of justice.

182.MunirMezyed2023: Those who persistently refuse to acknowledge what We have revealed   od the knowledge of the Truth , We will lead them step by step into ruin, whence they cannot expect.

183.MunirMezyed2023: And I will give them respite. Indeed, My stratagem will prove effectual.

184.MunirMezyed2023: Do they not reflect? There is no madness in their companion. He is only sent to give sufficient warnings (about how to avoid Hellfire)

185.MunirMezyed2023: Will they not ponder upon the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth, and everything that Allâh has created, and that perhaps their appointed time has already drawn near? Then in what proclamation after this will they come  to Faith?

186.MunirMezyed2023: Whomsoever Allâh allows to go away from the Truth, none can lead him into the right path. And He lets them wander blindly in their transgressions.

187.MunirMezyed2023: They ask you about the Hour: "When it will come to pass?" Say: "The knowledge thereof is only with my Lord. None can manifest its time but He. Heavy is its burden through the heavens and the earth. It will not come upon you except all of a sudden." They ask you as if you were well-acquainted therewith. Say: "The knowledge thereof is only with Allâh. But most people do not know.”

188.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “I possess no power to benefit or protect myself, except by the Will of Allâh. If I had the knowledge of (the world) of unseen, I would have abundance of wealth, and adversity would not have touched me. I am sent to deliver a severe warning, and to give glad tidings for for a people who live a life of Genuine Faith.”

189.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who created you from a single person (Adam) and made from him his mate (Eve), in order that he might find comfort in her. When he covers her, she bears a light burden, and then moves about with it. When she grows heavy, they both implore and pray to Allâh, their Lord, saying: “If it happens that you vouchsafe us a righteous child, we will be among the grateful.”

190.MunirMezyed2023: But when He vouchsafes them a righteous child, they set up associates with Him in return for what He had given them. Allâh is Highly Exalted far above what they associate with Him.

191.MunirMezyed2023: Do they associate with Him partners that which cannot create a thing, whereas they are themselves created?

192.MunirMezyed2023: Neither can they help them, nor can they help themselves.

193.MunirMezyed2023: If it happens that you provide a means for them to get this awesome opportunity for receiving salvation, they will not follow you.  It is all the same  whether you provide a means for them or you remain silent.

194.MunirMezyed2023: Those whom you call upon, besides Allâh, are creatures like you. Then call upon them and let them respond to you if you are truthful.

195.MunirMezyed2023: Do they have feet wherewith they walk? Do they have hands wherewith they hold? Do they Have eyes wherewith they see? Do they have ears wherewith they hear? Say: “Call upon your associate-gods then plot against me and give me no respite.

196.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, my Guardian is Allâh who has revealed the Book- (the Glorious Qur’ān). He protects the righteous.

197.MunirMezyed2023: And those whom you invoke besides Him cannot help you, nor can they help themselves.”

198.MunirMezyed2023: If it happens that you provide a means for them to get this awesome opportunity for receiving salvation, they are not willing to listen to you. You could see them looking towards you, but they do not see.

199.MunirMezyed2023: Show forgiveness, enjoin kindness, and shun the ignorant ones.

200.MunirMezyed2023: And if it happens that an incitement from the devil incites you, then seek refuge in Allâh. Most surely, He is All-Hearer- All-Knowing.

201.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, those who act piously- whenever any evil suggestion from Satan touches them, they celebrate the praise of (Allâh) and declare His glory. Then behold, they begin to see things clearly.

202.MunirMezyed2023: But their brethren (the wicked ones) keep on dragging them into error.   And they do not relax their vigorous attempts.

203.MunirMezyed2023: When you do not bring to them a (miraculous) sign, they say: "Why have you not brought it?" Say: "I only follow that which is revealed to me from my Lord. This Qur’ān is spiritual insight from your Lord, a True Source of the Enlightenment and Mercy for a people who live a life of Genuine Faith.

204.MunirMezyed2023: And When this (Glorious) Qur’ān is recited, listen to It attentively and remain silent so that you may be delivered from all the consequences of your iniquitous deeds.

205.MunirMezyed2023: Celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare his glory with humility and reverence and in a low voice in the mornings and evenings.  And do not be of those  whose mind’s eye is blind.

206.MunirMezyed2023: Surely those who are near to your Lord (the Angels) do not turn away with pride from His worship, but they celebrate His Praise and declare His glory, prostrating themselves before Him.

1.MunirMezyed2023: They ask you about the spoils of war. Say: "The spoils are for Allâh and the Messenger." So act piously towards Allâh. Adjust all matters of difference among you. And yield to the (Commandments of) Allâh and (to what He has revealed to) the Messenger if you truly live a life of Genuine Faith.

2.MunirMezyed2023: The monotheistic believers of unfeigned faith are only they whose hearts tremble with awe whenever Allâh is mentioned, and whose faith is invigorated whenever His (Holy) Verses are recited to them, and who depend on their Lord with full trust.

3.MunirMezyed2023: They establish the regular Prayer and expend of what We have provided them.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Those in truth are the monotheistic believers of unfeigned faith. They have exalted grades of rank with their Lord,  forgiveness and a bountiful sustenance.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Just as your Lord caused you to go forth from your home (for the Battle of Badr) in truth, while indeed, a party among the Monotheistic Believers were averse to it.

6.MunirMezyed2023: They disputed with you concerning the Truth after it has become obvious to the eye as though they were being driven to death with their eyes wide open.

7.MunirMezyed2023: And (remember) when Allâh gave you the promise that one of the two parties that it should be yours, and you wished that the one unarmed should be yours, but Allâh intended to entrench the Truth by His Word and cut off the root of those who are spiritually dead and blind,

8.MunirMezyed2023: That He might entrench the Truth and abolish falsehood. No matter how detestable is to the Ungodly Sinners.

9.MunirMezyed2023: And (recall) when you implored the help of your Lord, and He responded to your invocation (saying): “I will definitely help you with one thousand Angels, rank on rank.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh made it only as a piece of joyful news so that your hearts would be comforted. Victory comes only by the help of Allâh. Most certainly Allâh is Almighty- All-Wise.

11.MunirMezyed2023: And (remember) when He covered you with a slumber as a sign of security from Him, sending down water upon you from the sky to purify you, remove the filth of Satan from you, invigorate your hearts and make your feet firm therewith.

12.MunirMezyed2023: And (remember) when your Lord inspired the Angels (saying): “Verily, I am with you, so make those who live by Faith to stand firm. And I will cast terror into the hearts of those who persistently refuse to Yield to the Truth . Now, therefore, strike them over the necks and smite over all their fingers and toes."

13.MunirMezyed2023: That is because they opposed Allâh and His Messenger. Whoever opposes Allâh and His Messenger (will come to know that) Allâh is extremely severe in punishment.

14.MunirMezyed2023: (That is your punishment). Now, therefore, taste it! And surely for those who persistently refuse to Yield to the Truth, there is also the punishment of Fire.

15.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! When you see those who persistently refuse to Yield to the Truth advancing in force, do not turn your backs to them.

16.MunirMezyed2023: And whosoever turns his back to them on such a day -- unless maneuvering for battle or turning to join another company -- certainly draws upon himself the wrath of Allâh, and his abode is Gehenna-- an evil journey’s end!

17.MunirMezyed2023: It was not you who killed them, but Allâh did. You did not throw when you did throw, but it was Allâh who did so in order to confer  a graceful favor  from Himself on those who live by faith. Most certainly, Allâh is All-Hearing- All-Knowing.

18.MunirMezyed2023: This (is what happened) and most surely Allâh debilitated the machination of those who persistently refuse to Yield to the Truth.

19.MunirMezyed2023: (O’ polytheists), if it happens that you ask for a judgment, then judgment has indeed come to you. And If it happens that you refrain (from hostilities towards those who adhere to Absolute Monotheism), then it will be better for you. But if it happens that you revert (to hostilities), We too will revert (to punishment). And your host will avail you nothing how numerous it be. For Allâh is with those who adhere to Absolute Monotheism.

20.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! Yield to ( the Commandments of)  Allâh and (to what He has revealed to) His Messenger . And do not walk away from him when you hear (him giving you an order).

21.MunirMezyed2023: And  do not be like those who say: "We hear," but they don't discern.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Surely, the worst creatures, in the sight of Allâh, are the deaf and the dumb, who lack the ability to perceive and understand.

23.MunirMezyed2023: Had Allâh known any goodness in them, He would definitely have made them hear. Even if He had made them hear, they would have walked away in a repulsive manner.
