14.MunirMezyed2023: And if happens that you call upon them, they cannot hear your supplication. Even if they were to hear, they would not be able to respond to you. On the Day of Resurrection, they will disown association with you. None is capable of informing you like Him Who is All-Aware.

15.MunirMezyed2023: O’ mankind, it is you who are in need of Allâh. Lo! Allâh is the Self-Sufficient, Worthy of all praise.

16.MunirMezyed2023: And if He wills, He can (easily) make you vanish (completely) and bring forth a new creation.

17.MunirMezyed2023: This is not too arduous task for Allâh.

18.MunirMezyed2023: No bearer of a burden shall bear the burden of another. And if one heavy laden should call upon others for help to bear his load, not aught of it will be carried by none, not even a relative. You can only warn those who show reverence and honor to their Lord although they cannot see Him, and duly perform their prayers. And whoever achieved positive spiritual growth, he achieved it only for his own benefit. To Allâh is the journeying.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Not equal are the spiritually blind and the enlightened one,

20.MunirMezyed2023: Nor the darkness and light,

21.MunirMezyed2023: Nor the sunshade and the heat.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Not equal are the living ones and the dead. Indeed, Allâh makes whom He wills to hear. But you cannot make those who are in the tombs to hear.

23.MunirMezyed2023: You are only a Messenger whose sole duty is to admonish.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We have sent you with the truth as a herald of glad tidings and as a Messenger who give warnings. And there is not a past nation but a Messenger has passed among them.

25.MunirMezyed2023: If it happens that they are inclined to deny you, then (you’ll need to know that) those who before them had denied the Messengers. Their Messengers came to them with Irrefutable Signs , Psalms  and  enlightening Scripture.

26.MunirMezyed2023: Then I seized those who voluntarily and consciously refuse to Yield to the Truth. And how dreadful was My condemnation!

27.MunirMezyed2023: Do you not see how Allâh sends down water from the sky and with it brings forth fruits of various colors? In the mountains are streaks white and red, of varying colors and (others) intensely deep black.

28.MunirMezyed2023: Also, of people, animals, and livestock come in various colors. Of His servants, only those who have the gift of wisdom and knowledge show more proper reverence for Allâh (than others). Indeed, Allâh is Almighty, Oft-Forgiving.

29.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, as for those who recite the Book of Allâh, establish the regular Prayer and spend (in His cause) out of what We have provided them, in secret and public, they rummage around for a commerce that will never perish.

30.MunirMezyed2023: For He will pay them in full their rewards and give them even more out of His Bounty. Verily! He is Oft-Forgiving, All-appreciating.

31.MunirMezyed2023: As for that which We inspire in you of the Book is the truth verifying that which was (revealed) before it. Verily! Allâh is indeed All-Aware and All-Seer of His servants.

32.MunirMezyed2023: Then We gave the Scripture as inheritance to those whom We chose from among Our servants. But of them is he who is unfair to himself, of them is he who is lukewarm, and of them is he who is foremost in doing good by the permission of Allâh. This is the most ultimate Bounty and the supreme one.

33.MunirMezyed2023: Gardens of Eden will they enter, therein they will be decked with bracelets of gold and pearls; and their raiment there will be of fine silk.

34.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: "All Praise Is Due Allâh, Who has taken the sorrow away from us! Verily! Our Lord is definitely Oft-Forgiving, All-Appreciating,

35.MunirMezyed2023: Who, out of His Bounty, has made us to be established in the abode of everlasting life, where neither toil nor fatigue shall touch us.

36.MunirMezyed2023: On the other hand, those who voluntarily and consciously refuse to Yield to the Truth will have to incur the Fire of Gehenna. It will be preordained for them not to die, neither will the torment be lightened for them. This is how We chastise every ingrate one.

37.MunirMezyed2023: Therein they will cry out: “Our Lord, get us out, (most surely) we shall do righteousness - other than those which we were inclined to do". (They will be Told): ‘Did  We not grant you a life long enough for whoever would (like to) consider therein to consider? There came to you the Messenger (who gave you sufficient warning about how to avoid Hellfire). So, now taste ( the dire consequences of your iniquitous deeds)’. As for those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims, there will be no helper (to protect them against punishment of Allâh).

38.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, Allâh has full knowledge of the unseen of heavens and earth. And most certainly, He knows well what is stored up in the hearts.

39.MunirMezyed2023: And He is the One Who has made you successors in the earth. So whoever is tempted to deny the Truth will have to face the dire consequences of his persistent denial. Their persistent denial doesn’t increase the deniers of Truth with their Lord in anything except displeasure. And their persistent denial doesn’t increase the deniers of Truth in any thing except perdition.

40.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “Have you seen your partner-gods whom you call upon, other than Allâh? Show me what part of the earth they have created. Or do they have any share in the creation of the heavens? Or, have We given them a book so that they may follow an evident pretext thereof? Nay, but those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims promise one another naught but deception."

41.MunirMezyed2023: Verily Allâh upholds the heavens and the earth lest they fragmentize. If it should happen that they fragmentize, then none would uphold them after Him. Most certainly, He is Ever Most Forbearing, Oft-Forgiving.

42.MunirMezyed2023: And they swore by Allâh solemnly that If it should happen that a Messenger would come to admonish them, they would be better guided than any of the nation. But when a Messenger came to admonish them, his coming only increased their aversion to the Truth,

43.MunirMezyed2023: Behaving arrogantly in the land, and devising evil. Yet such evil scheming will encompass only those who plot evil. Are they awaiting anything other than the way We dealt with the ancients? Yet you shall not find any alteration or revision in the course of Allâh.

44.MunirMezyed2023: Have they not travelled through the land and seen the (dreadful) end  of those who were before them? They were more powerful than them- (Pagan Arabs). Nothing in the heavens or on the earth can frustrate (the power of) Allâh. Most certainly He is Ever All-Knowing, All-Powerful.

45.MunirMezyed2023: And If Allâh were to inflict a penalty on the people for what they committed, He would not leave a living creature on the surface of the earth. But He reprieves them till an appointed term. Thus, When their doom  comes, then (bear in mind that) Allâh is definitely All-Seer of His servants.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Yā Sīn!

2.MunirMezyed2023: By the Judicious Qur’ān

3.MunirMezyed2023: That you are indeed one of the Messengers

4.MunirMezyed2023: On a straight path.

5.MunirMezyed2023: (This Glorious Qur’ān) is  the  Revelation in the Knowledge of Almighty, the Most Merciful

6.MunirMezyed2023: So that you may admonish a people whose forefathers were not admonished, and hence they are quite heedless (of truth).

7.MunirMezyed2023: And Verily, the Word, for punishment, has already proved true against most of them, so they will never adhere to Faith.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Surely We had bound their hands to their necks with shackles reaching up to their chins so that they cannot bend their heads.

9.MunirMezyed2023: And We have set before them a barrier and a barrier behind them, then We  have blinded their eyes and so they do not see.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Whether you admonish them or not, they have no tendency to live by Faith.

11.MunirMezyed2023: You can only admonish the one who follows the Qur'an, and shows honor and reverence for the True Merciful (God), (even) in secret. So give to him the glad tidings of Forgiveness and an extraordinary reward.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely it is We Who revive the dead and record whatever they  send before and whatever they leave behind. And We keep everything recorded in a clear writing.

13.MunirMezyed2023: And strike for them as a similitude: the people of the town, when Messengers (of Allâh) came to it:

14.MunirMezyed2023: When We sent to them two (Messengers), but they were inclined to  deny both of them. Then We strengthened them with a third one who said to them: “We are indeed Messengers (of Allâh) to you”.

15.MunirMezyed2023: They said: “You are no more than human beings like us, and the True Merciful (God) has revealed nothing. You are only lying”.

16.MunirMezyed2023: The Messengers said: “Our Lord knows well that we are indeed (His) Messengers to you”.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Our mission is only to convey ( His Message) clearly".

18.MunirMezyed2023: They said: “We prognosticate an evil omen coming from you. And If it happens that you don’t put an end to (this nonsense), we will surely stone you (to death), and a painful punishment will definitely touch you from us”.

19.MunirMezyed2023: The Messengers replied: ”Your evil omen is with yourselves. Is it because you are admonished? Nay, but you are prodigals”.

20.MunirMezyed2023: There came from the furthermost part of the town a man running. He said: “O’ my people, follow the Messengers.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Follow those who ask no reward of you and are on the right path.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Why should I not worship the One who created me and to whom you shall all be returned?

23.MunirMezyed2023: Will I take others besides Him as gods? If the True Merciful (God)  was to afflict me with harm, their intercession won’t profit me at all, nor will they be able to save me?

24.MunirMezyed2023: Surely, I should then be in utter deception.

25.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, I affirm my Faith in your Lord, so hear me”.

26.MunirMezyed2023: It was said (to him after they had murdered him), "Enter Al-Jannah!" He said: "Ah, would that my people had known

27.MunirMezyed2023: That my Lord has forgiven me and that He has placed me among the honored ones!”

28.MunirMezyed2023: And We didn’t send down against his people an army (of Angels) from the heaven (to destroy them) after his death, nor do We ever send down.

29.MunirMezyed2023: It was but a single Cry and lo! they were all extinguished.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide the servants! Whenever a Messenger comes to them, they poke fun at him.

31.MunirMezyed2023: Have they not seen how many generations We destroyed before them? Indeed, they shall never return to them.

32.MunirMezyed2023: And all of them will definitely be brought before Us.

33.MunirMezyed2023: And a Sign for them is the dead land: We revive it and bring forth grain from which they eat.

34.MunirMezyed2023: We make therein gardens of date-palms and grapes and cause the springs of the great deep to burst forth therein

35.MunirMezyed2023: So that they may eat of the fruit thereof. But it was not their hands that made it. Will they not then be grateful?

36.MunirMezyed2023: All Glory Be To Him Who has created pairs of all things - of what the earth grows, of their own species and other creations that they don’t encompass in Knowledge.

37.MunirMezyed2023: Another sign for them is the night. We pull off the day from it, and behold they are left in darkness.

38.MunirMezyed2023: And the sun runs on its destination. That is the ordinance of the Almighty, the All-Knowing.

39.MunirMezyed2023: And the moon, We have ordained for it specific phases until it ends up looking like an old date branch.

40.MunirMezyed2023: It is not for the sun to overtake the moon, nor does the night outstrip the day. Each one is swimming in a sphere.

41.MunirMezyed2023: Another sign for them is that we carried their offspring in the laden Ark.

42.MunirMezyed2023: And We have created for them similar things on which they ride.

43.MunirMezyed2023: And if We will, We can (easily) drown them. Then there will be no salvage for them, nor can they be rescued-

44.MunirMezyed2023: Except as a Mercy from Us and provision for a while.

45.MunirMezyed2023: And When it is said to them: "Beware of that which is that which is before you and behind you in order that you may obtain Mercy”.

46.MunirMezyed2023: And whenever a Sign of the Signs of their Lord is shown to them,  they turn away from it.

47.MunirMezyed2023: And When it is said to them: “Spend from that which Allâh has provided for you", those who voluntarily and consciously refuse to Yield to the Truth say to those who adhere to Faith: “What! Shall we feed those whom Allâh, if he willed, He would feed? Most surely you are in naught but utter deception.

48.MunirMezyed2023: And they say: "When will this promise be if you are truthful?”

49.MunirMezyed2023: They await but a single Cry, which will overtake them while they are yet quarrelling with each other.

50.MunirMezyed2023: Then they won’t be able to make bequest or return to their family.

51.MunirMezyed2023: And the Trumpet will be blown. Then behold, they will hasten on from their sepulchers to their Lord.

52.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: "Woe betide us! Who has raised us up from our resting place?” (It will be said to them): "This is what the True Merciful (God) promised, and the Messengers spoke the truth!"

53.MunirMezyed2023: It will be but a single Cry. Then behold, they are all brought before Us.

54.MunirMezyed2023: So today, none will be wronged in the least, and you shall be requited only for what you were inclined to do.

55.MunirMezyed2023: Verily the Denizens of Al-Jannah shall be on that day in utter delight.

56.MunirMezyed2023: They and their spouses will be in delightful shades, reclining on couches.

57.MunirMezyed2023: They will have therein (different types of) fruits and whatever they desire.

58.MunirMezyed2023: “Peace”: A word from the Lord, the Most Merciful.

59.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord will command): “As for you, O’ Ungodly Sinners, stand apart from the others on this day!"

60.MunirMezyed2023: Did I not make a covenant with you, O’ Children of Adam, that you should not worship the Devil - surely He is your open  enemy -

61.MunirMezyed2023: And that you should worship Me (in the way I want you to worship Me)? That is the straight path.

62.MunirMezyed2023: And most certainly he deceived a large number of people. Didn't you have conscious thoughts at least in this sense?

63.MunirMezyed2023: This, then, is Gehenna which you were promised!

64.MunirMezyed2023: Burn therein today for your persistent and purposeful denial of the Truth.

65.MunirMezyed2023: This day We set a seal on their mouths, letting their hands speak to Us and their feet testify to what they were inclined to do.

66.MunirMezyed2023: And had We willed, We would surely have obliterated their eyesight, then they would struggle to find the path, but how would they see?

67.MunirMezyed2023: And had We willed, We would surely have transformed them (into animals or objects) in their place. So they would not be able to precede or turn back.

68.MunirMezyed2023: And whomever We give long life, We  cause him to revert to weakness. Didn't you have conscious thoughts at least in this sense?

69.MunirMezyed2023: And We have not taught him the (art of) poetry. It is not appropriate for him (to be a poet). It is not but a Scripture and irrefutable Qur’ān

70.MunirMezyed2023: So that he may admonish whoever is alive, and that the Word may be fulfilled against those who have no tendency to live by Faith.

71.MunirMezyed2023: Have they not seen that We created cattle for them, out of what Our hands have wrought, and then they are their owners?

72.MunirMezyed2023: And We have subjected the cattle to them. Some of them they ride and others they eat.

73.MunirMezyed2023: They have other advantages from them, as well as beverages. Will they not then show gratitude?

74.MunirMezyed2023: Yet they have taken gods, other than Allâh, haply they might be helped.

75.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, they are incapable of helping them even though they made themselves soldiers serving them.

76.MunirMezyed2023: So don’t let their words sadden you. Most certainly We have full knowledge of whatsoever they hide and whatsoever they disclose.

77.MunirMezyed2023: Doesn’t man see that We have created him from a semen-drop? Then lo! He is a compulsive conversationalist!

78.MunirMezyed2023: And he strikes for Us a similitude and forgets his own creation. He says: "Who will give life to these bones when they have disintegrated to dust?"

79.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "The one who will give life to them is the One who initiated them in the first time. He has full knowledge of all creation.

80.MunirMezyed2023: The one Who produces for you fire out of the green tree, and then from it you kindle.

81.MunirMezyed2023: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth Able to create  the like of them? Yea! He is indeed the Supreme Creator, the Omniscient.

82.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, His Command, when He intends to create a thing, is only to say to it, ‘Be’, and there it is.

83.MunirMezyed2023: So All Glory Be To Him in Whose Hand is the sovereignty of all things, and to Whom you will be all returned."

37.SurahEnglishNames: Those Who Set The Ranks, Drawn up in Ranks, The Rangers

1.MunirMezyed2023: By those (Angels) who stand in ranks,

2.MunirMezyed2023: Then by those (Angels) who drive (the clouds) robustly,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Then by those (Angels) who recite the Verses (of the Qur’ān),

4.MunirMezyed2023: Your Lord is One and Absolutely Unique.

5.MunirMezyed2023: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them. And the Lord of the Eastern regions.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Surely We have embellished the lower heaven with planets,

7.MunirMezyed2023: Protecting it from every rebellious devil,

8.MunirMezyed2023: They cannot listen to the exalted assembly for they are pelted from every side,

9.MunirMezyed2023: Driven away, and theirs is an everlasting torment.

10.MunirMezyed2023: But whoever manages to stealthily snatch a word (from the heavens) is pursued by a piercing flame.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Then ask them: "Are they stronger as creation, or those (others) whom We have created?”. Surely We created them of a high viscosity clay.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Nay! You are amazed (by their persistent and purposeful denial of Resurrection), while they poke fun (at you).

13.MunirMezyed2023: And when they are admonished, they pay no heed.

14.MunirMezyed2023: And when they see a Sign, they make it an object of ridicule,

15.MunirMezyed2023: Saying: “This is nothing but an apparent sorcery (& devilry).

16.MunirMezyed2023: What! When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we truly be resurrected?

17.MunirMezyed2023: What, even our forefathers in former times?”

18.MunirMezyed2023: Say (to them): “Yea, and you will be completely demeaned.”

19.MunirMezyed2023: So it will be but one Cry, then behold, they are contemplating.

20.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: "Woe betide us! This is the Day of Judgment."

21.MunirMezyed2023: (They  will be told): “This is the Decisive Day which you were inclined to deny ”.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Assemble all those who voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims along with their peers and what they were inclined to worship,

23.MunirMezyed2023: Besides Allâh, then lead them to the way to Gehenna.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Stop them! Indeed, they are to be questioned.

25.MunirMezyed2023: What is wrong with you? Why do you not help each other?

26.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, on that day, they will be totally submissive (and helpless).

27.MunirMezyed2023: They will approach one another, casting blame,

28.MunirMezyed2023: Saying: "It was you who used to come to us from the right hand”.

29.MunirMezyed2023: They shall reply: “Nay, but you had no tendency to live by Faith.

30.MunirMezyed2023: And we had no authority over you. But you yourselves were rebellious people.

31.MunirMezyed2023: So the Word of our Lord has been justified against us. Well! We are about to taste (the chastisement).

32.MunirMezyed2023: Apparently, we have seduced you away (from Faith) only because we are seducers”.

33.MunirMezyed2023: So, that day they will all take part in the torment.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, this is how We deal with the Ungodly Sinners.

35.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, when it was said to them: "There is no other god beside Allâh”, they acted imperiously,

36.MunirMezyed2023: And said: "Are we going to forsake our gods for the sake of a demented poet"

37.MunirMezyed2023: Nay! He has come with the Truth and has authenticated (the divine Message of) the Messengers (who were sent before him).

38.MunirMezyed2023: Well! You are surely going to taste the painful torment.

39.MunirMezyed2023: You will be chastised only for what you were inclined to do.

40.MunirMezyed2023: But the faithful servants of Allâh (will be saved).

41.MunirMezyed2023: For them there is a known provision:

42.MunirMezyed2023: (Different types of) fruits. And they will be highly honored:

43.MunirMezyed2023: In the Gardens of bliss:

44.MunirMezyed2023: On thrones, facing each other.

45.MunirMezyed2023: Glass of sparkling wine will be circulated around them,

46.MunirMezyed2023: Pure brilliant white, very palatable for those who like to drink.

47.MunirMezyed2023: It has no bad effect on them, neither will it make them drunk.

48.MunirMezyed2023: With them will be voluptuous maidens

49.MunirMezyed2023: As if they were hidden eggs (of the ostrich, sheltered by their feathers from dust).

50.MunirMezyed2023: They will approach one another, questioning one another.

51.MunirMezyed2023: A speaker of them will say: "Indeed, I had a companion (in the worldly life),

52.MunirMezyed2023: Who used to say: "Are you of those who believe (in the Resurrection)?

53.MunirMezyed2023: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, shall we really be called to account (for everything we do)?

54.MunirMezyed2023: He will say: "Will you have a look?"

55.MunirMezyed2023: So he looked down and saw him in the depth of Gehenna.

56.MunirMezyed2023: He will say: "By Allâh! You had almost led me into perdition.

57.MunirMezyed2023: And had it not been for the benevolence of my Lord, I would definitely have been among those who brought up".

58.MunirMezyed2023: Is it then that we won’t die,

59.MunirMezyed2023: Except for our first death, and that we shall not be chastised?"

60.MunirMezyed2023: This is definitely the ultimate success and the supreme one.

61.MunirMezyed2023: For the like of this, then, let the worker strive.

62.MunirMezyed2023: Is this a better hospitality or the tree of Zaqqum?

63.MunirMezyed2023: We have made this (tree) a trial for those who voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

64.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, It is a tree that grows in the core of Gehenna.

65.MunirMezyed2023: Its emerging fruit are like the head of the of devils.

66.MunirMezyed2023: The Denizens of Hell will eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.

67.MunirMezyed2023: After eating from it, they will be given a mixture made of scalding water.

68.MunirMezyed2023: Then indeed, their return will be to the Inferno.

69.MunirMezyed2023: They indeed found their forefathers on the wrong path.

70.MunirMezyed2023: Yet they rushed to follow their footsteps.

71.MunirMezyed2023: And certainly most of the ancients were on the wrong path before them,

72.MunirMezyed2023: And indeed We sent among them Messengers to admonish.

73.MunirMezyed2023: Then see how (dreadful) was the end of those who were admonished,

74.MunirMezyed2023: Except for the faithful servants of Allâh.

75.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, Noah prayed to Us (for help), and how excellent did we respond to Prayers!

76.MunirMezyed2023: We saved him and his family from the great distress,

77.MunirMezyed2023: Made his progeny the survivors,

78.MunirMezyed2023: And perpetuated his good legacy in later generations.

79.MunirMezyed2023: Peace be upon Noah among (all men and jinn) in the worlds.

80.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, this is how We reward those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

81.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, he was one of Our Pious servants.

82.MunirMezyed2023: Then We drowned the others.

83.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, among those who followed the (upright) Faith of Noah was Abraham.

84.MunirMezyed2023: He came to his Lord with Pure and Faultless heart.

85.MunirMezyed2023: He said to his father and his people: “What is that you worship?

86.MunirMezyed2023: Is it a mendacity - gods beside Allâh- that you desire?

87.MunirMezyed2023: Then what is your speculation about the Lord of all the beings.

88.MunirMezyed2023: Then he took a glance at the stars,

89.MunirMezyed2023: And said: “I am sick (with plague).”

90.MunirMezyed2023: So they turned away from him, departing (in fear of getting infected).

91.MunirMezyed2023: Then he turned to their gods and said: “What! Do you not eat?

92.MunirMezyed2023: What is wrong with you that you don’t speak ?”

93.MunirMezyed2023: Then he turned furtively to them, smiting them with the right hand.

94.MunirMezyed2023: Then they came toward him, hastening.

95.MunirMezyed2023: He said: “Do you worship that which you sculpt

96.MunirMezyed2023: While Allâh is the One Who has created you, as well as what you make?”

97.MunirMezyed2023: They said: “Build for him a building (i.e. pyre), then cast him into the Fire.”

98.MunirMezyed2023: Apparently, they wanted to outwit him, but We brought them low.

99.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "Indeed, I am going  to my Lord. He will surely guide me (into all the truth).

100.MunirMezyed2023: My Lord, vouchsafe me one of the righteous."

101.MunirMezyed2023: So We gave him the glad tidings of a forbearing boy.

102.MunirMezyed2023: But when (his son) became old enough to toil with him, (Abraham) said: "O’ my son, indeed I see in a dream that I must scarify you. What do you think of this?" He said: "O’ my father, do what you are commanded to do. You will find me, if Allâh wills, one of those who cling  to patience."

103.MunirMezyed2023: Then, when they had both surrendered, and he had flung him down upon his forehead,

104.MunirMezyed2023: We called out to him: “O’ Abraham!

105.MunirMezyed2023: You have indeed fulfilled the vision of truth.” Most surely We reward those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

106.MunirMezyed2023: This was indeed the real ordeal.

107.MunirMezyed2023: So, We ransomed his son with a great sacrifice.

108.MunirMezyed2023: And We perpetuated his good legacy in later generations.

110.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We reward those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

111.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, he was of Our Pious servants.

112.MunirMezyed2023: And We gave him the glad tidings of Isaac, one of the righteous Prophets.

113.MunirMezyed2023: And We blessed him and Isaac. Some of their offspring were righteous and others were obviously unfair to their own selves.

114.MunirMezyed2023: Verily We conferred a favor on Moses and Aaron.

115.MunirMezyed2023: And We saved them and their people from the great ordeal,

116.MunirMezyed2023: And helped them. So they were victorious. .

117.MunirMezyed2023: And We gave them both the Explicative Scripture,

118.MunirMezyed2023: Guided them both to the right path,

119.MunirMezyed2023: And perpetuated their good legacy in later generations.

120.MunirMezyed2023: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.

121.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, this is how We reward those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

122.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, they were both of Our Pious Servants .

123.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, Elias was one of the Messengers of Allâh.

124.MunirMezyed2023: He said to his people: “Will you not act piously?

125.MunirMezyed2023: What! Do you pray to Baal and  abandon the Best Creator,.

126.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?"

127.MunirMezyed2023: They denied him. So they will be brought forth (to the doom)

128.MunirMezyed2023: Except for the faithful servants of Allâh.

129.MunirMezyed2023: And We perpetuated his good legacy in the later generations.

131.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, this is how We reward those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

132.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, he was of Our Pious Servants.

133.MunirMezyed2023: Surely Lot was of one the Messengers of Allâh.

134.MunirMezyed2023: And We saved him and all his family,

135.MunirMezyed2023: Except an old woman (his wife), who was among those who lagged behind:

136.MunirMezyed2023: Then We utterly destroyed the others.

137.MunirMezyed2023: Surely you pass by them in the morning

138.MunirMezyed2023: And at night. Don't you have conscious thoughts at least in this sense?

139.MunirMezyed2023: And Jonah was surely one of the Messengers (of Allâh).

140.MunirMezyed2023: He ran away and (embarked) on a ship heavily laden.

141.MunirMezyed2023: Then he drew lots. And he was among the losers.

142.MunirMezyed2023: Then a great fish swallowed him as he was culpable.

143.MunirMezyed2023: And had he not been of those who celebrate the praise (of Allâh) and declare His absolute majesty and glory,

144.MunirMezyed2023: He would have remained in its belly until the day when they are raised.

145.MunirMezyed2023: So We cast him into the open shore and he was seriously injured.

146.MunirMezyed2023: Then We caused a pumpkin tree to grow above him.

147.MunirMezyed2023: And We sent him to a hundred thousand (people) or even more.

148.MunirMezyed2023: They all adhered to Absolute Monotheism and so We gave them comfort for a while.

149.MunirMezyed2023: So do ask them: “Does your Lord have daughters, whereas they have sons?

150.MunirMezyed2023: Or did We create the Angels females while they were witnesses?”

151.MunirMezyed2023: Emphatically, it is out of their mendacity that they say:

152.MunirMezyed2023: “Allâh has begotten.” They are truly lairs.

153.MunirMezyed2023: Has He abandoned the sons in favour of daughters?

154.MunirMezyed2023: What is wrong with you? How do you judge (things)?

155.MunirMezyed2023: Will you not then take heed?

156.MunirMezyed2023: Or do you have a clear authority?

157.MunirMezyed2023: So bring your book if you are truthful.

158.MunirMezyed2023: They even invented consanguinity between Him and the Jinn. In fact, The Jinn know well that they will be brought (before their Lord)-

159.MunirMezyed2023: All Glory Be To Allâh from whatever they describe!-

160.MunirMezyed2023: Except for the faithful servants of Allâh.

161.MunirMezyed2023: Surely you and whatever you worship

162.MunirMezyed2023: Cannot tempt any one away (from the upright faith)

163.MunirMezyed2023: Except the ones who are predestined to burn in Hell.

164.MunirMezyed2023: The Angels said: “There is not one of us but has an appointed place.

165.MunirMezyed2023: Surely we stand in ranks (for prayer)

166.MunirMezyed2023: And we indeed hymn His praise.”

168.MunirMezyed2023: “If only we had received a Scripture like that of the people of old,

169.MunirMezyed2023: We would have been the faithful servants of Allâh.”

170.MunirMezyed2023: But, (when the Qur’ān has come to them), they refuse to give credence to It. They will soon know (the consequences of their refusal).

171.MunirMezyed2023: Our Word has already foregone for Our servants, the Messengers,

172.MunirMezyed2023: That they would certainly be helped,

173.MunirMezyed2023: And that our soldiers would certainly be the victors.

174.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, turn away from them for a little while.

175.MunirMezyed2023: And watch (what will befall) them and soon they will see.

176.MunirMezyed2023: What! Do they seek to hasten Our retribution?

177.MunirMezyed2023: But when it descends in their courtyard, then evil is the morning of those who are admonished.

178.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, turn away from them for a little while,

179.MunirMezyed2023: And watch (what will befall) them and soon they will see.

180.MunirMezyed2023: All Glory Be To your Lord, the Lord of Honor and Power, above what they describe!

181.MunirMezyed2023: Peace Be upon the Messengers of Allâh.

182.MunirMezyed2023: All praise is due to Allâh, Lord of all the worlds.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Sād!  I swear by the Qur’ān, (which is) full of  Beneficial Proverbs.

2.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, those who have no tendency to live by Faith are in excessive pride and schism.

3.MunirMezyed2023: So many generations We have destroyed before them- (When they had to face the doom), they cried out (for help) but it was too late for them to escape .

4.MunirMezyed2023: They -(the Pagan Arabs)- wonder that a Messenger has come to them from their own race. Those who have no tendency to live by Faith say: “He is only a lying sorcerer."

5.MunirMezyed2023: What! Does he claim that all the gods are but one God? This is entirely unusual.

6.MunirMezyed2023: And the chiefs among them went forth (saying): "Go, adhere firmly to your gods. This is certainly a plot devised against us.

7.MunirMezyed2023: (Actually) we never heard of this in the former religion. Verily this is no more than fabrication.

8.MunirMezyed2023: What! Has the Scripture been revealed to him out of us all? Nay! But they harbour doubts about My Scripture. Nay! but they haven't tasted yet My punishment!

9.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have the treasures of Mercy of your Lord, the Almighty, the Great Benefactor (God)?

10.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and whatsoever is between them? If so, let them then ascend by means.

11.MunirMezyed2023: (They are sinful) soldiers who are bound to be defeated like the confederates (of the old times).

12.MunirMezyed2023: Before them, the people of Noah were inclined to deny the Truth, and (so did those of) ‘Ād and Pharaoh, the lord of spikes,

13.MunirMezyed2023: And (the tribe of) Thamūd, the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. These were the (sinful) confederates.

14.MunirMezyed2023: Not one of them but denied the Truth. So My retribution was  justified.

15.MunirMezyed2023: These await aught but a single Cry for which there will be no delay.

16.MunirMezyed2023: They say: “Our Lord, hasten to us our share (of the punishment) before the Day of Reckoning.”

17.MunirMezyed2023: Bear patiently whatever they say and remember Our servant, David, the man of fortitude.  He constantly sought forgiveness from Allâh.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Surely We subjected the mountains to join him in celebrating the praise of Allâh and declaring His glory at nightfall and sunrise

19.MunirMezyed2023: The birds assembled around him and joined in singing with him.

20.MunirMezyed2023: We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and decisive aphorism.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Has the story of the litigants reached you, when they scaled the sanctuary?

22.MunirMezyed2023: When they entered upon David, and he was terrified at their presence. And they said: "You don't need to fear. We are only two litigants, one of us has been unfair to the other. So judge fairly between us and don't transgress and guide us to the right path.

23.MunirMezyed2023: “Well, this is my brother. He has ninety-nine ewes, and I have only one ewe. He asked me to entrust it to him. So  he convinced me with his speech.”

24.MunirMezyed2023: (David) said: “He has certainly been unfair to you in demanding your ewe in addition to his ewes. Surely many partners transgress against each other except those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts-- and how few they are!” And David presumed that We had tried him, so he sought forgiveness of his Lord, fell down in prostration, and turned to Him in repentance.

25.MunirMezyed2023: So We forgave him that. Indeed, he has a near place in Our Presence and an exquisite abode.

26.MunirMezyed2023: O’ David, indeed, We have appointed you a vicegerent on the earth. Now, therefore, judge fairly between the people and don't yield to your own whims lest you deviate from the path of Allâh. Most surely, those who deviate from the Path of Allah will be subjected to a severe punishment because they forget the Day of Reckoning.

27.MunirMezyed2023: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them in vain. That is the speculation of those who have no tendency to live by Faith. So woe betide those who have no tendency to live by Faith.

28.MunirMezyed2023: Or shall We treat those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts as those who spread corruption on the earth? Or shall We treat the Pious as the debauchee?

29.MunirMezyed2023: It is a Blessed Book that We have revealed to you so that they may contemplate Its Verses, and those who are highly intelligent people may take close heed.

30.MunirMezyed2023: To David We gave Solomon. How excellent servant he was! He was always returning to Allâh.

31.MunirMezyed2023: When there were displayed before him amazing galloping horses at eventide,

32.MunirMezyed2023: He then said: “Indeed, I opted the love of good things over celebrating the praise of my Lord, until the sun has disappeared behind a veil.”

33.MunirMezyed2023: (He Said): “Bring them back to me." Then he began to cut off their legs and necks.

34.MunirMezyed2023: And We certainly tried Solomon and cast upon his throne a mere body. So he (rushed and) turned to Us in repentance.

35.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as may not belong to any other after me: Indeed, You are the Greatest Benefactor."

36.MunirMezyed2023: Then We made the wind subservient to him. It blew gently to his command wherever he willed,

37.MunirMezyed2023: And also the devils, every builder and diver,

38.MunirMezyed2023: And also others bound together in chains.

39.MunirMezyed2023: (We said): “This is Our free gift so you may give generously, or withhold, without reckoning.”

40.MunirMezyed2023: Surely he has a place near Our presence and an exquisite abode.

41.MunirMezyed2023: And commemorate also Our Servant Job, when he called upon his Lord, “Surely Satan has afflicted me with distress and suffering."

42.MunirMezyed2023: (We inspired him): ”Strike the ground with your foot. Here is a cool water for you to bathe and to drink.”

43.MunirMezyed2023: And We gave him back his family and therewith the likes thereof a Mercy from Us, and a remembrance for those who have high intelligence and great illumination.

44.MunirMezyed2023: Take in your hand a bunch of basil leaves and strike therewith (your wife), so that you may not break your oath. Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Surely he was one who constantly sought Forgiveness of Allâh.

45.MunirMezyed2023: And commemorate Our servants Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, men of strength and prudence!

46.MunirMezyed2023: Verily We purified them with a pure thought, (instilling in their hearts) the remembrance of the Home (of the Hereafter).

47.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, they are, in Our sight, among the chosen ones and men of integrity!

48.MunirMezyed2023: And commemorate Ishmael, Elisha and Dhu'l-Kifl. Each of them was among the men of integrity.

49.MunirMezyed2023: This is a Scripture, and most surely the Pious will have the best place of return:

50.MunirMezyed2023: Gardens of Eden, whereof the doors are opened for them,

51.MunirMezyed2023: Reclining therein, calling for plenteous fruit and drink.

52.MunirMezyed2023: And with them maidens restraining their glances of equal age.

53.MunirMezyed2023: This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning.

54.MunirMezyed2023: And most surely this is Our sustenance which is inexhaustible.

55.MunirMezyed2023: This (is for the Pious).  And most surely the evil place of return is for the transgressors.

56.MunirMezyed2023: Gehenna, wherein they will burn. Evil indeed is the cradle.

57.MunirMezyed2023: This (shall be so). So let them taste its boiling fluid and purulence.

58.MunirMezyed2023: And other anguishes of similar kind, all together!

59.MunirMezyed2023: (The Denizens of Hell will be told): “This is a troop bursting in with you. No word of greeting for them! Verily, they will burn in the Fire.”

60.MunirMezyed2023: They shall say: “In fact, it is you who should be blamed. It was you who led us into this dreadful abode.”

61.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: "Our Lord, whoever led us into this, give him double the punishment of the Fire!"

62.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: "What is wrong with us? We don’t see men whom we used to count among the wicked people?

63.MunirMezyed2023: Have we treated them (wrongly) with abuse and scorn? or have we not set our sights on them?

64.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly this is an invariable truth that Denizens of Hell will be quarreling (with each other) .

65.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "I am only a (true) Messenger (of Allâh) to give sufficient warning (about how to avoid Hellfire), and to affirm  that there is no other god beside  Allâh, the  One true God, the Omnipotent,

66.MunirMezyed2023: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, the Almighty, the Oft-Forgiving."

67.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "It is the most severe news

68.MunirMezyed2023: From which you are turning aside.

69.MunirMezyed2023: I had no knowledge of the Exalted Assembly (of Angels) when they exchange views on (certain matters) among themselves.

70.MunirMezyed2023: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a true Messenger (of  Allâh) to give sufficient warning (about how to avoid Hellfire)

71.MunirMezyed2023: And (mention) when your Lord said to the Angels: "Verily, I am going to create a mortal from wet clay.

72.MunirMezyed2023: When I have fashioned him and breathed into him of My Spirit, then fall down to him in prostration."

73.MunirMezyed2023: So the Angels prostrated, all of them together

74.MunirMezyed2023: Except ‘Iblīs -(Satan)- who showed an arrogant attitude. There he proved himself to be a fierce enemy of Man.

75.MunirMezyed2023: (Allâh) said: "O’ ‘Iblīs, what prevented you from prostrating before what I have created with My Own Hands? Are you arrogant? Or are you of the exalted ones?

76.MunirMezyed2023: ‘Iblīs said: "I am far better than him. You created me from Fire, whereas You created him from wet clay."

77.MunirMezyed2023: (He) said: "Then get out of here, for verily, you are accursed, outcast.

78.MunirMezyed2023: And verily, My curse will abide in you until the Day of Judgment."

79.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they will be raised."

80.MunirMezyed2023: (The Lord) said: “Surely, you are of those who are given respite

81.MunirMezyed2023: Until the day of the known time."

82.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "Then, by Your might, I will certainly seduce them all

83.MunirMezyed2023: Except Your faithful servants among them.”

84.MunirMezyed2023: He said: " So the Truth is- and the Truth I speak:

85.MunirMezyed2023: I shall certainly fill Gehenna with you and with everyone who yields to your temptation among them.”

86.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “I don’t ask you for any reward for (my preaching), neither am I one of the pretentious.

87.MunirMezyed2023: This Qur’ān is only a Scripture for all the beings.

88.MunirMezyed2023: And most surely you will come to know  the Truth of it after a while."

1.MunirMezyed2023: The Revelation in Knowledge of this Book is from Allâh, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.

2.MunirMezyed2023: Surely it is We Who have revealed the Book to you in all truth. Now, therefore, worship Allâh (in the way He wants us to worship Him).

3.MunirMezyed2023: Is it not to Allâh that pure devotion must be due? Those who choose guardians besides Him (say): “We worship these idols for no reason other than that they would bring us nearer to Allâh”. Verily, Allâh will judge between them concerning all matters on which they differ. Surely Allâh holds back the light of His inspiration from anyone who attributes falsehood to Him and has no tendency to live by Faith.

4.MunirMezyed2023: And had Allâh intended to take a son, He would have chosen whom He willed out of those whom He created. All Glory Be To Him! He is Allâh, the One true God and the Omnipotent.

5.MunirMezyed2023: He created the heavens and earth for a genuine reason. He causes the night to enfold completely the day, and causes the day to enfold completely the night. He has made the sun and the moon subservient, each of them running for an appointed term. He is truly the Almighty, the Oft-Forgiving.

6.MunirMezyed2023: He created you from a single Human person, then from (him) He made his mate. He sent down for you eight pairs of cattle. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, in threefold darkness. This is Allâh, your Lord. To him belongs the Sovereignty. There is no other god beside Him. How, then, can you diverge (from the truth)?

7.MunirMezyed2023: If you refuse to yield to the Truth, then (you’ll need know that) Allâh is most certainly Self-sufficient above all need of you. And He is not pleased with the persistent and purposeful denial of the Truth from His servants. And if it happens that you show gratitude, He will be pleased with it from you. No bearer of a burden will bear the burden of another. To your Lord will you then be returned, and He will inform you of whatever you used to do. Most certainly He has full knowledge of what is stored up in the hearts.

8.MunirMezyed2023: And When misfortune touches a man, he supplicates to his Lord and turns to Him in repentance . Then, when He bestows on him a boon from Him, he forgets that for which he had just supplicated and sets up rivals to Allâh so as to deceive others into going away from His path. Say: “Enjoy your self for a while in  your persistent and purposeful denial of the Truth. Most surely you are of the Denizens of Hell.

9.MunirMezyed2023: Or, is he who devoutly worships (Allâh) during the hours of the night, prostrating (himself) and standing (in prayer), taking heed of the Hereafter, and putting his hope in the Mercy of his Lord (equal to one who is spiritually blind)? Say: "Are those who pursue spiritual knowledge equal to those who lack the knowledge and awareness?" Only those who are highly intelligent  people will take heed.

10.MunirMezyed2023: (Declare what Allâh says): "O' servants of Mine who live by Faith! Act piously towards your Lord! For those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith in this worldly life, there is a goodly reward. And (remember that) the land of Allâh is vast enough (to emigrate if you are wrongly treated because of your faith). Verily, those who cling to patience will be given their reward in full without any measure.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “I’m commanded to worship Allâh alone.

12.MunirMezyed2023: And I am commanded (also) to be the first of those who wholly submit (themselves to the authority of Allâh ).”

13.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “I fear, if I refuse to yield to the authority of my Lord, the penalty of a great day.”

14.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “I do worship Allâh (in the way He wants us to worship Him). .

15.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, worship (& venerate) whatever you desire beside Him! Say: "Most surely the (greatest) losers are the ones who will lose their own selves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Emphatically, that is the tremendous loss.”

16.MunirMezyed2023: They shall have layers of Fire above and beneath them. This is how the servants of Allâh are intimidated by Him. O’ My servants! Now, therefore, act piously.

17.MunirMezyed2023: And as for those who completely avoid the worship of the fabled gods and turn to Allâh in repentance, they will receive the glad tidings (of salvation). Now, therefore, announce the glad tidings to My servants,

18.MunirMezyed2023: Who listen attentively to what is said and adhere to the best if it. It is these whom Allâh has graced with enlightenment. It is these that are endowed with high intelligence and great illumination.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Can he, then, against whom the sentence of retribution has become due, be given guidance? Can you save one who is already in the Fire?

20.MunirMezyed2023: But as for those who live before the Face of their Lord, they will be in lofty mansions built one above the other, beneath which rivers flow. (This is) the Promise of Allâh (to them).  Allâh will never fail in His Promise.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen how Allâh sends down water from the sky and makes it to penetrate the earth to emerge as flowing springs? Then He brings forth with it plants of different colors, then they shrivel and so you could see them turning yellow, then He makes them chaff. Most surely in this, there is an admonition for those who are endowed with high intelligence and great illumination.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Is one whose heart Allâh has expanded to embrace Islam and so he follows a light from his Lord (like the one who is spiritually blind)? Woe, then, betide those whose hearts are hardened against celebrating the Praise of Allâh! They are in utter deception!

23.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh has sent down the finest rhetoric in the form of a Book, harmonious in its oft-repeated. It makes the skin of those who show honor and proper reverence for Allâh to crawl, and then it softens their skins and hearts by celebrating the Praise of Allâh and declaring His  glory.  Such is the inspiration of Allâh by which He inspires whomever He wills of His servants to yield to (the truth), but the one whom He allows to fall away from the Faith has no one to lead him to the Truth.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Is, then, who shields himself with his face against the evil of the torment of the Day of Resurrection (like one who is admitted into Al- Jannah)? It will be said to those who abandoned Faith in favour of their own whims "Taste now (the dire consequence of) what you used to earn."

25.MunirMezyed2023: Those who were before them were inclined to deny (their Messengers), and so the punishment unexpectedly struck them while you are totally heedless (of its arrival).

26.MunirMezyed2023: So Allâh made them to taste the (flavor of) ignominy in this worldly life, but the punishment of the Hereafter is far greater- if they only know!

27.MunirMezyed2023: We have set forth every kind of similitude in this Qur’ān for the people so that they may receive admonition (& yield to the Truth).

28.MunirMezyed2023: (It is) an Arabic Qur’ān without fault so that they may act piously.

29.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh sets forth a similitude: There is a slave in whom are many partners at variance with each other, and there is another slave belonging exclusively to one man - are they equal in comparison? Al praise is due to Allâh! Nay, but most of them lack of the Knowledge.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely you are destined to die, and most surely, they, too, are destined to die:

31.MunirMezyed2023: Then indeed, on the Day of Resurrection, you will all, dispute concerning your differences before your Lord .

32.MunirMezyed2023: Who then does greater evil than one who attributes falsehood to Allâh and denies the Truth after it has reached him (through the Messenger)? Is it not Gehenna a suitable abode for those who have no tendency to live by Faith?

33.MunirMezyed2023: And he who brings the Truth and he who affirms it - such are the Pious.

34.MunirMezyed2023: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith:

35.MunirMezyed2023: So that Allâh may acquit them of the worst of what they did and give them their reward for the best of what they used to do.

36.MunirMezyed2023: Is not Allâh Sufficient for His servant? They seek to frighten you with their idols they set up beside Him! Whomever Allâh allows to fall away from the Truth, there is no one that can lead him to the Truth.

37.MunirMezyed2023: And the one whom Allâh inspires him to yield to the truth, there is no one that can deceive him into going away from the truth. Is not Allâh Almighty, the Lord of Retribution?

38.MunirMezyed2023: And if it happens that you ask them: "Who created the heavens and the earth.  They will surely reply: "Allâh". Say: "Why then do you call upon (these idols) instead of Allâh? If Allâh intended any adversity for me, could they relieve such an adversity? If He intended to show me some Mercy, could they withhold His Mercy?" Say: “Allâh is Sufficient for me. In Him, let those who trust put their trust.”

39.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “O’ my people! Act according to your position. Verily I am acting, and soon you will know

40.MunirMezyed2023: To whom will come a punishment that will humiliate him, and on whom the everlasting punishment will descend.”

41.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We have sent down to you the Book for mankind in truth. So whosoever walks on the path of the Truth, it is only for his own benefit . And whosoever deviates form the path of truth, it is only for his own loss. And you are not a guardian over them to take full responsibility for their affairs.

42.MunirMezyed2023: It is Allâh Who gathers the souls (of the human beings) at the time of their death, and those which have not died yet during their sleep. Then He withholds those (souls) for which He has ordained death and releases the rest till an appointed term. Surely, in this, there are Signs (of Allâh’s power & glory) for people who persist in meditation.

43.MunirMezyed2023: Or, have they taken others as intercessors instead of Allâh? Say: "What! Even though they possess no power over anything, nor do they have the ability to perceive and understand.

44.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "To Allâh belongs all intercession. His is the Absolute Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be brought back.”

45.MunirMezyed2023: And When Allâh alone is mentioned, the hearts of those who don’t believe in the Hereafter are filled with revulsion. But when others beside Him are mentioned, they restore their joy.

46.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "O’ Allâh, the Originator of the heavens and the earth who has the full knowledge of the unseen and the visible. It is You will Who judge between Your servants regarding all matters on which they were inclined to differ."

47.MunirMezyed2023: On the Day of Resurrection, if those who abandoned Faith in favour of had possessed all that is in earth, even twice as much, they would have hoped to offer it as redemption from the woeful torment when Allâh would bring to light that which they had never reckoned.

48.MunirMezyed2023: There will appear to them (clearly) the evil deeds of what they earned, and they will be encompassed by that which they used to mock.

49.MunirMezyed2023: So when a misfortune touches the man, he calls on Us. But, once We bestow a grace upon him, he says: “I have achieved this because of the knowledge (that I possess).” Nay, it is only a temptation, but most of them are suffering from a lack of vision.

50.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, Those who were before them said the same things, but what they used to earn did not profit them.

51.MunirMezyed2023: So all the evil deeds that they had earned struck them. And those  the who abandoned Faith in favour of their own whims among them will be struck by all the evil deeds of what they have ever earned. And they will never be able to elude (the punishment).

52.MunirMezyed2023: Do they not see that Allâh spreads out and straitens sustenance to whomever He wills?  Surely in this, there are Signs (of Allâh’s power &glory) for a people who live a life of Genuine Faith.

53.MunirMezyed2023: O’ my servants who have acted extravagantly against their own selves! Don’t despair of the Mercy of Allâh. Most certainly Allâh will be Merciful toward all the iniquities. Most certainly He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

54.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, turn in repentance to your Lord and  wholly submit (to His Authority) before the punishment comes on you, then you will not be helped.

55.MunirMezyed2023: And yield to the best of that which is sent down to you from your Lord before the punishment unexpectedly comes on you while you are totally heedless of (its arrival ).

56.MunirMezyed2023: Lest any person should say: "Woe betide me! I have failed to fulfill my duties to Allâh! Surely I was among those who mock at (the Revelation in knowledge of Allâh).”

57.MunirMezyed2023: Or, lest he should say: "If I had yielded to the Full Knowledge of the Truth which Allâh has already given to His servants, I would certainly have been among the Pious.

58.MunirMezyed2023: Or, lest when he sees the punishment should say: “If only I had another chance, I would certainly be among those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

59.MunirMezyed2023: Aye! My Signs (which demonstrate My power & glory) were shown to you, but you refused to admit the truth of them and displayed an arrogant attitude (towards the Authority of Allâh), simply because you were of those who have no tendency to live by Faith.

60.MunirMezyed2023: And on the Day of Resurrection, you will see those who attributed falsehood to Allâh, their faces blackened. Is there not in Gehenna an abode for those who display an arrogant attitude (towards the Authority of Allâh).

61.MunirMezyed2023: And Allâh will save those who acted piously (and guarded themselves against falling into deception) because of their achievements. No evil shall touch them, nor shall they ever grieve.

62.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh is the Creator of all things and He is Guardian over all things.

63.MunirMezyed2023: His are the keys of (the treasures of) the heavens and the earth.  As for those who refuse to yield to the Revelation in the Knowledge of Allâh, they are the ones who are doomed to face perdition.

64.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “O’ ye who lack the knowledge (of Allâh)!  Is it other than Allâh that you command me to worship'?"

65.MunirMezyed2023: And certainly it has been revealed to you, just as it was revealed to those who were before you, that if you associate partners with Allâh, then all all your good deeds will be nullified and you will surely be among those who are doomed to face perdition.

66.MunirMezyed2023: Nay! But worship Allâh (in the way He wants us to worship Him), and be among those who show show sincere gratitude (to Him).

67.MunirMezyed2023: And they have not venerated Allâh in accordance with what is appropriate for Him. The whole earth will be in His grip on the Day of Resurrection, and heavens will all be rolled up in His right Hand! All Glory Be To Him! Highly Exalted is He above whatever they associate (with Him).

68.MunirMezyed2023: And the will be blown on the Day of Resurrection,  and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is in the earth will fall dead, except whom Allâh wills.  Then it will be blown again, behold, they will be standing and looking on!.

69.MunirMezyed2023: And the earth will shine bright with the Light of its Lord. The Book (of Deeds) will be laid down. The Prophets and the witnesses are brought forward. And judgement will be made between them with absolute fairness, and they will not be wronged.

70.MunirMezyed2023: Each human person will be paid in full according to what has has done, for He has the full knowledge of whatever they do.

71.MunirMezyed2023: Those who willfully refuse to yield to the Truth will be driven to Gehenna in troops, till, when they reach it, its gates thereof will be opened. And Its keepers will say to them: “Did not there come to you Messengers from among you, reciting to you the Verses of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this day of yours?" They will say: “Yea, but the Word of the punishment has been proven true against those who have no tendency to live by Faith."

72.MunirMezyed2023: It will be said (to them): "Enter the gates of Gehenna and dwell therein forever”- Evil is the abode of those who used to display an arrogant attitude (towards the Authority of Allâh).

73.MunirMezyed2023: But those who used to act piously towards their Lord will be driven to Al-Jannah, in troops, till, when they reach it, its gates thereof will be opened. And Its keepers will say to them: ”Peace be upon you. You lived a pure life, so enter and dwell therein forever.”

74.MunirMezyed2023: And they will say: “All praise is due to Allâh, Who has fulfilled His Promise to us and has made us inherit the land of Al- Jannah so we can dwell in it wherever we desire. How marvelous is the reward of the Pious workers!

75.MunirMezyed2023: And You will see the Angels surrounding the Throne (of Allâh) from all round, glorifying the praise of their Lord.  And judgement will be made between them with absolute fairness , and it will be said: “All praise is due to Allâh, the Lord of all being!"

1.MunirMezyed2023: Haa. Me’im.

2.MunirMezyed2023: The Revelation Knowledge of this book- (Qur’ān)- is from Allâh, the Almighty, the All-Knowing,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Who is Merciful toward the iniquities, and accepts repentance, whose punishment is stern and bounty limitless. There is no other god beside Him. To Him is the journeying.

4.MunirMezyed2023: No one will (venture to) dispute over the Qur'ānic Verses except for those who willfully refuse to yield to the Truth. Now, therefore, do not let their successful movement throughout the land delude you.

5.MunirMezyed2023: The people of Noah and the confederates after them denied (their Messengers) before them -(the Pagan Arabs). And every nation purposed to persecute their Messenger and disputed by all means of falsehood to rebut therewith the Truth. So I seized them- How dreadful was My requital!

6.MunirMezyed2023: And so the decree of your Lord has been proven true against those who willfully refuse to yield to the Truth: That truly they are the Denizens of Hell.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Those (Angels) who bear the (Glorious) Throne (of their Lord) and all those around it celebrate the praise of their Lord, affirming their Faith in Him, asking forgiveness for those who live by Faith, (saying), “Our Lord! You encompass all things in Mercy and knowledge. Forgive those who repent and follow Your path. (Let the omnipotence of Your Mercy) shield them from the punishment of Hellfire.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Admit them, Our Lord, to the Gardens of Eden which You have promised them, along with the righteous among their fathers, spouses, and offspring.  Most certainly, You are the Almighty, the All-Wise.

9.MunirMezyed2023: And (Let the omnipotence of Your Mercy) shield them from evil deeds. Whomever You shield from the evil deeds this day will surely earn Your Mercy. This is most ultimate success and the supreme one.”

10.MunirMezyed2023: Those who willfully refuse to yield to the Truth will be told (after they are thrown in hell): “Certainly, Allâh’s passionate hatred of you when you were invited to come to Faith (in the worldly life) and you refused to yield to the Truth is much greater than your own hatred of yourselves (today).”

11.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: “Our Lord, You have caused us to die twice. And You have given us life twice. So we confess our iniquitous deeds. Is there then any way out of this?”

12.MunirMezyed2023: (They will be told): “This is (your plight) because whenever Allâh Alone was called upon, you refused to yield to the Truth.. But if others were associated with Him, you would affirm it as true. So the verdict belongs to Allâh, the Most High, the Most Great."

13.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who shows you His Signs (of power & glory) and sends down for you livelihood from the heavens. No one takes close heed except for the one who turns to Allâh in repentance.

14.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, worship Allâh in the way He wants us to worship Him. No matter how detestable is to those who have no tendency to live by Faith.

15.MunirMezyed2023: (Allâh is the) Possessor of the highest ranks, Lord of the (Glorious) Throne. He places the inspiration of His Command upon whom He wills of His servants to warn (them) of the day of meeting (Him).

16.MunirMezyed2023: The day when they appear before Allâh, nothing about them will be hidden from Allâh concerning them. To Whom belongs the (absolute) sovereignty of this day? To  Allâh, the One True God, the Omnipotent!

17.MunirMezyed2023: On that day, every human person will be remunerated (fairly) for what he earned. There will be no injustice on that day. Most certainly Allâh is extremely Swift in taking account..

18.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, warn them against an imminent day when the hearts will rise up to the throats, grieving inwardly. As for those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims, they will have neither an intimate friend, nor an intercessor whose intercession might be accepted (by the Lord).

19.MunirMezyed2023: He already knows perfectly well what beguiles the eyes and what is stored up in the hearts.

20.MunirMezyed2023: And Allâh judges with the Truth, whereas those to whom they cry besides Him cannot judge aught. Most certainly, Allâh is the All-Hearer, the All-Seer.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Have they -(the Pagan Arabs)- not travelled through the land and seen what was the dreadful fate of those who were before them? They were more powerful than them in strength and in leaving behind their traces on earth. But Allâh destroyed them for their iniquitous deeds. They had none to defend them or to save them from the retribution of Allâh.

22.MunirMezyed2023: That was because there came to them their Messengers with Irrefutable Signs, but they persistently refused to yield to the Truth. So Allâh seized them. Most certainly, He is All-Strong and Severe in punishment.

23.MunirMezyed2023: Surely We sent Moses with Our Sings and decisive argument

24.MunirMezyed2023: To Pharaoh, Hāmān and Korah, but they said: ”A lying sorcerer!”

25.MunirMezyed2023: Then, when he brought to them the Truth from Us, they said: “Kill the sons of those who adhere to Monotheism, and spare their women." But the guile of those who persistently refuse to  yield to the Truth ended in naught but deception.

26.MunirMezyed2023: Pharaoh said: "Allow me to kill Moses, and let him call upon his Lord. I truly fear that he may change your traditions or cause corruption to appear throughout the land."

27.MunirMezyed2023: Moses said: "Most surely I seek earnestly refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant who has no faith in the Day of Judgment.”

28.MunirMezyed2023: A monotheistic believer from the clan of Pharaoh who hid his faith said: "Do you kill a man just because he says Allâh is my Lord? He has come to you with Irrefutable Signs from your Lord. However, if it happens that he is a liar, upon him will be his lie, and if he is truthful, there will befall you some of that which he threatens you with. Most surely Allâh holds back the light of His inspiration from the one who is a prodigal and liar.

29.MunirMezyed2023: O’ my people, today the sovereignty is yours,  and you are supreme in the land. But who could protect us from the retribution of Allâh if it came to us?” Pharaoh said: "'I only let you see what I see; and I only lead you to the path of rectitude.

30.MunirMezyed2023: The monotheistic believer said: "O’ my people, indeed, I truly fear for you (a dreadful) day like that one of the Confederates.

31.MunirMezyed2023: (A calamity) like that of the people of Noah, ‘Ād, Thamūd, and those who came after them. And Allâh would never intend to be unfair to His Servants.

32.MunirMezyed2023: O’ my people, I truly fear for you the day of calling out.

33.MunirMezyed2023: The day when you will turn your backs and flee, having no protector from the (the tribulation) of Allâh. And whomever Allâh allows to fall away from the Truth has no one to lead him to the Truth.”

34.MunirMezyed2023: Verily Joseph came to you before with Irrefutable Signs, but you continued to harbour doubts about what he brought to you. Then, when he died, you said: "Allâh will not send any Messenger after him." This is how Allâh lets the one who is skeptical prodigal live in deception.

35.MunirMezyed2023: Those who dispute over the Signs of Allâh without a genuine reason: This act is greatly detestable in the sight of Allâh, as well as  in the sight of those who adhere to absolute monotheism. This is how Allâh allows the one who is a prodigal and Spiritually blind to fall away from the Truth.

36.MunirMezyed2023: And Pharaoh said: "O’ Hāmān, construct for me a high tower  that  I can reach the pathways,

37.MunirMezyed2023: Pathways to heavens so that I can climb up to the Lord of Moses. I definitely think that Moses is lying." The evil deeds of Pharaoh was made appealing to him and so he was barred from the right path. And the guile of Pharaoh is no more than perdition.

38.MunirMezyed2023: The monotheistic believer said: “O’ my people, follow me! I only lead you to the path of rectitude.

39.MunirMezyed2023: O’ my people, indeed, this worldly life is no more than provisions of illusion, whereas the Hereafter is truly the eternal home.

40.MunirMezyed2023: And whoever does one evil deed will be requited only with the like of it. And whoever lives by Faith and strives to do righteous work- whether male or female- those are the ones who will be admitted into Al-Jannah wherein they will receive their sustenance without any measure.

41.MunirMezyed2023: O’ my people, how is it possible that I invite you to salvation and you are inviting me to Hellfire?

42.MunirMezyed2023: You invite me to abandon my Faith in Allâh and to associate with Him that of which I have no knowledge, whereas I am calling you to (affirm your Faith in) the One who is absolutely the Almighty and the Oft-Forgiving!

43.MunirMezyed2023: Unquestionably, what you invite me to do has no basis in this worldly life; neither in the Hereafter. Most surely our return will be to Allâh. Most surely the prodigals will be the Denizens of Hell.

44.MunirMezyed2023: Someday you will remember what I say to you. I confide my issue to Allâh. Most certainly Allâh is Well Aware of all His servants."

45.MunirMezyed2023: So Allâh saved him from the evil consequences of what they conspired, and the people of Pharaoh were encompassed by the worst punishment:

46.MunirMezyed2023: They are exposed to Fire (in their graves) morning and evening. And on the day when the Hour comes to pass, (the Angels will be commanded) to let the clan of Pharaoh enter the most severe punishment.

47.MunirMezyed2023: And (Mention) when they will quarrel in the Fire, the weak ones will say to those who used to act arrogantly and rudely: “Surely we yielded to your whims. Will you then avert from us a portion of the Fire?"

48.MunirMezyed2023: The ones who used to act arrogantly and rudely will say: “We are all in it. Verily Allâh has already judged between the servants!"

49.MunirMezyed2023: And those in the Fire will say to the guards of Gehenna: "Call upon your Lord to lighten for us the chastisement for a day."

50.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: “Did there not come to you your Messengers with the Irrefutable Signs?”. They will say: "Yea." The guards will then say: "You may supplicate (as much as you can), but the supplication of those who were Spiritually blind will be (totally) in vain (today)."

51.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We will grant victory to Our Messengers and to those who adhere to the Absolute Monotheism in this worldly life, and on the day when the witnesses will stand forth-

52.MunirMezyed2023: The day when their excuses will not avail those who indulge in iniquitous deeds.. But they will only have the Curse and the home of anguish.

53.MunirMezyed2023: And verily  We gave Moses the Revelation in Knowledge of Allâh. And We let the Children of Israel inherit the Scripture

54.MunirMezyed2023: As a True Source of enlightenment and a Spiritual Quotes for those who possess high intelligence and great illumination.

55.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, cling to patience: the promise of Allâh is definitely true: Ask Forgiveness for your fault and celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare His glory in the evenings and in the early mornings.

56.MunirMezyed2023: Those who dispute over the Signs of Allâh without a genuine reason, there is nothing else in their hearts but greed for dominance, which they will never be able to achieve. Now, therefore, seek refuge in Allâh. Most certainly He is the One Who is the All- Hearer, the All-Seer.

57.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, the creation of the heavens and the earth is greater than the creation of human beings. But most people do lack the knowledge (of this truth).

58.MunirMezyed2023: Not equal are the (spiritually) blind person and the enlightened one, neither are those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous deeds (equal with) the evil-doer. You take little heed.

59.MunirMezyed2023: The Hour is definitely coming, there is no doubt about it. But most of the people are Spiritually blind.

60.MunirMezyed2023: Your Lord says: "Pray to Me and I will answer your (prayer): but those who are too arrogant to worship Me will surely enter Gehenna, fully humbled.”

61.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh is the One Who has made for you the night to rest in it, and the day, to see. Most certainly Allâh is Benevolent towards the people. But most of the people are ungrateful.

62.MunirMezyed2023: This is Allâh, your Lord, the Creator of all things. There is no other god beside Him. So how can they be (easily) deceived into going away from the Truth?

63.MunirMezyed2023: This is how those who persistently refused to yield to the Signs of Allâh were deceived (into going away from the Truth).

64.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh is the One Who has made for you the earth a dwelling place and the heavens a structure. He fashioned you in the best form, providing you with pure and wholesome things. This is Allâh, your Lord.So Blessed Is Allâh, the Lord of all beings.

65.MunirMezyed2023: He is the Ever Living One. There is no other god beside Him. Now, therefore,  call upon Him and worship Him in the way He wants us to worship Him. All  praise  is due to Allâh, the Lord of all the beings.

66.MunirMezyed2023: Say, "I have been forbidden to worship those whom you invoke besides Allâh after having received the Irrefutable Signs from my Lord. And I am commanded to submit my whole self to the Lord of all beings.

67.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who created you from dust, then from a semen-drop, then from a clinging substance; then He brings you forth as a child: then He lets you grow and reach maturity; then lets you become old,- though some among you die before - and lets you reach a predetermined age in order that you may achieve a higher level of consciousness.

68.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who gives life and causes death. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.

69.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen those who dispute over the Signs of Allâh? How are they turned away from Truth?!

70.MunirMezyed2023: Those who deny the Book -(the Qur’ān)- and that with which We have sent Our Messengers will come to know (the dire consequences of their persistent and purposeful denial of the Truth).

71.MunirMezyed2023: When the shackles and chains will be placed around their necks and be dragged

72.MunirMezyed2023: Into the scalding water, and then they will be burnt in the Fire.

73.MunirMezyed2023: Then it will be said to them: "Where are (the deities) which you used to associate

74.MunirMezyed2023: With Allâh?" They will say: “They have vanished away from us. Actually, we used to worship (& venerate) nothing.” This is how Allâh lets those who have no tendency to live by Faith be deceived (into going away from the Truth).

75.MunirMezyed2023: That was because you used to take delight on earth in things other than the Truth, and that you were inclined to act rudely.

76.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, enter the gates of Gehenna and dwell therein forever. How dreadful is the abode of those who used to display an arrogant attitude (towards the Authority of Allâh).

77.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, cling to patience: the promise of Allâh is definitely true: Whether We may allow you to see part of what We threaten them with, or We may cause you to die (before that) , still, to Us shall they be returned.

78.MunirMezyed2023: And  most surely We have sent Messengers before you. Of them are those whom We have mentioned to you, and of them are those whom We have not mentioned to you. It is not possible for a Messenger to be able to produce any revelation knowledge without the Will of Allâh. And when the command of Allâh comes, the matter will be decided with truth. And there where the promoters of falsehood are doomed to face perdition.

79.MunirMezyed2023: It is Allâh Who appointed for you the cattle so that you may ride some and eat others.

80.MunirMezyed2023: And there are other benefits for you in them, and that by them you may satisfy any need that is in your hearts. And on them and on ships you are carried.

81.MunirMezyed2023: He shows you His Signs (of power & glory). Then, which of the Sings of your Lord do you seek to rebut?

82.MunirMezyed2023: Have they - (the Pagan Arabs)- not travelled through the land to see  the (dreadful) fate of those who were before them? They were more powerful than them in strength, and in leaving behind their traces on earth, yet all that which they used to earn did not avail them .

83.MunirMezyed2023: Then, when their Messengers brought the Irrefutable Signs to them, they chose to take delight in whatever worldly knowledge they had. Thus, they were encompassed by what they used to mock.

84.MunirMezyed2023: Then, when they saw Our punishment, they said: “We now affirm our Faith in Allâh and renounce what we used to associate with Him."

85.MunirMezyed2023: But their Faith was of no avail to them when they saw Our punishment. This is the (divine) law of Allâh, which has been established to deal with His servants. And it is thence that those who had no tendency to live by Faith will be doomed to perdition.

41.SurahEnglishNames: Explained in Detail, Revelations Well Expounded

1.MunirMezyed2023: Haa. Me’im.

2.MunirMezyed2023: (This Qur’ān is) the Revelation in Knowledge of the True Merciful (God), the Most Merciful.

3.MunirMezyed2023: A Book whose Verses are fully elucidated- an Arabic Qur’ān for a people endowed with knowledge.

4.MunirMezyed2023: It contains glad tidings (of how to attain eternal salvation), and sufficient warning (about how to avoid Hellfire). Yet most of them walk away, and so they do not hear.

5.MunirMezyed2023: And they say: “Our hearts are under veils from that to which you invite us, and there is (also) deafness in our ears, and a barrier stands between ourselves and you. Subsequently, do what you intend to do and so will we."

6.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “I am only a human being like yourselves. It has been revealed to me that your god is One True God. Now, therefore, take the straight path to Him and seek His Forgiveness. Woe betide the Polytheists-

7.MunirMezyed2023: Who do not pay Zakāt and have no Faith in the Hereafter.
