14.MunirMezyed2023: The Companions of the Thicket and the people of Tubba. All of them had denied the Messengers (of Allâh). So My threat was justly fulfilled.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Were We then worn out by (the task of) the first creation? Nay, but they are deeply skeptical about a new creation.

16.MunirMezyed2023: And verily, We created man and We have full knowledge of what his Inner Self whispers into him. We are closer to him than his jugular vein.

17.MunirMezyed2023: When the two recording Angels receive, sitting on the right and on the left,

18.MunirMezyed2023: Not a single word does he utter but there is by him a keeper at hand.

19.MunirMezyed2023: The agony of death comes in truth. That is what you have been avoiding.

20.MunirMezyed2023: The trumpet will be blown. That will be the day of threatening.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Every human person will come forth along with a driver and a witness.

22.MunirMezyed2023: And most surely you were unaware of this. We have removed your veil, thus, your sight, this day, is sharp.

23.MunirMezyed2023: His Companion will say: "This is what I have made ready of his record."

24.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, cast into hell whoever is spiritually blind and stubborn:

25.MunirMezyed2023: Who has wasted his life on promoting evil, yielding to temptation, casting doubt on every certainty,

26.MunirMezyed2023: And setting up another god with Allâh. Now do cast him into the severe punishment!

27.MunirMezyed2023: His Companion will say: “Our Lord, I did not lead him into temptation but he was deceived into going far away from the Truth."

28.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh will say: “Do not quarrel in my presence since I gave you warning beforehand.

29.MunirMezyed2023: The Sentence that comes from Me cannot be changed, nor am I in the least unfair to the servants."

30.MunirMezyed2023: On that day will We say to Gehenna: "Are you filled?" It will ask: "Are there any more?"

31.MunirMezyed2023: And Al-Jannah will be brought near to the Pious, not far off.

32.MunirMezyed2023: This is what you were promised; it is for every one who turned to Allâh in repentance and kept (His Law),

33.MunirMezyed2023: Whoever showed honor and reverence for the True Merciful (God) in secret and came (to Him) with faithful heart.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Now enter Al- Jannah in Peace! This is the day of immortality.”

35.MunirMezyed2023: They will have therein whatever they desire, and We have even more than what is expected.

36.MunirMezyed2023: So many generations We destroyed before them- (the Pagan Arabs). They were more powerful than them. (When Our divine retribution came), they went about in the lands. Was there any place of escape?!

37.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, in this there is a lesson for the one who has (an active) heart, and who gives ear and pays close attention (to what has been revealed) .

38.MunirMezyed2023: And verily We created the heavens, the earth and whatsoever is between them in six days without being touched by fatigue.

39.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, bear with patience whatever they say, celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare His absolute majesty and glory before sunrise and sunset.

40.MunirMezyed2023: And during part of the night, celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare His absolute majesty and glory, and so likewise after the prescribed prostrations.

41.MunirMezyed2023: Now wait  for the day when the caller will call from a nearby place,

42.MunirMezyed2023: The day when they shall hear the (Inevitable) Blast in truth: that will be the Day of Resurrection.

43.MunirMezyed2023: Verily it is We Who give life and bring death; and to Us is the journey’s end.

44.MunirMezyed2023: The day on which the earth will split asunder under them, they will rush out of their graves: that will be a gathering together- quite easy for Us.

45.MunirMezyed2023: We have full knowledge of whatever they say. And you are not a tyrant over them. Now, Therefore, admonish him by means of the Qur’ān whoever pays close attention to My threat.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by those (winds) that circulate dust!

2.MunirMezyed2023: Then those (clouds) that carry the burden,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Then those (ships) that glide smoothly (upon the sea),

4.MunirMezyed2023: Then those (Angels who) distribute (blessings) by Our Command,

5.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, what you are promised is true,

6.MunirMezyed2023: And the Day of Judgment is definitely inevitable.

7.MunirMezyed2023: By the Heavens with its beauty and (numerous) pathways:

8.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, you have different views over (Muhammad & the Qur’ān).

9.MunirMezyed2023: He who is turned away from (the Qur’ān) is decreed to be turned away.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide those who create the illusion of the Truth,

11.MunirMezyed2023: Who are caught in the abyss of deception.

12.MunirMezyed2023: They ask: "When will be the Day of Judgment?"

13.MunirMezyed2023: (It will be) the day when they will be exposed to the Fire.

14.MunirMezyed2023: (It will be said unto them): “Taste your torment! This is what you used to ask to be hastened.”

15.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, those Pious servants will dwell in (Great) Gardens and water springs,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Receiving joy from whatever their Lord gives them. They were inclined to pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith aforetime.

17.MunirMezyed2023: They used to sleep but a little of the night,

18.MunirMezyed2023: And ask Forgiveness in the early morning,

19.MunirMezyed2023: And in their wealth, there was a due share for the beggar and the needy.

20.MunirMezyed2023: On the earth, there are Signs (of Allâh’s power & glory) for those who have absolute faith (in Allâh),

21.MunirMezyed2023: And also (Signs) in your own selves. Do you not see?

22.MunirMezyed2023: And in the Heavens, there is your provision, as also that which you are promised.

23.MunirMezyed2023: Therefore, by the Lord of the heavens and the earth: this is definitely the Truth, just as it is true that you speak.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Has the anecdote of the honorable guests of Abraham reached you?

25.MunirMezyed2023: And (Mention) when they came to him and said: "Peace". He said, "Peace to you, strangers!"

26.MunirMezyed2023: Then he went quietly to his household and brought a fat (roasted) calf.

27.MunirMezyed2023: He placed it before them. Then he said: "Will you not eat?"

28.MunirMezyed2023: He felt afraid of them. They said: “Do not be afraid", and then gave him the glad tidings of a son endowed with Spiritual Insight for Knowing (Allâh).

29.MunirMezyed2023: Then his wife came forward, wailing, slapping her face and saying: “A barren old woman!”

30.MunirMezyed2023: They said: “This is what your Lord has decreed. Most certainly, He is the All-Wise, the All-Knowing".

31.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "What is your mission, O' Messengers?"

32.MunirMezyed2023: They said: "We have been sent (by Allâh) to a group of Ungodly Sinners

33.MunirMezyed2023: To strike them with stones of baked clay,

34.MunirMezyed2023: Marked by your Lord for the Prodigals”.

35.MunirMezyed2023: So We brought forth those of them who Adhered to Monotheism.

36.MunirMezyed2023: But We did not find therein except for one house of those who wholly submitted (themselves to the Authority of Allâh).

37.MunirMezyed2023: And We left behind therein a portent for those who desire to be shield from the painful punishment.

38.MunirMezyed2023: In Moses (too, there is a lesson) when We sent him to Pharaoh with Conclusive Evidence.

39.MunirMezyed2023: But he turned away in arrogance and said: “He is either a magician or a lunatic."

40.MunirMezyed2023: So We seized him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea. He was the one to be blamed.

41.MunirMezyed2023: In (the destruction of the Tribe of) ‘Ād (there is also a lesson) when We unleashed the barren wind against them.

42.MunirMezyed2023: It spared nothing that reached it, but made it like a rotten bone.

43.MunirMezyed2023: In (the destruction of the tribe of) Thamūd (there is also a lesson) when they were told: "Enjoy yourselves for a while!"

44.MunirMezyed2023: But they rebelled against the command of their Lord. So the thunderbolt overtook them while they were looking.

45.MunirMezyed2023: So they were not able to rise up or help their own selves.

46.MunirMezyed2023: (There is also a lesson) in the folk of Noah before them. They were a people indulging in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

47.MunirMezyed2023: The Heavens, We have built with Our Hands. Indeed, We will continue to expand it.

48.MunirMezyed2023: The Earth, We have spread it out. How brilliantly do We spread out!

49.MunirMezyed2023: Of everything, We have created pairs so that you may persist in meditation.

50.MunirMezyed2023: (Say): “Seek refuge in Allâh! Truly I am sent by Him to give you genuine warning.”

51.MunirMezyed2023: And do not set up with Allâh another god. Truly I am sent by Him to give you genuine warning.”

52.MunirMezyed2023: Similarly, no Messenger came to those before them, but they said: “He is either a magician or a lunatic."

53.MunirMezyed2023: Did they transmit this saying to each other? Nay, but they are really cruel and oppressive people.

54.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, walk away from them and you will not be held accountable.

55.MunirMezyed2023: And continue to admonish, for surely admonishment profits those who live a life of Genuine Faith.

56.MunirMezyed2023: I have not created the jinn and the mankind except that they should worship Me (in the way I want them to worship Me).

57.MunirMezyed2023: I desire no livelihood from them, nor do I desire that they should feed Me.

58.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly, Allâh is the All-Provider, the Lord of power and Potent.

59.MunirMezyed2023: As for those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of your own whims, their portion is like the portion of their companions (who lived before them). Now, therefore, do not let them ask Me to inflict immediate punishment upon them.

60.MunirMezyed2023: Woe, then, betide those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth because of their day which they are threatened with.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the Mount Ṭûr!.

2.MunirMezyed2023: By the Book inscribed

3.MunirMezyed2023: In an outstretched vellum.

4.MunirMezyed2023: By the established House.

5.MunirMezyed2023: By the elevated roof,

6.MunirMezyed2023: And by the swollen sea.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly the retribution of your Lord will come to pass.

8.MunirMezyed2023: There shall be none to preclude it.

9.MunirMezyed2023: On the day when the sky will fluctuate with a dreadful fluctuation

10.MunirMezyed2023: And the mountains move away with a rapid movement.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Then Woe on that day betide those who are spiritually blind

12.MunirMezyed2023: Who excessively indulge in vain talks.

13.MunirMezyed2023: The day on which they will be forcefully driven into the Fire of hell.

14.MunirMezyed2023: This is the Fire which you were inclined to deny.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Is this magic, or do you not see?

16.MunirMezyed2023: Now burn in it! It is all the same for you whether you patiently endure it or not. You are only being chastised for what you used to do.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Surely the Pious servants will dwell in (Great) Gardens and Bliss,

18.MunirMezyed2023: Rejoicing in what their Lord will bestow upon them. And their Lord will shield them from the punishment of Hellfire.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Eat and drink with pleasure for what you used to do,

20.MunirMezyed2023: They will recline on couches set in lines. And We wed them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.

21.MunirMezyed2023: And those who live by Faith and whose offspring follow them in faith, We shall join their offspring with them, never decreasing the reward of their deeds in aught. Every human person is pledged for what he gains.

22.MunirMezyed2023: And We shall supply them with fruit and meat of which they desire.

23.MunirMezyed2023: They will pass therein from one to another a cup wherein is neither vanity nor sin.

24.MunirMezyed2023: And they will be served by youths of their own race as if they were hidden pearls.

25.MunirMezyed2023: Some of them will approach the other, questioning,

26.MunirMezyed2023: Saying: “Indeed, before this, we used to fear on account of our families.

27.MunirMezyed2023: But Allâh has conferred favor upon us and saved us from the agony of the scorching Fire.

28.MunirMezyed2023: We used to call upon Him before. Most assuredly, He is the Most Kind, the Most Merciful.”

29.MunirMezyed2023: Now continue to admonish! By the Grace of your Lord, you are neither a soothsayer, nor a lunatic.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they say: “He is a poet for whom we await the evil events of time?”

31.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “Await! For I too will be with you awaiting.”

32.MunirMezyed2023: Do their minds command them to do this? Or are they cruel and oppressive people?

33.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they say: "He has fabricated this Qur’ān?" In  fact, they have no tendency to live by  faith!

34.MunirMezyed2023: Then let them produce a discourse like this Qur'ân if they are truthful.

35.MunirMezyed2023: Or were they created out of nothing? Or are they the creators?

36.MunirMezyed2023: Or did they create the heavens and the earth?  The truth is that they have no firm belief (in Allâh).

37.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have the treasures of the Lord with them, or are they the ones who hold the absolute power?

38.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have a stairway (to the heavens) by means of which they listen (to the angels)? Then let their listener bring a conclusive evidence .

39.MunirMezyed2023: Or Has He only daughters and you have the sons?

40.MunirMezyed2023: Or do you ask them a reward for (your preaching) while they are heavily burdened with debt?

41.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have (the knowledge of ) the unseen and so they write it down?

42.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they intend to devise evil schemes against you? But those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth will be the victims of their own evil conspiracy.

43.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have another god besides Allâh? All Glory Be To Allâh from all that which they ascribe as partner to Him!

44.MunirMezyed2023: And if they were to see a deadly fragment of the heavens falling down, they would say: “Heaped-up clouds"

45.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, leave them alone till they face that day of theirs in which they will be plunged into profound horror and shock.

46.MunirMezyed2023: On that day, their evil schemes will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

47.MunirMezyed2023: But, verily, for those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own own whims, there is another punishment besides this: But most of them do not know.

48.MunirMezyed2023: Then wait patiently for the verdict of your Lord. Indeed, you are before Our Eyes. Then celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare His absolute majesty and glory when you rise up for prayer.

49.MunirMezyed2023: In the night-time, celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare His glory, and at the setting of the stars.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the star when it falls (or dies):

2.MunirMezyed2023: Your companion has not deviated from the path the truth, nor is he deluded,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Nor does he speak of his own fantasy.

4.MunirMezyed2023: This Qur’ān is only Revelation Knowledge revealed to him .

5.MunirMezyed2023: It is taught to him by one who is endowed with mighty power,

6.MunirMezyed2023: Beauty, sturdiness and wisdom. He grew clear to view

7.MunirMezyed2023: When he was in the highest part of the horizon.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Then he approached and came down.

9.MunirMezyed2023: He was as close to (Muhammad) as the distance of two bows or even less.

10.MunirMezyed2023: So did (Allâh) reveal to His servant (Muhammad) what was to be revealed (through the Archangel Gabriel).

11.MunirMezyed2023: His heart has not deluded him in seeing what he saw.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Will you then dispute with him over what he saw?

13.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely he saw Him in another descent,

14.MunirMezyed2023: Near Sidrat al-Muntahā,

15.MunirMezyed2023: Near which is the Garden of eternal abode,

16.MunirMezyed2023: When Sidrat al-Muntahā was covered with that which covers.

17.MunirMezyed2023: (His) sight deviated not, neither did it transgress.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Verily he did see (some) of the Greatest Signs of his Lord.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Have you then thought carefully about Lât and ’Uzza,

20.MunirMezyed2023: And the third one, Manât, as well?

21.MunirMezyed2023: What! For you the males, and for Him, the females?

22.MunirMezyed2023: This indeed is an iniquitous division!

23.MunirMezyed2023: They are  just a mere illusion which you and your forefathers have created- a belief Allâh has not authorized. They follow nothing but speculation and their whims although their Lord has already given them the True Source of Spiritual Enlightenment.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Or shall man have what he desires?

25.MunirMezyed2023: But to Allâh belongs the End and the Beginning (of all things).

26.MunirMezyed2023: So many Angels are in the heavens whose intercession avails nothing except after Allâh gives permission to whom He wills and with whom He is pleased.

27.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, those who have no Faith in the Hereafter named the Angels with female names.

28.MunirMezyed2023: They have no knowledge of it. They follow nothing but speculation. Indeed, speculation avails nothing against the Truth.

29.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, shun the one who turns away from celebrating Our praise and declaring Our glory, and who desires nothing but this worldly life.

30.MunirMezyed2023: The desire of this worldly life is the full extent of their knowledge. Verily, your Lord has full knowledge of those who have been deceived into going away from His path. And He already knows those who walk on the right path to salvation.

31.MunirMezyed2023: To Allâh belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is on the earth. He will chastise those who commit evil deeds with (the penalty of) what they have done, and reward those who strive to do virtuous acts with the best reward, (Al-Jannah).

32.MunirMezyed2023: Those who avoid by all means committing the great sins and abominations except for minor offenses (let them be sure that) your Lord is extremely vast in Forgiveness. He knows best about you when He initiated you from the earth, and when you were embryos in the wombs of your mothers. Now, therefore, ascribe no purity to yourselves. He knows best the one who acts piously.

33.MunirMezyed2023: Have you then seen the one who fell away from the faith?

34.MunirMezyed2023: He gave a little, then he refused to give.

35.MunirMezyed2023: Does he have the knowledge of unseen, and so he is capable of catching sight of all things?

36.MunirMezyed2023: Or has he not been informed of what is in the Scriptures of Moses

37.MunirMezyed2023: And of Abraham who fulfilled (his function of promulgating the Message of God)?

38.MunirMezyed2023: No One will ever bear the responsibility of the sins of another.

39.MunirMezyed2023: Man will have only what he (seriously) strives for.

40.MunirMezyed2023: Surely (the fruit of) his struggle will be seen.

41.MunirMezyed2023: Then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward.

42.MunirMezyed2023: And that the ultimate end is to your Lord .

43.MunirMezyed2023: And He is the One Who makes (whom He wills) laugh or cry.

44.MunirMezyed2023: And He is the One Who causes death and gives life.

45.MunirMezyed2023: And He is the One Who creates the pairs, male and female,

46.MunirMezyed2023: From a drop of sperm when it is emitted.

47.MunirMezyed2023: It is incumbent on Him to bring forth the second creation- (the Resurrection).

48.MunirMezyed2023: And He is the One Who enriches and provides relief.

49.MunirMezyed2023: And He is the Lord of Sirius.

50.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who  destroyed the ancient ‘Ād

51.MunirMezyed2023: And Thamūd. He spared none of them.

52.MunirMezyed2023: (He also destroyed) the folk of Noah before them. They were more transgressors and more rebellious.

53.MunirMezyed2023: He overthrew the subverted cities (of Sodom & Gomorrah).

54.MunirMezyed2023: So they were covered with that which covers.

55.MunirMezyed2023: Which then, of the marvels of your Lord, will you doubt?

56.MunirMezyed2023: Now take this as a serious warning like that of the ancient warnings.

57.MunirMezyed2023: The approaching day, (Last Judgment), has become imminent.

58.MunirMezyed2023: No one besides Allâh can disclose it.

59.MunirMezyed2023: Do you then wonder at this discourse

60.MunirMezyed2023: And poke fun at it instead of weeping,

61.MunirMezyed2023: While you are indulging in fun and amusement?

62.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, bow down in prostration to Allâh, worship Him (in the way He wants you to worship Him).

1.MunirMezyed2023: The Hour has drawn nigh, and the Moon has been rent asunder.

2.MunirMezyed2023: Yet, whenever they behold a Sign (of Allah’s power & glory), they turn away in a repulsive manner and say: "Continuous magic."

3.MunirMezyed2023: They persistently denied the truth and yielded to their own whims. Yet every affair has its appointed time.

4.MunirMezyed2023: And verily there have already come to them narratives in which there are sufficient warnings to deter them.

5.MunirMezyed2023: The Qur’ān is consummate wisdom. Yet warnings don't avail (them).

6.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, ignore them and (wait for) the day when the caller will call them to something dreadful.

7.MunirMezyed2023: They will come out of their graves with their eyes downcast as if they were scattered locusts,

8.MunirMezyed2023: Hastening towards the caller. Those who are spiritually dead and blind will say: "This is an arduous day."

9.MunirMezyed2023: Before them the people of Noah persistently denied the Truth, accusing Our servant of Lying and saying: “Lunatic.” And he was repulsed.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Then he called upon his Lord: "Lo! I have been defeated and so I need Your help".

11.MunirMezyed2023: So We opened the gates of heavens with water pouring forth,

12.MunirMezyed2023: Causing the earth to burst forth with spring so that the two waters would meet for a predestined purpose.

13.MunirMezyed2023: We carried him on the (Ark) made of planks and nails,

14.MunirMezyed2023: Sailing before Our Eyes. The flood was a chastisement for (the iniquitous deeds) of those who persistently refused to yield to the Truth.

15.MunirMezyed2023: And certainly We left it as a Sign. So is there anyone who will be willing to receive admonition (and yield to the truth)?

16.MunirMezyed2023: How dreadful was then My chastisement after My warnings!

17.MunirMezyed2023: And verily, We made the Qur’ān easy for recollection, but is there anyone who will be willing to receive admonition (and yield to the truth)?

18.MunirMezyed2023: (The people of) ‘Ād’ accused (Hūd) of lying, then how dreadful was My chastisement after My warnings!

19.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We unleashed against them a wrathful wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

20.MunirMezyed2023: Sweeping men away as if they were decayed palm tree trunks.

21.MunirMezyed2023: How dreadful was then My chastisement after My warnings!

22.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We made the Qur’ān easy for recollection, but is there anyone who will be willing to receive admonition(and yield to the truth)?

23.MunirMezyed2023: (The people of) Thamūd persistently refused to take close heed of Our warnings.

24.MunirMezyed2023: They said: “What! Is it a mortal man, one of us, that we should follow? Verily, we would then be in utter deception and madness.

25.MunirMezyed2023: What! Out of all of us have the Enlightenment Quotes been given to him alone?? Nay, but he is an insolent liar!"

26.MunirMezyed2023: They will know tomorrow who is the liar, the insolent one!

27.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We are going to send the She-camel as a temptation for them. Thus, watch them, (O’ Sālih), and cling to patience.

28.MunirMezyed2023: Now inform them that the water is going to be divided among them. Every drinking time will be regulated.

29.MunirMezyed2023: But they called their companion, so he took (a sword) and hamstrung the She-camel.

30.MunirMezyed2023: How dreadful was then My chastisement after My warnings!

31.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We sent upon them one awful blast and so they became like dry twig fragments (used by) a fence builder.

32.MunirMezyed2023: And verily, We made the Qur’ān easy for recollection, but is there anyone who will be willing to receive admonition (and yield to the truth)?

33.MunirMezyed2023: The people of Lot persistently refused to take close heed of Our warnings.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the followers of Lot. We saved them in the early morning

35.MunirMezyed2023: As a grace from Us. This is how We reward those who show gratitude.

36.MunirMezyed2023: He, verily, warned them of Our punishment but they cast doubts on the warning!

37.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, they tried to turn him from his guests, but We wiped out their eyes. Now, therefore, taste My chastisement and My warning.

38.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, an abiding chastisement seized them early in the morning.

39.MunirMezyed2023: Then taste My chastisement and My warning.

40.MunirMezyed2023: And Verily, We made the Qur’ān easy for recollection, but is there anyone who will be willing to receive admonition (and yield to the truth)?

41.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, warnings came to the clan of Pharaoh.

42.MunirMezyed2023: They persistently denied whatsoever We have revealed, so We seized them with a seizure of the Mighty, All-powerful One.

43.MunirMezyed2023: Are, then, those of you who are spiritually blind better than those? Or have you received amnesty through the Scriptures?

44.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they say: "We shall be triumphant because of our unity?"

45.MunirMezyed2023: The hosts will be defeated. They will turn and flee.

46.MunirMezyed2023: Nay, but the Hour is their promised time, and It will be the most grievous and bitter!

47.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly the Ungodly Sinners are in deception and insanity.

48.MunirMezyed2023: On the day when they are dragged into the Fire upon their faces, (It will be said unto them): “Taste the touch of the Hellfire!”

49.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We have created everything for a specific reason.

50.MunirMezyed2023: Our Command is but one as the twinkling of an eye.

51.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We have utterly destroyed so many people like you. But is there anyone who will be willing to receive admonition (and yield to the truth)?

52.MunirMezyed2023: Everything they did is in the Books.

53.MunirMezyed2023: Everything, small or big, is written down.

54.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, the Pious servants will be in Gardens and rivers,

55.MunirMezyed2023: In a Seat of Truth in the Presence of the Most Powerful King.

55.SurahEnglishNames: The Beneficent, The Mercy Giving, The Merciful

1.MunirMezyed2023: The True Merciful (God)!

2.MunirMezyed2023: It is He Who taught the Qur’ān.

3.MunirMezyed2023: He created man.

4.MunirMezyed2023: He taught him the art of articulation.

5.MunirMezyed2023: The sun and the moon are made punctual.

6.MunirMezyed2023: The herbage and the trees do prostrate.

7.MunirMezyed2023: The heavens, He raised it high. And He set up the scale

8.MunirMezyed2023: So that you do not transgress the scales.

9.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, maintain the scale with equity and do not fall short of the measure.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And the earth, He laid it for the creatures.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Therein are fruit and palm-trees with sheaths,

12.MunirMezyed2023: And also husked grain and aromatic basil.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

14.MunirMezyed2023: He created man from dry clay like baked pottery;

15.MunirMezyed2023: Where as He created the Jinn from smokeless flame of fire.

16.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

17.MunirMezyed2023: He is the Lord of the East and the West.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

19.MunirMezyed2023: He released the two seas, meeting (side by side).

20.MunirMezyed2023: Between them is a barrier so neither of them can transgress.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

22.MunirMezyed2023: There comes forth from both of them pearl and coral.

23.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

24.MunirMezyed2023: And His are the ships displayed upon the sea like mountains.

25.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

26.MunirMezyed2023: All that on the earth is bound to perish.

27.MunirMezyed2023: But will remain (for ever) the Face of your Lord, the Lord of Majesty and Honor.

28.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

29.MunirMezyed2023: All those in the heavens and on the earth depend on Him. Every day He is in a (new) splendorous manifestation.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

31.MunirMezyed2023: We shall call you to account, O’ you two prominent beings, (mankind & jinn).

32.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

33.MunirMezyed2023: O’ company of jinn and mankind, if you (think that you) are capable of passing through the regions of the heavens and earth, then pass through. But you will not be able to pass through except with power and authority.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

35.MunirMezyed2023: There will be sent upon you both flames of fire and sparks of brass, then you will be unable to protect your own selves.

36.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

37.MunirMezyed2023: When the sky is rent asunder, it becomes red like murky oil.

38.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

39.MunirMezyed2023: On that day neither man nor jinni will be asked about his sin!

40.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

41.MunirMezyed2023: The Ungodly Sinners will be recognized by their marks. They will be seized by their forelocks and their feet.

42.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

43.MunirMezyed2023: This is Gehenna which the Ungodly Sinners were inclined to deny.

44.MunirMezyed2023: They will be (compelled to) go round between it and between scalding boiling water.

45.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

46.MunirMezyed2023: But for him who stands in awe of the absolute majesty and glory of his Lord, there are two gardens -

47.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?-

48.MunirMezyed2023: Containing various trees!

49.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

50.MunirMezyed2023: Therein are two flowing springs.

51.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

52.MunirMezyed2023: In the two gardens are pairs of every fruit.

53.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

54.MunirMezyed2023: (The Denizens of Al-Jannah) will recline on couches lined with silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens are within reach.

55.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

56.MunirMezyed2023: Therein are bashful maidens whom neither man nor jinni has ever touched them before-

57.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?-

58.MunirMezyed2023: As though they were rubies and coral.

59.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

60.MunirMezyed2023: Is the reward of goodness aught but goodness?

61.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

62.MunirMezyed2023: Beside these two, there are two other gardens -

63.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?-

64.MunirMezyed2023: Dark-green.

65.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

66.MunirMezyed2023: Therein are two abundant springs.

67.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

68.MunirMezyed2023: Therein are fruit, palms and pomegranates.

69.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

70.MunirMezyed2023: Therein are maidens, noble and gorgeous -

71.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?-

72.MunirMezyed2023: With wide, lovely black eyes, dwelling in pavilions.

73.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?-

74.MunirMezyed2023: Neither human nor jinn will have touched them before.

75.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

76.MunirMezyed2023: (The Denizens of Al-Jannah) will recline on green cushions and fine carpets.

77.MunirMezyed2023: Then, which is it, of the marvels of your Lord, that you, (O’ mankind & jinn), seek to deny?

78.MunirMezyed2023: Most Exalted is the Name of your Lord, the Lord of Majesty and Honor.

56.SurahEnglishNames: The Event, The Inevitable, That Which is Coming

1.MunirMezyed2023: When the inevitable event comes to pass,

2.MunirMezyed2023: Then its occurrence cannot be denied.

3.MunirMezyed2023: It will put some down and elevate others.

4.MunirMezyed2023: When the earth is shaken with violent shock,

5.MunirMezyed2023: The Mountains will crumble to ground,

6.MunirMezyed2023: Becoming dust particles floating around.

7.MunirMezyed2023: You will be divided into three categories:

8.MunirMezyed2023: Those on the right hand; what of those on the right hand?

9.MunirMezyed2023: Those on the left hand; what of those on the left hand?

10.MunirMezyed2023: The foremost ones (who were monotheists) are the foremost ones (in receiving their reward).

11.MunirMezyed2023: Those are the ones who will be brought nigh (to Allâh),

12.MunirMezyed2023: Abiding in the gardens of bliss.

13.MunirMezyed2023: A multitude of those foremost will be from the ancient people

14.MunirMezyed2023: And a few will be from the later generations.

15.MunirMezyed2023: (They will sit) on bejeweled thrones,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Reclining thereon, facing one another.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Round about them will go immortal youths,

18.MunirMezyed2023: Carrying goblets, pitchers and a cup of pure wine.

19.MunirMezyed2023: That will cause them neither headache nor intoxication.

20.MunirMezyed2023: They will also be served with the fruits of their choice

21.MunirMezyed2023: And flesh of fowls that they desire.

22.MunirMezyed2023: They will have immortal maidens with wide, lovely black eyes

23.MunirMezyed2023: Like hidden pearls,

24.MunirMezyed2023: A reward for what they used to do.

25.MunirMezyed2023: They will not hear therein any evil vain talk or sinful speeches

26.MunirMezyed2023: But only the word of greeting, “Peace: Peace.”

27.MunirMezyed2023: Those on the right hand; what of those on the right hand?

28.MunirMezyed2023: (They will be) amid thornless lote trees,

29.MunirMezyed2023: And banana palms,

30.MunirMezyed2023: In an extended shade,

31.MunirMezyed2023: By water flowing constantly,

32.MunirMezyed2023: Many types of fruits,

33.MunirMezyed2023: Neither intercepted, nor forbidden,

34.MunirMezyed2023: And on exalted thrones.

35.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We created those maidens of special creation

36.MunirMezyed2023: And then We made them virgins,

37.MunirMezyed2023: Loving, equals in age,

38.MunirMezyed2023: For those on the right hand.

39.MunirMezyed2023: A multitude of those on the right hand will be from the ancient people,

40.MunirMezyed2023: And another multitude will be from the later generations.

41.MunirMezyed2023: Those on the left hand; what of those on the left hand?

42.MunirMezyed2023: (They will be) in scorching wind and scalding hot water,

43.MunirMezyed2023: And under a shadow of black smoke,

44.MunirMezyed2023: Neither cool nor refreshing.

45.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, they were, before that, indulging in affluence,

46.MunirMezyed2023: And they used to persist in the unpardonable sin.

47.MunirMezyed2023: They used to ask (mockingly): "When we die and turn to dust and bones, shall we be resurrected?

48.MunirMezyed2023: And our forefathers as well?”

49.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "(Yes) indeed, all the ancients and the later generations

50.MunirMezyed2023: Will be gathered together for the appointed hour of predetermined day.

51.MunirMezyed2023: Then indeed you, who are spiritually blind and deceived into falling away from the Faith,

52.MunirMezyed2023: Will assuredly eat from  Zaqqūm tree,

53.MunirMezyed2023: Filling up your bellies with it.

54.MunirMezyed2023: And thereon you will drink of scalding water,

55.MunirMezyed2023: Gulping it like thirsty camels".

56.MunirMezyed2023: This is their accommodation on the Day of Judgment.

57.MunirMezyed2023: It is We Who have created you. Will you then consent to accept this fact?

58.MunirMezyed2023: Have you seen that which you ejaculate?

59.MunirMezyed2023: Is it you who create it, or are We the Creators?

60.MunirMezyed2023: We have ordained death among you; and We are not to be overcome

61.MunirMezyed2023: In order that We may transfigure you and make you grow into what you do lack the knowledge of it.

62.MunirMezyed2023: And Verily, you have already known about the first creation, then why do you not celebrate His praise and declare His  glory?

63.MunirMezyed2023: Have you seen the seed that you sow in the ground?

64.MunirMezyed2023: Are you the ones who cause it to grow, or is it We who do so?

65.MunirMezyed2023: Had We willed, We could have turned it into debris, then you would fall in confusion,

66.MunirMezyed2023: (Saying): ”We are indeed ruined,

67.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, we are now deprived!"

68.MunirMezyed2023: Have you seen the water which you drink?

69.MunirMezyed2023: Are you the ones who cause it to fall down from the clouds, or is it We Who do so?

70.MunirMezyed2023: Had We willed, we could have made it very salty. Then why do you not show any gratitude (to your Lord for His endless blessings).

71.MunirMezyed2023: Have you seen the fire which you kindle?

72.MunirMezyed2023: Are you the ones who initiated its tree, or is it We Who do so?

73.MunirMezyed2023: We have made it an Awakening and a useful item for the inhabitants of the wilderness.

74.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, glorify with praise the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.

75.MunirMezyed2023: Nay, but I swear by the positions of the stars.

76.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, this is indeed a great oath if you but know-

77.MunirMezyed2023: This is indeed an honorable Qur’ān

78.MunirMezyed2023: In a well-preserved Record.

79.MunirMezyed2023: No one shall touch it except the purified ones.

80.MunirMezyed2023: It is Revelation Knowledge from the Lord of all the worlds.

81.MunirMezyed2023: Is it such a divine discourse that you are struggling to accept

82.MunirMezyed2023: And you make your denial thereof your means of livelihood?

83.MunirMezyed2023: Then why (can't you help a soul) when it comes up to the throat?

84.MunirMezyed2023: You are at the moment looking on (helplessly),

85.MunirMezyed2023: And We are closer to him than you, but you do not see.

86.MunirMezyed2023: Since you are not held under authority,

87.MunirMezyed2023: Why do you not bring it back (to its body) if you are truthful?

88.MunirMezyed2023: Then if he is one of those who are drawn nigh (to Allâh),

89.MunirMezyed2023: (His soul) will be a breath of life with the scent of basil in the gardens of bliss.

90.MunirMezyed2023: But if he is one of those on the right hand,

91.MunirMezyed2023: His soul will be (greeted by the word) “Peace” from those on the right hand.

92.MunirMezyed2023: But if he is one of those who are spiritually blind, and deceived into falling away from the Faith,

93.MunirMezyed2023: Then his accommodation will be scalding hot water

94.MunirMezyed2023: And the heat of the burning Fire.

95.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, this is the Ultimate Truth.

96.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, glorify with praise the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Whatever is in the heavens and on the earth celebrates the praise of Allâh and declares His absolute majesty and glory. He is the Almighty, All- Wise.

2.MunirMezyed2023: His is the (absolute) sovereignty of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death. He is Most Capable of doing whatever He desires.

3.MunirMezyed2023: He is the First, the Last, the Visible and the Hidden. He is Fully Aware of all things.

4.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six days, and then established Himself above the (Glorious) Throne. He has full knowledge of whatsoever goes into the earth, and whatsoever comes forth from it, whatsoever comes down from the heavens, and whatsoever goes up to it. He is always with you wherever you are. Allâh is the All-Seer of whatsoever you do.

5.MunirMezyed2023: His is the (absolute) sovereignty of the heavens and earth. And to Allâh all matters are returned.

6.MunirMezyed2023: He lets the night pass into the day, and lets the day pass into the night. He has full knowledge of whatever is stored up in the hearts.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Now affirm your faith in Allâh and His Messenger, and expend of that whereof He has made you trustees. As for those of you who adhere to Faith and expend, they will have an immense reward.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Why do you not have Faith in Allâh when the Messenger is inviting you to affirm your faith in your Lord who has already taken a pledge from you if you are of those who live a life of Genuine Faith?

9.MunirMezyed2023: It is He Who sends down irrefutable Signs to His servant so that He may bring you out of darkness into light. Most certainly Allâh is All-Compassionate and Most Merciful to you.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And why should you not spend in the cause of Allâh since (you already know that) the heritage of the heavens and of the earth belongs to Allâh? Those of you who spent (in the cause of Allâh) and fought (bravely) before the conquest (Mecca) are incomparable. They are greater in rank than those who spent and fought afterwards. However, to both parties Allâh has promised the best reward (Al-Jannah). And Allâh is All-Aware of whatsoever you do.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Who is it that will lend to Allâh a good loan which He will multiply it for him (many times over), and he will have a generous reward?

12.MunirMezyed2023: On that day, you will see the light of the Monotheistic Believers of Unfeigned Faith, men and women, shimmering ahead of them and on their right. (They will be told): "Today you have the glad tidings of Gardens, beneath which rivers flow, for you to abide therein. That is the most ultimate success and the supreme one."

13.MunirMezyed2023: On the day when those who make a false profession of Faith, men and women, will say to those who live by Faith: "Look at us so that we may get some light from your light". It will be said: "Go back and seek for light". Thus, a wall with a gate in it will be set up between them. Inside it there will be Mercy but outside of it there will be agony and suffering.

14.MunirMezyed2023: They will cry unto the Monotheistic Believers: “Did we not use to be with you (in the worldly life)?” They will reply: “Yea, but you let yourselves fall into temptation, longed for our destruction, cast doubts on (the Resurrection), and allowed your whims to delude you, until there came the command of Allâh. So (You allowed) the Arch deceiver- (Satan)- to deceive you concerning Allâh.”

15.MunirMezyed2023: Therefore, this day no ransom will be accepted from you, neither from those who persistently refuses to yield to the Truth. Your abode is the Fire.  It is most worthy of you- evil is the abode!

16.MunirMezyed2023: Has not the time yet come for the Monotheistic Believers that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allâh, and at the Truth which is revealed? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and the term was prolonged for them, and so their hearts were hardened? However, most of them were indulging in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Know that Allâh gives life to the earth after its death!. Indeed, We have made the Qur'ānic Verses manifest to you so that you may achieve a higher level of consciousness.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, those men and women who give alms and lend to Allâh a good loan, it will be multiplied for them. They will (also) receive a generous reward.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Those who have Faith in Allâh and His Messengers are (in the rank) of the truthful. And the martyrs, with their Lord, will have their reward and their light. Yest those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth and deny what We have revealed (to Our Messengers) are the Denizens of Hell.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Know that this worldly life is but a merely play, an amusement, an ornament, a mutual boasting among you and a competition in increase of wealth and children. This is like an abundant rain whose vegetation pleases those who are spiritually dead and blind: then it shrivels and you can see it turning yellow, then it becomes debris. And in the Hereafter there is a severe punishment, and (also) Forgiveness from Allâh and good pleasure, whereas the worldly life is no more than provision of vanities.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Now hasten to Forgiveness from your Lord and to a garden whose width whereof is as the width of heaven and earth, prepared for those who have Faith in Allâh and His Messengers. That is the bounty of Allâh. He bestows upon Whom He wills. Allâh is the Lord of the great bounty.

22.MunirMezyed2023: No misfortune befalls on the earth or among you except that it is written in a book before. We bring it into existence. Verily, that is easy for Allâh to do.

23.MunirMezyed2023: We let you know this so that you neither grieve over what has escaped you, nor rejoice in what Allâh has bestowed upon you. And Allâh does not demonstrates His own love for any arrogant boaster:

24.MunirMezyed2023: Such are parsimonious and enjoin upon the people parsimony. Whoever falls away from the Faith (needs to know that) Allâh is the Self-Sufficient, Worthy of all praise.

25.MunirMezyed2023: We verily sent Our Messengers with the irrefutable Signs and revealed with them the Scripture and the Balance so that people may observe the right measure (i.e. maintain justice). We sent down iron wherein strong power and benefit for the people so that Allâh will identify those who give support to His cause and to His Messenger in secret. Most surely Allâh is All- Strong, Almighty.

26.MunirMezyed2023: And verily, We sent Noah and Abraham and gave the Gift of Prophecy and Revelation to their descendants: and some of them walk on the right path to salvation. But many of them indulge in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

27.MunirMezyed2023: Then We made Our Messengers to follow in their footsteps. And We made Jesus, son of Mary, to follow, giving him the Gospel, and placing compassion and mercy in the hearts of those who followed him. But they innovated Monasticism which We did not prescribe it for them. (They sought it) only to please Allâh, but they did not observe it in accordance with what is required. So We gave the ones who Adhered to Absolute Monotheism their reward. But many of them were indulging in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

28.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith!  Act piously towards your Lord, and have Faith in His Messenger. He will give you twofold of His Mercy, provide for you a Light by which you will walk across the Path (over Hell and into Paradise), and forgive you. For Allâh is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

29.MunirMezyed2023: This is so that the People of the Book may come to know that they control naught of the bounty of Allâh, but that the bounty is entirely in the hands of Allâh. He bestows it upon whom He wills. Allâh is the Lord of the great bounty.

58.SurahEnglishNames: She That Disputeth, The Pleading Woman, She Who Pleaded

1.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, Allâh has heard the words of the woman who argued with you concerning her husband and complained to Allâh. He was listening to the contentions of both of you. Most certainly Allâh is All-Hearing, All-Seer.

2.MunirMezyed2023: Those of you who deliberately seek to estrange their wives by declaring them to be as their mothers (should know) that their wives would never be their mothers. Their mothers are only those women who gave birth to them. The words they utter are evil words and falsehood. Most certainly Allâh is Oft- Pardoning, Oft-Forgiving.

3.MunirMezyed2023: As for Those who deliberately seek to estrange their wives by declaring them to be as their mothers and then go back on that which they said, they should free a captive before they touch each other. That is what you are admonished thereby. And Allâh is All-Aware of whatever you do.

4.MunirMezyed2023: However, the one who cannot find (a slave to free) must fast for two consecutive months before they touch each other. In case he cannot fast, then he should feed sixty needy ones. This is the command of Allâh so that you may have perfect trust in Allâh and His Messenger. These are the limits set by Allâh. Those who are spiritually dead and blind will be subjected to a painful punishment.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, those who oppose Allâh and His Messenger will be humiliated and perished, just as those before them. And We have certainly sent down Intelligible Verses. And those who are spiritually dead and blind will be subjected to a disgraceful chastisement.

6.MunirMezyed2023: And (mention) on the day when Allâh will resurrect them all, then inform them of what they used to do. Allâh has enumerated every deed, while they have forgotten it. Lo! Allâh is Witness over all things.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen that Allâh knows whatsoever is in the heavens, and whatsoever is on the earth? There is no secret conversation of three but He is their fourth, nor of five but He is their sixth, nor of less than that or more but He is (always) with them wherever they might be. Then, on the Day of Resurrection, He will inform them of whatever they did. Most certainly Allâh is Fully Aware of all things.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen those who were forbidden to devise evil schemes and afterward returned to that which they had been forbidden? They conspire to commit sins, transgression and disobeying the Messenger. When they come to you, they greet you with a greeting with which Allâh does not greet you, saying within themselves: ”Why should Allâh punish us for what we say?” Lo! Hellfire will be sufficient for them, where they will burn in it- Dreadful is the abode!

9.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! When you collaborate secretly, don’t collaborate for the purpose of committing sins or transgression or disobedience to the Messenger, but collaborate for righteousness and unfeigned piety, and act piously towards Allâh to Whom you are destined to be gathered.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Engaging in plots and intrigues is inspired by the devil in order to cause sorrow to the those who Live by Faith, but he cannot harm them at all, except with the permission of Allâh. Now, therefore, let those who live a life of Genuine Faith rely on Allâh with full trust.

11.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! If it happens that you were asked to make room in the assemblies, then you should do so. And Allâh will give you ample. And if it happens that you were asked to get up and move, then you should do so. And Allâh will exalt in degree those of you who Live by Faith and those who are given the spiritual gift of knowledge. And Allâh is Well-Aware of whatsoever you do.

12.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! When you seek to consult privately the Messenger, offer an alms before your consultation. That is better for you and purer. However, if it happens that you do not find anything to give, (then be sure that) Allâh is indeed Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Were you afraid that offering alms before your consultation would make you poor? Even though you did not offer any alms, Allâh would forgive you for that. Thus, establish the regular Prayer, pay Zakāt and yield to (the Commandments of) Allâh and (to what He has revealed) to His Messenger. And Allâh is Well-Aware of what you do.

14.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen those who make allies of a people with whom the wrath of Allâh abides in them? They are neither of you nor of them. And they deliberately make a false oath.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh has prepared for them a vehement chastisement. Dreadful indeed is that which they used to do.

16.MunirMezyed2023: They used their oaths as a cover to hinder people from the path of Allâh. For them, therefore, will be a disgraceful chastisement.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Neither their wealth nor their children will avail them aught against (the chastisement of) Allâh: they are the Denizens of the Fire, therein they shall abide.

18.MunirMezyed2023: On the day when Allâh will resurrect them all, then they will swear to Him as they swear to you: thinking that they have something to stand on. Surely they are the inventors of lying .

19.MunirMezyed2023: The devil has engrossed them and made them forget to celebrate the praise of Allâh and declare His glory. They are (the members) of devil’s party. Indeed, (the members of) the devil’s party are the ones who are doomed to eternal perdition.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, those who oppose Allâh and His Messenger will be among the most humiliated.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh has decreed: "Most assuredly, it is I and My Messengers, who will be the triumphant." Indeed, Allâh is All-Strong, Almighty.

22.MunirMezyed2023: You will not find people who have affirmed their Faith in Allâh and in the Last Day demonstrating their own love for those who oppose Allâh and His Messenger, even though they be their fathers or their sons or their brethren or their clan. For these, He has firmly established Faith in their hearts, and has strengthened them with a Spirit from Himself. He will admit them into Gardens underneath which rivers flow wherein they will live forever. Allâh is well pleased with them, and they are well pleased with Him. These are the (members of) Allâh’s party. Undoubtedly, (the members of) the Allâh’s party are the ones who will ultimately achieve a blissful life/ or gain eternal salvation.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is on the earth celebrates the praise of Allâh and declares His absolute majesty and glory. He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.

2.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who caused (Banū al-Nadīr) who Fell away from the Faith among the people of the Book to go forth from their homes to the first exile. You did not deem that they would go forth while they thought that their strongholds would defend them against (the wrath of) Allâh. But the (chastisement of) Allâh came to them whence they never expected. And He cast terror into their hearts. So they destroyed their own houses by their own hands, and by the hands of the Monotheistic Believers. Now, therefore, take close heed, O' you who have achieved a high level of spiritual insight.

3.MunirMezyed2023: Had it not been that Allâh had decreed exile for them, He would surely have punished them in this worldly life, and theirs in the Hereafter is the chastisement of the Fire.

4.MunirMezyed2023: That is because they opposed Allâh and His Messenger. Whosoever opposes Allâh (let him be sure that) Allâh is extremely severe in punishment.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Whatever palm-tree you cut down or leave it standing upon its roots, that was by the will of Allâh, and that He might humiliate those who indulge in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Whatever Allâh gives as spoil to His Messenger from them, you urge not any horse or riding-camel. But Allâh gives authority to His Messengers against whom He wills. Lo! Allâh is Most Capable of doing whatever He desires.

7.MunirMezyed2023: That which Allâh gives as spoil to His Messenger from the people of the towns: it is for (the cause of) Allâh and for the Messenger, as well as for the near of kin, the orphans, the needy ones and the wayfarer, so that it may not become a fortune used by the rich among you. So whatever the Messenger gives you, accept it (with pleasure). And whatever he forbids, abstain from it and do act piously toward Allâh. Verily, Allâh is extremely severe in punishment.

8.MunirMezyed2023: The spoils of war is for the poor immigrants who were expelled from their homes and their possessions, seeking bounty from Allâh and His pleasure, and for giving support to the cause of Allâh and His Messenger. These are indeed the truthful.

9.MunirMezyed2023: As for those who had homes in the City (Medina), and adhered to Faith before the arrival of the immigrants, they love whoever immigrates to them, do not find in their hearts any need of that which those others have been given, and prefer (the immigrants) over themselves even though they may be in need. Whoever is protected from their own parsimony, they are the ones who will ultimately achieve a blissful life / or gain eternal salvation.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And those who come after them will say: “Our Lord! Forgive us and our brethren, who were before us in faith, and leave not in our hearts any malevolence toward those who live by Faith. Our Lord! You are indeed Full of Compassion, Most Merciful.”

11.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen the behavior of those who indulge in hypocrisy? They say to their brethren who fell away from the Faith among the people of the Scripture: “If it happens that you are expelled, we will surely leave with you. And we will never yield to the whims of anyone who is against you. And if it happens that you are attacked, we will assist you and go with you to fight by your side.” But Allâh bears witness that they are truly the inventors of lying.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, if it happens that they are expelled, those who indulge in hypocrisy will never leave with them. And if it happens that they are attacked, they will never assist them and go to fight with their side. Consequently, if they were to assist them and to go to fight with their side, they would turn their back and flee from the battle, leaving them helpless.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, there is more fear in their hearts for you than for (the wrath of) Allâh. That is because they are a people who do lack the spiritual wisdom and understanding.

14.MunirMezyed2023: They will not venture to fight against you all together except in fortified villages or from behind walls. Their brutality among themselves is very intense. You would think they were united but the fact is that their hearts are divided. That is because they are a people who lack the ability to perceive and understand.

15.MunirMezyed2023: They are like the example of those who, a short time before, tasted the dreadful consequences of their evil deeds, and they will have to incur a painful chastisement.

16.MunirMezyed2023: (Those who indulge in hypocrisy are) like the example of Satan when he says to the human being: "Abnegate (the Absolute Oneness of) Allâh." But when he abnegates, he says (to him): "Indeed, I disown you. I fear (the wrath of) Allâh, the Lord of all the beings".

17.MunirMezyed2023: So the consequences for both of them will be that they will be in the Fire: therein they will live forever. This is the chastisement for those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

18.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! act piously towards Allâh. And let every person look to what it has sent forth for the morrow. Act piously towards Allâh. For He is most certainly All-Aware of whatsoever you do.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Do not be like those who forgot to act piously toward Allâh and so He caused them to forget their own selves. These are the ones who indulge in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Not equal are the Denizens of Hell and the Denizens of Al-Jannah. The Denizens of Al-Jannah are (indeed) the ones who have achieved eternal salvation.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Had We caused this Qur’ān to descend upon a mountain, you would certainly have seen it falling down, splitting asunder out of reverence and awe of Allâh. We set forth these parables to men so that they may persist in meditation.

22.MunirMezyed2023: He is Allâh besides Whom there is no other god, the All-Knowing of the unseen and the visible. He is the True Merciful, the Most Merciful.

23.MunirMezyed2023: He is Allâh besides Whom there is no other God, the Sovereign, the Holy One, the Giver of Peace, the Giver of Security, the Guardian, the Almighty, the Omnipotent, the Supreme. All Glory Be To Allâh from all whatsoever they associate with Him.

24.MunirMezyed2023: He is Allâh, the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner. Unto Him belong the Most Honorable and Gracious Names. Whatever is in the heavens or on the earth does celebrate His praise and declare His absolute majesty and glory. For He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.

60.SurahEnglishNames: She That is to be Examined, Examining her, She Who is Tested

1.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith, do not take My enemies and your enemies as trusted allies, demonstrating your own love for them when they have refused to yield to the Truth that has come to you, and have already driven the Messenger and yourselves out of your homes merely because you have affirmed your Faith in Allâh (Almighty) as your Lord. If it happens that you have gone forth to struggle in My cause and seek My good pleasure, (then do not take them as trusted allies). You secretly convey affection to them and I am Fully Aware of whatsoever you divulge and whatsoever you conceal. And whoever of you does this has truly deviated from the path of truth.

2.MunirMezyed2023: If they gain dominance over you, they will still regard you as their enemies; and they will stretch forth their hands and tongues against you with evil. They earnestly desire that you renounce your (Monotheistic) Faith.

3.MunirMezyed2023: Neither your relatives nor your children will avail you on the Day of Resurrection (If they distract you from serving Allâh). He will judge among you. Lo! Allâh is the All-Seer of whatsoever you do.

4.MunirMezyed2023: There is an excellent pattern for you in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their own people: “Indeed, we disown you and the idols which you worship (& venerate) besides Allâh. We renounce you, and there has arisen between us animosity and hatred forever until you Adhere to Monotheistic Faith”- except the saying of Abraham to his father: "Indeed, I will pray for your Forgiveness, but I have no power to do aught for you against the (the punishment of) Allâh (if you persist in associating partners with Him). They prayed: "Our Lord, We depend on you with full trust. And unto You Alone do we tum in repentance. And for unto You is all journeys' end.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Our Lord! Do not Make us a prey for those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth, and forgive us, our Lord. Indeed, You, only You are the Almighty, the All-Wise."

6.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, there is an excellent pattern in them for you, (O' monotheistic believers),- for whoever hopes (to attain the good pleasure of) Allâh and (to be delivered from His punishment) on the Last Day. Whoever falls away from the Faith (needs to know that) Allâh is indeed Self-Sufficient and the Owner of Praise.

7.MunirMezyed2023: It might happen that Allâh will ordain love between you and those whom you hold as enemies. Allâh is All-powerful. He is Oft- Forgiving, Most Merciful.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh does not  forbid you to show kindness or to deal justly with those who have not fought against you on account of your religion or driven you forth from your homes. Indeed Allâh demonstrates His own love for those who are guided by truth.

9.MunirMezyed2023: He only forbids you (to take for allies) those who fought against you on account of your faith and belief, expelled you from your homes and assisted others in your expulsion. Whoever takes them as trusted allies, these are the ones who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

10.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! When the monotheistic women come to you as migrants, examine them (to see if they truly Adhere to Absolute Monotheism) - Allâh is perfectly aware of their faith- Once you find out that they Adhere to Absolute Monotheism (and live before the face of Allâh), do not send them back to the Polytheists. They are not lawful (wives) for the Polytheists, nor are the (Polytheists) lawful (husbands) for them. Now, therefore, pay the Polytheists the (amount of money) that which they have spent (on their dowries). You would not be at fault if you (desire to) marry them after having given them their dowries. Lo! (O’ Monotheistic Believers), do not hold matrimonial ties with the polytheistic women: ask for what you have spent (on their  dowries), and let them ask for what the Polytheists have spent. That is the verdict of Allâh. He judges between you. Lo! Allâh is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

11.MunirMezyed2023: And if any of your wives ran away from you to the Polytheists and she did not give you back the dowry which you spent on her, then let the Muslims pay back such dowry from the property of the Polytheists which may come into their hands. So act piously towards Allâh in Whom you have affirmed your Faith.

12.MunirMezyed2023: O’ Prophet! When the monotheistic women come to you to give you the pledge that they will not associate anything in worship with Allâh (Almighty), that they will not steal, that they will not commit adultery, that they will not kill their own children, that they will not bring a calumny which they have forged of themselves, and that they will not disobey you in what is right, then accept their pledge and pray to Allâh to forgive them. Most assuredly Allâh is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

13.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! Make no friendship with a folk who incurred the wrath of Allâh! Indeed, they have despaired of the Hereafter as those who have no Faith in Allâh despaired of those in the graves.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is on the earth celebrates the praise of Allâh and declares His absolute majesty and glory. He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.

2.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! Why do you say that which you do not strive diligently to accomplish.?

3.MunirMezyed2023: The most detestable thing in the sight of Allâh is that you say what you do not strive diligently to accomplish.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Verily Allâh demonstrates His own love for those who fight (bravely) in His cause in rows as if they were a solid structure.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Behold! Moses said to his people: "Why do you intend to hurt me when you know very well that I am a Messenger of Allâh to you?” So when they have deviated from the path of truth, Allâh caused their hearts to deviate from the path of truth. And Allâh holds back the Light of His Inspiration form those who indulge in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Behold! Jesus, son of Mary, said: "O’ Children of Israel, I am the Messenger of Allâh to you, verifying that which was revealed before me in the Torah, and bringing the glad tidings of a Messenger who will come after me, whose name will be Ahmed. But when he came to them with with the irrefutable Sign, they say: "This is clearly nothing but Magical Rhetoric."

7.MunirMezyed2023: Ah! Who then does greater evil than one who attributes falsehood to Allâh when he is being invited to embrace Islam? Lo! Allâh holds back the Light of His Inspiration form a people who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

8.MunirMezyed2023: They diligently strive to extinguish the Light of Allâh with their mouths, but Allâh intends no other than to perfect His Light. No matter how detestable is this may be to those who are spiritually dead and blind.

9.MunirMezyed2023: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with the True Source of enlightenment, and with the Religion of Truth, in order to overshadow all other religions. No matter how detestable is this may be to those who excessively indulge in Polytheism.

10.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! Shall I lead you to a commerce that will deliver you from a painful doom?

11.MunirMezyed2023: To have Absolute Faith in Allâh and His Messenger and to strive diligently in the cause of Allâh with your wealth and your lives. That would be the best for you if you only knew.

12.MunirMezyed2023: He will He will deliver you from all the consequences of your iniquitous deeds, and admit you into Gardens beneath which rivers flow and beautiful mansions in the gardens of perpetual abode. Such reward is indeed the ultimate success and the supreme one.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Additionally, there is something you truly long for: victory from Allâh and an imminent conquest. Now, therefore, give the glad tidings to those who live a life of Genuine Faith.

14.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! Be great supporters of Allâh as Jesus, son of Mary, (when) he said unto the disciples: "Who are my supporters of  Allâh?" The disciples said: We are (indeed) the supporters of Allâh. So a party of the Children of Israel Adhered to Faith, and another party fell away from the Faith. We then strengthened and supported those who Adhered to Faith against their enemy. So they became masters.

62.SurahEnglishNames: The Congregation, Friday, The Day of Congregation

1.MunirMezyed2023: Whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is on the earth celebrates the praise of Allâh and declares His absolute majesty and glory: the King, the Holy, the Almighty, the All- Wise.

2.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who sent among the inhabitants of Mecca a Messenger of their own race reciting to them the Qur'ānic Verses, purifying them (from Polytheism & Atheism), and teaching them the spirit of wisdom and the Book, although heretofore they were indeed in utter deception,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Along with others of them who have not joined them yet. Lo! He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.

4.MunirMezyed2023: That is the Bounty of Allâh: He grants it to whom He wills. Lo! Allâh is the Lord of the Mighty Grace.

5.MunirMezyed2023: The likeness of those who were charged with the Torah and then they did not observe it is as the likeness of a donkey carrying big load of books. Evil is the parable of the people who persistently refuse to yield to what Allâh has revealed. Lo! Allâh holds back the Light of His inspiration form those  who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "O’ you, who are Jews, if you truly claim to be the devoted servants of Allâh, excluding the other people, then invoke death if you were really truthful."

7.MunirMezyed2023: But they will never invoke it because of what their hands have sent before. Lo! Allâh is Fully Aware of those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Indeed, the death from which you run away will certainly overtake you, and then you will be sent back to the One who has full knowledge of the unseen and the visible. Lo! He will inform you of whatever you used to do."

9.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! When the call to Prayer is made on Friday, hasten to celebrate the praise of Allâh and declare His absolute majesty and glory, and leave off all businesses. This is better for you If only you knew.

10.MunirMezyed2023: However, when the prayer is ended, you may spread through the land, seek of the bounty of Allâh, and celebrate the praise of Allâh and declare His absolute majesty and glory so much in order that you may achieve salvation /or blissful life.

11.MunirMezyed2023: (Just by chance) when some of them come across a business deal, or some entertainment, they rush towards it and leave you alone standing. Say: "That which Allâh has is far better than entertainment or transaction. And Allâh is the Best of providers."

1.MunirMezyed2023: When those who make a false profession of Faith come to you, they say: "We bear witness that you are indeed the Messenger of Allâh".  Allâh already knows that you are indeed His Messenger, and He bears witness that those who make a false profession of faith are truly the inventors of lying.

2.MunirMezyed2023: They have taken their oaths as a cover, and barred (men) from (striving) in the way of Allâh. Evil indeed is that which they are wont to do.

3.MunirMezyed2023: That is because they came to Faith and then abandoned it. So their hearts have been sealed. They are a people who have low emotional intelligence.

4.MunirMezyed2023: When you see them, you may be impressed by their looks, and when they speak, their words may sink into your ears. They are like standing logs. They think that every cry is against them. They are the real enemy, so beware of them. May Allâh assail them! How can they be (easily) deceived into going away from the Truth?

5.MunirMezyed2023: When it is said to them: "Come and let the Messenger of Allâh pray for your forgiveness," they turn aside their heads, and you see them arrogantly evading.

6.MunirMezyed2023: It is the same for them whether you pray for their forgiveness or not. Allâh will not forgive them. Surely Allâh holds back the light of His inspiration from a people who indulge in personal disobedience extensively without repentance.

7.MunirMezyed2023: They are the ones who say: "Spend nothing on those who are with the Messenger of Allâh till they (are compelled to) abandon him.”  Yet the treasures of the heavens and the earth are the property of Allâh. But those who make a false profession of faith do lack the spiritual wisdom and understanding.

8.MunirMezyed2023: They say: "If it happens that we return to Medina, the powerful ones will most definitely expel therefrom the meaner." (They are absolutely wrong), for honor, (power, and might) belong unto Allâh, unto His Messenger and unto the Monotheistic Believers of Unfeigned Faith. But those who make a false profession of will never be able to understand the truth.

9.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! Do not let your wealth or your children divert you from celebrating the praise of Allâh and declaring His absolute majesty and glory. And whoever does that- these are the ones who are doomed to eternal perdition.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, expend of that wherewith We have provided you before death comes to one of you, and then he will say: "My Lord, if only You would reprieve me for a little while, I would then give alms and join the righteous!"

11.MunirMezyed2023: But Allâh will never delay the predetermined time of death for any person. Lo! Allâh is Fully Aware of whatever you do.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth celebrates the praise of Allâh and declares His glory. Unto Him belongs the (absolute) sovereignty (of the heavens & earth). To Him belongs the kingdom, and to Him is due all praise. Lo! He is Most Capable of doing whatever He desires.

2.MunirMezyed2023: It is He who created you, yet one of you is an Impious and another of you is a Pious . And Allâh is All-Seeing of whatsoever you do.

3.MunirMezyed2023: He created the heavens and the earth for a genuine reason, shaped and perfected your shape. And to Him is the journey’s end.

4.MunirMezyed2023: He has full knowledge of whatsoever is in the heavens and on the earth. And He (also) knows well whatever you divulge and whatever you conceal. Lo! Allâh is Full Aware of whatsoever is stored up in the hearts.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Has there not come to you the stories of those who persistently refused to yield to the Truth aforetime? So they tasted the horrific consequences of their iniquitous deeds. And they will be subjected to a painful punishment (in the Hereafter):

6.MunirMezyed2023: That was because their Messengers came to them with the irrefutable Signs, but they said: ”Shall we let human being lead us?” So they persistently refused to yield to the Truth and fell away from the Faith. Lo! Allâh is above all need. And lo! Allâh is Self-sufficient, Worthy of all praise.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Those who persistently refused to yield to the Truth claim that they will never be resurrected. Say: “Yes indeed, by my Lord, you will be resurrected, then you will be informed of whatsoever you did. Lo! This is an easy task for Allâh.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, affirm your Faith in Allâh and His Messenger, and in the Light, which He has revealed. Lo! Allâh is Fully Aware of whatsoever you do.

9.MunirMezyed2023: (Beware) of a day when He will gather you all for the Day of Assembling- that will be a day of Mutual Disillusion. As for those who affirm their Faith in Allah and strive to do righteous acts, they will be delivered from all the consequences of their iniquitous deeds and admitted into Gardens beneath which rivers flow wherein they will dwell forever. This is the ultimate success and the supreme one.

10.MunirMezyed2023: As for those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth and deny what Allah has revealed, they will be the Denizens of Hell wherein they will dwell forever- And what a dreadful journey’s end!

11.MunirMezyed2023: No calamity befalls except by the permission of Allâh. Whoever affirms his Faith in (the Absolute Oneness of) Allâh - He will enlighten the (eyes of) his heart. Lo! Allâh has full knowledge of everything.
