12.MunirMezyed2023: Now yield to (the commandments of) Allâh and (to what Has revealed to His) Messenger! But if it happens that you fall away (from the faith), then (bear in mind that) the only thing is incumbent on Our Messenger to convey the Message clearly.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh! There is no other God beside Him. Now, therefore, let the Monotheistic Believers of Unfeigned Faith depend on Allâh with full trust.

14.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who live by Faith! (those who distract you from serving Allâh) among your wives and children are your enemies. So beware of them. However, if you pardon, forget and forgive, then (you can rest assured that) Allâh is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

15.MunirMezyed2023: (Beware that) your wealth and children are only a trial, and Allâh is the One Who has a great reward (for you).

16.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, act piously towards Allâh as much as you can, listen (attentively), yield (to what Has been revealed to the Prophet) and spend (money on charitable activities) for the sake of your own happiness. Whoever is saved from his own avarice, such are the ones who will ultimately achieve a blissful life / or gain eternal salvation.

17.MunirMezyed2023: If it happens that you lend to Allâh a righteous loan, He will double it for you and forgive you. Allâh is Most Appreciative, Most Forbearing.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! He has full knowledge of the unseen and the visible- the Almighty, the All-Wise.

1.MunirMezyed2023: O’ Prophet! When you, (O' Muslims), divorce women, divorce them for their prescribed time, calculate the number of the days prescribed and act piously toward Allâh, your Lord. Evict them not from their homes; neither let them go forth unless they commit a proven adultery. These are the limits of Allâh. Whoever transgresses the limits of Allâh has wronged himself. You never know: maybe Allâh will cause something new to happen after that.

2.MunirMezyed2023: Then, when they have reached their prescribed time, either take them according to an acceptable terms or part with them according to an acceptable term.  Call to witness two men of justice from among you and give upright testimony for Allâh. That is an admonition given to the one who has affirmed his Faith in (the Absolute Oneness of) Allâh and in the Last Day. Whosoever acts piously towards Allâh, He will make a way out for him.

3.MunirMezyed2023: And He will provide him the means of subsistence from where he does not expects. Whoever depends on Allâh with full trust, (let him be sure that) Allâh is Sufficient for him. Verily Allâh will accomplish His command. Most surely Allâh has set a measure for all things.

4.MunirMezyed2023: As for the women who have reached menopause - if you have any doubts- their prescribed time will be three months, along with those who do not have it. However, for those who are pregnant, their prescribed time is until they lay down their burdens. Whosoever acts piously towards Allâh, He will make his affair be easy for him.

5.MunirMezyed2023: That is the Command of Allâh, which He has sent down to you. Whosoever acts piously towards Allâh, He will deliver him from all the consequences of his iniquitous deeds and magnify his reward.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Lodge them where you live according to your means and do not intimidate them in order to make their life intolerable. If they are pregnant, then spend on them till they deliver. If they breast-feed your children, you have to pay them their wages and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way. If you are unable to resolve your disputes, then you can hire another woman to nurse the child.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, let the wealthy man expend according to his means, and the poor expend from what Allâh has given him. Allâh does not charge a person except with that He has given him. Allâh will bring about ease after hardship.

8.MunirMezyed2023: So many inhabitants revolted against the command of their Lord and His Messengers. Therefore, We called them to a stern account and chastised them with a dreadful punishment.

9.MunirMezyed2023: They tasted the horrific consequences of their conduct, and the outcome of their affair was perdition.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh has prepared for them a severe punishment. Now, Therefore, act piously toward Allâh, O’ you men who possess high intelligence and great illumination. O’ you who live by Faith! Allâh has indeed revealed to you the Book of Enlightenment Quotes - (the Revealer of Truth, the Qur’ān).

11.MunirMezyed2023: (He has also sent to you) a Messenger who recites to you the Verses of Allâh as a conclusive evidence so that He may bring those who Live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts out of darkness into the light. Whoever affirms his faith (in the Absolute Oneness of) Allâh and strives to do righteous acts, He will admit him into Gardens underneath which rivers flow where they will live in forever. And Allâh has indeed made splendid provision for him.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh is the One Who created seven heavens and of the earth the like thereof. His Command descends between them so that you may know that Allâh is Most Capable of doing whatever He desires, and that Allâh encompasses all things in His Knowledge.

1.MunirMezyed2023: O’ Prophet! Why do you forbid what Allâh has made lawful for you, striving diligently to please your wives? Lo! Allâh is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

2.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh indeed has sanctioned for you the expiation of your oaths. Lo! Allâh is your Guardian, the All-Knowing and the All-Wise.

3.MunirMezyed2023: The Prophet disclosed a matter in confidence to one of his wives- (Hafsa bint Umar)- and then she divulged the secret to (Ā'ishah bint Abī Bakr). Lo! Allâh made it known to him. So he informed his wife of part of the issue and disregarded part. She asked: "Who informed you of this?" He said: "I was informed by the One Who is the All-Knowing, the All-Aware.”

4.MunirMezyed2023: If you both, (Hafsa & Ā'ishah), turn to Allâh in repentance, ( it will be better for you both as) your hearts are indeed so inclined (to oppose what the Prophet likes). But if it happens that you band together against him, (then bear in mind that) Allâh is his Guardian, as also Gabriel and the righteous among the Monotheistic Believers, and further more all the Angels are also his supporters.

5.MunirMezyed2023: It may happen that his Lord, if he divorces you, will substitute other wives in your place, who are better than you, submissive, faithful, obedient, repentant, worshipers, given to fasting, either previously married, or virgins.

6.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! Guard yourselves and your families against a Fire whose fuel is men and stones. Over it are Angels, vigorous and vehement. They comply with everything Allâh has commanded them. And they do whatever they are commanded.

7.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth! Make no excuses for yourselves this day. You are only being paid for what you used to do.

8.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who Live by Faith! Turn to Allâh with truthful repentance, may be that your Lord intends to deliver you from all the consequences of your iniquitous deeds and admit you into Gardens underneath which rivers flow on the day on which Allâh will not humiliate the Prophet and those who Live by Faith with him. Their light will coruscate before them on their right hands. They will say: “Our Lord, make our light perfect for us and forgive us! Lo! You are Most Capable of doing whatever You desire.”

9.MunirMezyed2023: O’ Prophet, strive diligently against those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth and those who make a false profession of Faith. And be so tough on them. Their abode will be Hellfire. What a dreadful  journey’s end!

10.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh sets forth an example for those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of our righteous servants but they both betrayed them. So they did not benefit them against (the wrath of) Allâh, and it was said unto them: “Enter both the Fire along with those who enter."

11.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh sets forth an example to those who live by Faith: the wife of Pharaoh when she said: "My Lord, build a home for me in Al-Jannah near you, save me from Pharaoh and his work, and save me from those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims”.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Also Mary, the daughter of ‘Imrān, who guarded her chastity. So We breathed into her of Our Spirit. She placed her Faith in the Word of her Lord and in His Scriptures; and was among of the obedient.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Most exalted is the One in whose hand is the (absolute) sovereignty (of the heavens and the earth). And He is Most Capable of doing whatever He Desires .

2.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who created life and death so that He may let you experience hardship in order to identify which of you is best in deeds. Lo! He is the Almighty, the Oft-Forgiving,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Who has created the seven heavens in layers. You can see no imperfection in the creation of the True Merciful (God). Then cast your eyes again, turn them toward the heaven: can you detect a single flaw?

4.MunirMezyed2023: Then look again and again: your sight will return in the end to you completely humbled and exhausted.

5.MunirMezyed2023: And verily We adorned the lowest heavens with lamps and made them as missile launch facilities to strike against the devils. For them We have prepared a punishment of the blazing Fire .

6.MunirMezyed2023: (We have also prepared) for those who have no Faith in their Lord the punishment of Hellfire- What a dreadful journey’s end!

7.MunirMezyed2023: When they are cast into Hellfire, they will hear it terribly roaring as it boils.

8.MunirMezyed2023: It almost bursts up with fury. Every time a group is thrown into Hellfire, its keepers will ask them: "Did none come to you to warn?"

9.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: "Yes indeed! A messenger did come to warn us, but we accused him of lying and told him: “Allâh has revealed nothing and you are only in utter deception.”

10.MunirMezyed2023: They also say: "If we had discerned and used our intelligence, we would not have been among the Denizens of the Inferno."

11.MunirMezyed2023: So they confessed their iniquitous deeds. Now the Denizens of Hell are deprived (of the Mercy of Allâh).

12.MunirMezyed2023: Surely those who show honor and reverence for their Lord in secret will have forgiveness and a great reward.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Whether you conceal your word or disclose it, Allâh is Fully Aware of whatsoever is stored up in the hearts.

14.MunirMezyed2023: How could He who has created all creation does not know about His own creation? And He is the Subtle, the All-Aware.

15.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who has made the earth subservient to you, so walk in the path thereof and eat of His provision. To Him will be the resurrection.

16.MunirMezyed2023: Do you feel secure that the One Who is in the heavens will not cause you to sink into the earth when it is quivering violently?

17.MunirMezyed2023: Or do you feel secure that the One Who is in the heavens will not send against you a violent whirlwind? Then you will come to know how serious the warning was.

18.MunirMezyed2023: And verily those who were before them denied (the Messengers of Allâh).  And how dreadful was My condemnation!

19.MunirMezyed2023: Do they not see the birds above them spreading out their wings and closing them? Nothing upholds them except the True Merciful (God). Indeed, He is the All-Seer of everything.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Or who is it that will be a host for you to help you against (the divine retribution) besides the True Merciful (God)? Those who have no Faith in Allâh are in nothing but lost in a web of self-delusion.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Or who is it that will be provide you with means of sustenance if He withholds His provisions? Nay, but they persist in impudence and aversion.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Is he who walks with his head hanging down more rightly guided, or he who walks upright on a straight path?

23.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "He is the One Who brought you into being and endowed you with hearing, sight, and hearts. Yet you show little gratitude!

24.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "He is the One Who multiplies you in earth, and to Him will you be gathered together."

25.MunirMezyed2023: They say: “When will the promise- (Day of Judgment)- be fulfilled if you are truthful?"

26.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Such knowledge is with Allâh. I am only one who gives you genuine warnings."

27.MunirMezyed2023: But when they see it nigh, the faces of those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth will be distressed. It will be said (to them): "This is what you used to call for."

28.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Have you cogitated: If Allâh decides to obliterate me and those who are with me, or to shower us with His Mercy, who is there to protect those who have no Faith in Allâh from a painful punishment?"

29.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "He is the True Merciful (God). We do affirm our Faith in Him; and we do depend on Him with full trust. You, Polytheists, will soon know (when the punishment comes), and which of us has deviated from the truth!’

30.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Have you cogitated: If it happens that your water sinks away, who then, will bring you flowing water?!

1.MunirMezyed2023: Nu’on. By the pen and that which they inscribe:

2.MunirMezyed2023: You are not, by the Grace of your Lord, a madman.

3.MunirMezyed2023: For you, most surely, there will be a never-ending reward.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, You are endowed with sublime moral excellence.

5.MunirMezyed2023: You will see and they will also see

6.MunirMezyed2023: Which of you is infatuated with insanity.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly your Lord already knows who has deviated from His path. And He knows those who walk on the right path to salvation.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, pay no attention to those who are spiritually blind.

9.MunirMezyed2023: They would like to (see you) compromise so that they may also make compromises.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And pay no attention to any despicable oath-maker,

11.MunirMezyed2023: Slanderer, spreading vilification (in all directions),

12.MunirMezyed2023: Abandoning goodness in favour of falsehood, going beyond the bounds, willfully keeping on sinning

13.MunirMezyed2023: Willfully causing suffering to others, besides all that, morally corrupt,

14.MunirMezyed2023: Even though he possesses hug wealth and many children.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Whenever the Qur'ānic Verses are recited to him, he says: “Myths of the ancients."

16.MunirMezyed2023: We shall brand him on the snout.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, We have let them experience hardship as We let the owners of the cultivated orchard experience hardship when they swore to pluck all its fruits in the morning

18.MunirMezyed2023: Without saying: “If Allâh wills it.”

19.MunirMezyed2023: So there came upon it a visitation form your Lord when they were asleep.

20.MunirMezyed2023: It became like dark gloomy night.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Then they called out to each other in the early morning:

22.MunirMezyed2023: “Now go early to your cultivated orchard if you desire to pluck the fruits.”

23.MunirMezyed2023: So they set out while whispering to each other.

24.MunirMezyed2023: “Let not any poor enter it today when you are there.”

25.MunirMezyed2023: They went forth early in the morning, thinking that they were able to (drive the poor away from their orchard).

26.MunirMezyed2023: But when they saw it, they said: "Most surely we have lost our way:

27.MunirMezyed2023: No, but the fact is we are deprived.”

28.MunirMezyed2023: The most moderate one of them said: "Did I not tell you that you should celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare His absolute majesty and glory?"

29.MunirMezyed2023: They said: "Honor, power, and might belong to our Lord forever. We have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of our own whims."

30.MunirMezyed2023: Then they started casting blame on each other.

31.MunirMezyed2023: They said: "Woe betide us! Surely we were transgressors:

32.MunirMezyed2023: It may be that our Lord will give us in exchange a better (orchard) than this. Indeed, we turn in repentance to our Lord.”

33.MunirMezyed2023: Such is the punishment. Surely the punishment of the Hereafter is greater If only they knew.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Surely the Pious will have in the presence of their Lord Gardens of bliss.

35.MunirMezyed2023: Shall We then treat the ones who wholly submit (to the authority of Allâh) like the Ungodly Sinners?

36.MunirMezyed2023: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

37.MunirMezyed2023: Or do you have a book in which you learn

38.MunirMezyed2023: That you will indeed have whatever you choose (and desire)?

39.MunirMezyed2023: Or do you have covenant on oath from Us, extending until the day of Resurrection, that you will have whatever you demand?

40.MunirMezyed2023: Now ask them which of them will vouch for that,

41.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners if they are truthful.

42.MunirMezyed2023: On the Day of Judgement, Allâh will uncover His Shin, and the Ungodly Sinners will be ordered to prostrate themselves, but they will not be able.

43.MunirMezyed2023: Their eyes will be cast down, and humiliation will cover them, for they had been be called to prostrate themselves while they were whole.

44.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, leave Me alone with him who refuses this pronouncement. We will progressively lead them into their own destruction from whence they do not anticipate.

45.MunirMezyed2023: And I will give them respite. My plan is firmly established.

46.MunirMezyed2023: Or do you ask them to give you a reward (for your preaching) while they are heavily burdened with debt?

47.MunirMezyed2023: Or do they have (the knowledge of) the world of unseen, so they write (it) down?

48.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, wait with patience for the verdict of your Lord and do not be like the companion of the whale, (Jonah), who cried out in despair.

49.MunirMezyed2023: Had not been a grace from his Lord reached him, he would have been cast off onto the open land while he was still blameworthy

50.MunirMezyed2023: But his Lord chose him and made him among the righteous.

51.MunirMezyed2023: Those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth would almost smite you with their eyes when they hear a recitation from the Book of Enlightenment Quotes- (the Revealer of Truth, the Qur’ān). Then they say: “Surely he is a lunatic."

52.MunirMezyed2023: But it is not more than a of Enlightenment Quotes to all the beings.

1.MunirMezyed2023: The Inevitable Reality!

2.MunirMezyed2023: What is the Inevitable Reality?

3.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Inevitable Reality is?

4.MunirMezyed2023: (The people of) Thamūd and ‘Ād refused to admit the truth of the calamity.

5.MunirMezyed2023: As for the Thamūd, they were destroyed by loud and dreadful cry.

6.MunirMezyed2023: As for ‘Ād, they were destroyed by furious howling wind,

7.MunirMezyed2023: Which Allâh unleashed it upon them for seven nights and eight days continuously. Thus, you could see the people lying lifeless as if they were hollow trunks of date-palms!

8.MunirMezyed2023: Now, can you see any trace of them?!

9.MunirMezyed2023: Similarly, Pharaoh, and those who lived before him, and the overthrown cities- (all of them) indulged in iniquitous deeds,

10.MunirMezyed2023: And persistently refused to yield to what their Lord has revealed to His Messenger, and so He chastised them with a fierce punishment.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Truly when the waters rose high above the earth, We carried you in the floating (Ark)

12.MunirMezyed2023: So that We may make this a lesson for you, and that those who attentively listen will take close heed (of the warnings).

13.MunirMezyed2023: Then when the Trumpet will be blown with one blast,

14.MunirMezyed2023: The earth and the mountains will be lifted up from their places and dashed to pieces with a single blow.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Then, on that day, the Inevitable Event will come to pass.

16.MunirMezyed2023: The heavens will split asunder and become frail on that day

17.MunirMezyed2023: While the Angel will be on its sides. Eight of them, on that day, will carry the (Glorious) Throne of your Lord above all the creatures.

18.MunirMezyed2023: On that day, you will be brought (before your Lord): all the secrets of yours will be laid bare.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Then as for him who is given his record book in his right hand, he will say: "Here, take and read my book!.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Surely I knew that I would meet my account.”

21.MunirMezyed2023: So he will be in a delightful life,

22.MunirMezyed2023: In a lofty Garden:

23.MunirMezyed2023: Its fruits are within reach.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Eat and drink pleasantly for what you put forth in the days past.

25.MunirMezyed2023: However, as for him who is given his record book in his left hand, he will say: "I wish that I had not been given my book,

26.MunirMezyed2023: And that I had not known what my account was.

27.MunirMezyed2023: I wish death had been the end.

28.MunirMezyed2023: My wealth has not availed me,

29.MunirMezyed2023: (And) I have lost the power of influence.”

30.MunirMezyed2023: Now seize him, then shackle him,

31.MunirMezyed2023: Then throw him into the Inferno,

32.MunirMezyed2023: And then tie him up with a chain whereof the length is seventy cubits.

33.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly he had no Faith in Allâh, the Most Great.

34.MunirMezyed2023: He did not urge on the feeding of the poor.

35.MunirMezyed2023: So, this day, he will have no true friend here

36.MunirMezyed2023: Neither any food (to eat) but pus.

37.MunirMezyed2023: Which none eats it but the Ungodly Sinners.

38.MunirMezyed2023: But nay! I swear by all that you see

39.MunirMezyed2023: And by all that you do not see.

40.MunirMezyed2023: This (Qur’ān) is most definitely the utterance of an honorable messenger.

41.MunirMezyed2023: It is not the utterance of a poet. You have so little faith!

42.MunirMezyed2023: It is not the utterance of sage. You have little reason to heed .

43.MunirMezyed2023: It is Revelation Knowledge from the Lord of all the worlds.

44.MunirMezyed2023: If he had invented false sayings about Us,

45.MunirMezyed2023: We would definitely have taken him by the right hand,

46.MunirMezyed2023: Then cut off his aorta.

47.MunirMezyed2023: No one of you would be able to prevent Us from punishing him.

48.MunirMezyed2023: Verily (this Qur’ān) is a Book of  Enlightenment Quotes  for the Pious.

49.MunirMezyed2023: And most assuredly We know that there are some among you who are spiritually blind.

50.MunirMezyed2023: Verily (this Qur’ān) is a source of bitter regret for the spiritually blind.

51.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, It is the Absolute Truth.

52.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Spiritually blind person has demanded a (divine) retribution bound to come

2.MunirMezyed2023: For those who are spiritually dead and blind- which none can avert-

3.MunirMezyed2023: From Allâh, the Lord of the Ascending Stairways.

4.MunirMezyed2023: The Angels and the holy spirit- (Archangel Gabriel)- ascend to Him in a day whereof the measure of which is fifty thousand years.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, cling to patience with adorable patience.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Verily they see that (day) as a far-off (event),

7.MunirMezyed2023: Whereas We see it very near.

8.MunirMezyed2023: On that day the sky will become like molten copper,

9.MunirMezyed2023: And the mountains like flakes of wool.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And no friend will ask his friend (about his condition)

11.MunirMezyed2023: Though they are made to see each other. The Ungodly Sinner wishes he would be able to ransom himself from the chastisement of that day by (sacrificing) his children,

12.MunirMezyed2023: His wife, his brother,

13.MunirMezyed2023: And his kinsfolk who sheltered him,

14.MunirMezyed2023: Even all the people on earth if that would save him.

15.MunirMezyed2023: But nay! Indeed, it is a Flaming Fire,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Extremely eager for burning.

17.MunirMezyed2023: It will claim whoever turned away (from the truth)

18.MunirMezyed2023: Hoarded wealth and withheld it.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, man  has a (natural tendency) to be quickly irritated

20.MunirMezyed2023: Extremely anxious when he is touched by evil,

21.MunirMezyed2023: Niggardly when he is touched by richness;

22.MunirMezyed2023: Except for those who who  pray,

23.MunirMezyed2023: Persistent in performing their prayer,

24.MunirMezyed2023: And who give a due share of their wealth

25.MunirMezyed2023: To the beggar and the needy,

26.MunirMezyed2023: And who have Absolute Faith in the Day of Judgment,

27.MunirMezyed2023: And those who desire to be saved from the punishment of their Lord-

28.MunirMezyed2023: For they know that none should feel secure from punishment of their Lord-

29.MunirMezyed2023: And those who guard their chastity

30.MunirMezyed2023: Except from their wives and those whom their right hands possess, in such a case they are free from blame-

31.MunirMezyed2023: But those who go beyond this are the transgressors-

32.MunirMezyed2023: And those who are faithful to their trusts and their covenant,

33.MunirMezyed2023: And those who stand firm in their testimonies;

34.MunirMezyed2023: And those who always maintain their prayer.

35.MunirMezyed2023: These will be highly honored in the Garden of Bliss

36.MunirMezyed2023: What is the matter with the those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth, that they rush towards you with outstretched necks

37.MunirMezyed2023: And staring eyes from the right and from the left in scattered groups?!

38.MunirMezyed2023: Does every one of them hope to be admitted to the Paradise of Bliss?

39.MunirMezyed2023: Nay, indeed, We have created them out of what they know.

40.MunirMezyed2023: But nay! I swear by the Lord of the Eastern and Western regions that We are surely able

41.MunirMezyed2023: To replace them by others better than them. We are not to be outrun.

42.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, leave them alone to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their day which they are promised.

43.MunirMezyed2023: The day when they come out of the graves in haste as though they were racing to a goal

44.MunirMezyed2023: With their eyes lowered in fear and humility, while humiliation covering them. Such is the day which they are promised.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, We sent forth Noah (as Our Messenger) to his people, (informing him): "Warn your people (not to worship other than Allâh) before a painful doom overtakes them."

2.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "O’ my people, I am truly sent to you to deliver a severe warning:

3.MunirMezyed2023: Worship Allâh (in the way He wants you to worship Him), act piously towards Him and yield to what has been revealed to me.

4.MunirMezyed2023: He himself will deliver you from all the consequences of your iniquitous deeds and grant you a respite till an appointed time- (your death). Surely, when the term of Allâh- (His punishment)- comes, -if you do not live by Faith- it cannot be postponed, If only knew.

5.MunirMezyed2023: He said: "O’ my Lord, I have been inviting my people (to adhere to the Monotheistic Faith) night and day,

6.MunirMezyed2023: But my invitations to adhere to Faith have only made them turn further away from it!

7.MunirMezyed2023: And indeed whenever I call them to affirm their Faith in You so that You may forgive them, they thrust their fingers into their ears, cover themselves with their garments, persist in denial and display an arrogant attitude (toward Your authority) with excessive pride.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Then surely I called them (to adhere to Faith) openly,

9.MunirMezyed2023: Then surely I preached to them in public and in private.

10.MunirMezyed2023: “Ask your Lord for forgiveness, I said. “Verily  He is Oft-Forgiving.

11.MunirMezyed2023: He will send down upon you, from the sky, an abundance of rain .

12.MunirMezyed2023: He will supply you with wealth and children, and give you  gardens as well as rivers.

13.MunirMezyed2023: What is the matter with you that you do not show honor and reverence for Allâh

14.MunirMezyed2023: When He truly created you in successive stages?

15.MunirMezyed2023: Do you not see how Allâh created the seven heavens one above the other

16.MunirMezyed2023: And placed in them the moon for a light and the sun for a radiant lamp?

17.MunirMezyed2023: Behold! Allâh caused you to grow out of the earth like plants,

18.MunirMezyed2023: He will return you into it, then He will again bring you forth from it

19.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh spread out the earth as carpet for you

20.MunirMezyed2023: So that you may go along therein in its spacious pathways.’

21.MunirMezyed2023: Noah said: "My Lord, they have certainly refused to yield to what You have revealed to me and have instead yielded to the whims of one whose wealth and children have added to him nothing but perdition.”

22.MunirMezyed2023: (Their clan chiefs) have devised a mighty plot,

23.MunirMezyed2023: Urging (their followers): “Do not renounce your gods- especially Wadd, Suwâ, Yaghûth, Ya’ûq, and Nasr.”

24.MunirMezyed2023: (Their clan chiefs) have already deceived many into going away from the Truth. Noah supplicated: "My Lord, cause those who yield to their own whims to be greatly deceived.”

25.MunirMezyed2023: And so, because of their iniquitous deeds, they were drowned and admitted into the Fire. And they found none to help other than Allâh .

26.MunirMezyed2023: Noah said: "My Lord, leave not on earth any of those who are spiritually dead and blind.

27.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed if You spare any of them, they will certainly deceive Your servants into going away from the Truth and will beget only wicked and impious (children).

28.MunirMezyed2023: Forgive me, My Lord! Forgive my parents and whoever seeks refuge in my house as monotheistic believer, as well as the Monotheistic Believers of unfeigned Faith, men and women alike. Give nothing to those who who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims but ruin over ruin.”

1.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "It has been revealed to me that a group of the Jinn listened (attentively to the recitation of the Qurʾān). (When returning back to their fellow jinn), they said: “Most surely we have heard an extraordinary recitation:

2.MunirMezyed2023: The Qurʾān leads to righteousness. Since we have affirm our Faith in It, we shall never join in worship anyone or anything with our Lord.

3.MunirMezyed2023: Now, we come to believe that our Lord- Exalted is His Majesty- has not taken a wife or a son.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Surely the imprudent one (-Iblis-) among us used to utter blasphemous words against Allâh.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Surely we thought that mankind and Jinn would never venture to attribute falsehood to Allâh.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Most certainly some men used to seek refuge with certain individuals of the jinn so they made them bear their iniquities.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, those who persistently refused to yield to the Truth among mankind thought as we thought that Allâh would never send any Messenger.

8.MunirMezyed2023: And we have tried to reach out to the heavens, but we found it filled with vigorous guards and meteors.

9.MunirMezyed2023: We used, indeed, to sit in some of its seats and try to listen. But whoever tries to listen will find a meteor lying in wait form him.

10.MunirMezyed2023: We certainly do not know whether evil awaits those who are on the earth, or whether their Lord intends to lead them to righteousness.

11.MunirMezyed2023: There are among us some that are righteous, and some of us are otherwise. We are denominations, following different ways.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Now we have come to know that we could never frustrate the power of Allâh on the earth, neither could we frustrate His power by flight.

13.MunirMezyed2023: After hearing the Qur'ānic Verses, we do believe in It. Whoever has Faith in his Lord should not fear deprivation or injustice.

14.MunirMezyed2023: And some of us have wholly submitted (to the authority of Allâh), and some of us have deviated from the path of Truth. So as for those who wholly submit themselves completely to Allâh, it is they who have sought rectitude.

15.MunirMezyed2023: But those who deviate from the path of truth are the firewood for Gehenna.”

16.MunirMezyed2023: If they-(the Pagan Arabs)-followed the right path, We would certainly give to them abundant water to drink,

17.MunirMezyed2023: So that We may tempt them with it. But if it happens that anyone turns away from celebrating the praise of his Lord and declaring His glory, He will cause him to be subjected to a severe chastisement.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Mosques are meant only for Allâh, so do not invoke anyone along with Allâh.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Yet when the Obedient Devotee of Allâh stood up supplicating and praying to Allâh, the Jinn crowded closely together around him.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Most assuredly I only pray to my Lord, associating none with Him in worship.”

21.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "Surely, It is not my power to do you any harm or to help you attain righteousness.”

22.MunirMezyed2023: Say: “No one can ever protect me against the (wrath of) Allâh, neither can I find, apart from Him, a place of refuge.

23.MunirMezyed2023: I can do no more than I deliver what I receive from Allâh and His Messages. Whoever refuses to comply (with the command of) Allâh and (with what He has revealed to) His Messenger, for him is the Fire of Gehenna- therein they shall dwell forever.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Only when they see what they have been threatened with, then they will know who is really weaker in power, and fewer in number.

25.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "I do not know whether that which you are promised is near, or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term.”

26.MunirMezyed2023: (Allâh) is the One who has full knowledge of the Unseen. He does not reveal His Knowledge of the Unseen to anyone,

27.MunirMezyed2023: Except a Messenger whom He chooses. Verily He places a guard to go before and after him

28.MunirMezyed2023: So that He may manifest what He knows that they had truly delivered the Messages of their Lord. He encompasses whatever the Messengers have and He keeps strict count of all things.”

73.SurahEnglishNames: The Enshrouded One, Bundled Up, The Mantled One

1.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who wrap himself in garments!

2.MunirMezyed2023: Stand (to pray) all night, except for a little,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Half of it, or lessen it a little,

4.MunirMezyed2023: Or add to it, and recite the Qurʾān with measured rhythmic recitation.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely We will cast upon you a heavy speech.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, getting up at night for payer is the most potent for purifying (the heart), and the most effective in speech.

7.MunirMezyed2023: For during the day you are preoccupied with daily obligations.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Glorify the (Majestic) Name of your Lord. And devote yourself to Him with a complete devotion.

9.MunirMezyed2023: He is the Lord of the East and West. There is no other God beside Him, so take Him as your Guardian.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Endure patiently whatever they say and find a polite way to avoid them.

11.MunirMezyed2023: And let Me deal with those who are spiritually dead and blind who live an extravagant lifestyle and bear with them for a little while.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Verily We have prepared for them shackles and blazing fire,

13.MunirMezyed2023: As well as bitter foods and painful punishment.

14.MunirMezyed2023: And (mention) the day when the earth and the mountains will quake. And the mountains will turn to flowing sand dunes.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Verily We have sent to you a Messenger, a witness over you, just as We sent a Messenger to Pharaoh.

16.MunirMezyed2023: But Pharaoh refused to yield (to what We have revealed to) the Messenger, so We seized him with stern grip.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Then how- If you persist in denying the Truth- can you protect yourselves against a terrifying day that shall make the children grey-haired?.

18.MunirMezyed2023: On that day, even the sky will be rent asunder. His promise is bound to be fulfilled.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Surely this is an admonition, therefore, whoever wills, let him then take a way to his Lord.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Verily your Lord, (O' Muhammad), already knows that you stand (in prayer) sometimes nearly two-thirds of the night, or half of it or a third of it, and so does a party of those who are with you. Allah measures the night and the day. He  already knows that you-(Monotheistic Believers)- will not be able to pray all night, and so He has turned to you in forgiveness. Now, therefore, recite of the Qurʾān as much as is easy for you. He already knows that there will be among you sick, others travelling throughout the land, seeking the Bounty of Allâh; yet others fighting in the cause of Allâh. Recite, then, of the Qurʾān as much as is easy for you. Establish the regular Prayer, pay Zakāt (i.e. the Prescribed Purifying Alms), and give virtuous loans to Allâh. Whatever good thing you put forward for yourselves, you will find it with Allâh, better and greater in the reward. Thus, seek forgiveness of Allâh. Most certainly Allâh is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

74.SurahEnglishNames: The Cloaked One, The Man Wearing a Cloak, The Clothed One

1.MunirMezyed2023: O’ you who are covered up with your mantel!

2.MunirMezyed2023: Arise and warn!

3.MunirMezyed2023: Praise the glory of your Lord

4.MunirMezyed2023: And Purify your garments

5.MunirMezyed2023: Continue to abandon idols

6.MunirMezyed2023: Confer not a favor so as to acquire more.

7.MunirMezyed2023: And endure patiently for the sake of your Lord.

8.MunirMezyed2023: When the Trumpet is blown,

9.MunirMezyed2023: Then that day will be an arduous day-

10.MunirMezyed2023: Far from easy for those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth.

11.MunirMezyed2023: Leave to Me- (O' Prophet)- the one I created all by Myself,

12.MunirMezyed2023: And granted him extensive wealth

13.MunirMezyed2023: And children to be by his side.

14.MunirMezyed2023: I made his life run smoothly and comfortably.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Yet he desires that I should give more!

16.MunirMezyed2023: By no means! He has been truly stubborn to What We have revealed.

17.MunirMezyed2023: I will compel him to face a severe torment!

18.MunirMezyed2023: Verily He thought hard and contemplated.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Let him be deprived of Allâh's Mercy- How he contemplated!

20.MunirMezyed2023: And once more, let him be deprived of Allâh's Mercy- How he contemplated!

21.MunirMezyed2023: He looked around,

22.MunirMezyed2023: Then he frowned and scowled,

23.MunirMezyed2023: Then he turned his back and displayed an arrogant attitude,

24.MunirMezyed2023: Then he said: "This is nothing but mere magical incantation from the magic of the ancients.

25.MunirMezyed2023: This is not more than a word of human being."

26.MunirMezyed2023: I shall cast him into Gehenna.

27.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what Gehenna is?

28.MunirMezyed2023: It neither spares nor leaves behind!

29.MunirMezyed2023: It scorches the skin.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Over it, there are nineteen (Angels as its guards & keepers).

31.MunirMezyed2023: And We have not made the wardens of the Fire except Angels. And We have not made their number except as a temptation for those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth so that the people of the Book will be convinced (that this Qurʾān is absolutely the Word of Allâh) and the Faith of those who adhere to absolute Monotheism will be invigorated. And both the people of the Book and those who live by Faith will feel certain. And that those in whose hearts harbour doubts and the spiritual dead and blind will say: “What does Allâh mean by this parable?” This is how Allâh leaves astray whom He wills, and illuminates the path of whom He wills. And none really knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of (Gehenna) is no other than a warning to the people.

32.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed, by the moon,

33.MunirMezyed2023: By the night when it retreats,

34.MunirMezyed2023: And by daybreak when it coruscates,

35.MunirMezyed2023: Verily (Gehenna) is one of the greatest (tribulations),

36.MunirMezyed2023: A severe warning to the people,

37.MunirMezyed2023: To him among you who desires to go forward or to remain behind.

38.MunirMezyed2023: Every human person is held in pledge for what he earns

39.MunirMezyed2023: Except for the ones on the right hand

40.MunirMezyed2023: Who will be in Gardens, asking one another

41.MunirMezyed2023: About the Ungodly Sinners (who will then be asked):

42.MunirMezyed2023: ”How did you end up in Hell?”

43.MunirMezyed2023: They will say: "We were not among those who used to pray,

44.MunirMezyed2023: Neither did we use to feed the poor.

45.MunirMezyed2023: We used to indulge in vain disputes along with others.

46.MunirMezyed2023: And we used to deny the Day of Judgment,

47.MunirMezyed2023: Till the inevitable reality- (death)- overtook us.”

48.MunirMezyed2023: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no avail to them.

49.MunirMezyed2023: Now, what is the matter with them that they are running away from the Truth

50.MunirMezyed2023: As if they were frightened donkeys

51.MunirMezyed2023: Running away from a lion?!

52.MunirMezyed2023: Yes, every one of them desires that he would be given expanded scrolls.

53.MunirMezyed2023: No! But they do not fear the (outcomes of the) Hereafter!

54.MunirMezyed2023: No! Indeed this Qur'ān is a Book of Enlightenment- (Revelation of Truth)

55.MunirMezyed2023: So whoever wills may take close heed.

56.MunirMezyed2023: But they will not be heedful unless Allâh wills: He is the Lord of the Unfeigned Piety and the Lord of Forgiveness.

75.SurahEnglishNames: The Rising of the Dead, Resurrection

1.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! I swear by the Day of Resurrection:

2.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! I swear by the reproaching voice of the inner self:

3.MunirMezyed2023: Does man think that We are incapable of constructing his bones?

4.MunirMezyed2023: Yes indeed! We are Capable of shaping again his own fingertips.

5.MunirMezyed2023: But man has a natural inclination to evil,

6.MunirMezyed2023: (Sarcastically) asking, "When will this Day of Resurrection be?"

7.MunirMezyed2023: (It will be) when the sight is dazzled,

8.MunirMezyed2023: And the moon is eclipsed,

9.MunirMezyed2023: And the sun and the moon are brought together,

10.MunirMezyed2023: On that day man will cry: "Whither to flee?"

11.MunirMezyed2023: Nay! There is no refuge.

12.MunirMezyed2023: To your Lord, that day, is the refuge.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Man will then be fully informed of what he has sent forward and left behind.

14.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! Man will testify against himself,

15.MunirMezyed2023: Even if he offers his excuses.

16.MunirMezyed2023: Do not Move your tongue with it to hasten

17.MunirMezyed2023: It is incumbent on Us to collect and recite It.

18.MunirMezyed2023: So, when We recite It, just follow Its recitation.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Afterwards, it is also incumbent on Us to explain It.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Nay ! In fact, you are in love with this fleeting life;

21.MunirMezyed2023: And you show no interest in the Hereafter.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Some faces, that day, will be brightly glowing,

23.MunirMezyed2023: Looking at their Lord!

24.MunirMezyed2023: And other faces, that day, will be gloomy,

25.MunirMezyed2023: Thinking that a crushing calamity is about to fall on them.

26.MunirMezyed2023: No! But when the soul reaches the collarbone,

27.MunirMezyed2023: There will be a cry: “Where is the enchanter (who can save him).”

28.MunirMezyed2023: And the dying person becomes aware that it is the parting:

29.MunirMezyed2023: And then one of his legs is laid over the other.

30.MunirMezyed2023: On that day to your Lord will be the driving.

31.MunirMezyed2023: And the (impious) did not acknowledge (the Truth), neither did he pray.

32.MunirMezyed2023: But on the contrary, he persisted in denying (the Qur’ān), falling away from the Faith.

33.MunirMezyed2023: Then went off to his family, walking proudly with his head high.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! Your doom is coming closer and even closer!

35.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! Once more, your doom is coming closer and even closer!

36.MunirMezyed2023: Does man think that he will be left without purpose?

37.MunirMezyed2023: Was he not once a drop of fluid which gushed forth?

38.MunirMezyed2023: Afterwards he became a clinging clot; and Allâh formed and molded him,

39.MunirMezyed2023: And made of him pairs, male and female.

40.MunirMezyed2023: Is not He then Capable of bringing the dead back to life?

1.MunirMezyed2023: Has there come on man a period of time when he was not a thing even to be mentioned?

2.MunirMezyed2023: Verily We created man from a semen-drop mixture so as to test him. thus, We made him hear and see.

3.MunirMezyed2023: We already showed him the way: whether he chooses to be grateful or impious.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely We have prepared for those who are spiritually dead and blind chains, shackles and blazing fire.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Verily those who are Pure in Heart will be given a drink of pure wine flavoured with camphor,

6.MunirMezyed2023: A fountain where the servants of Allâh will drink, making it to gush forth abundantly.

7.MunirMezyed2023: They fulfill their vows, stand in awe of a day of sweeping terror,

8.MunirMezyed2023: And give food - in spite of their needs for it- to to the poor man the orphan, and the captive,

9.MunirMezyed2023: (Saying): “We only feed you for the countenance of Allâh, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! We stand in awe of a shockingly stressful day from our Lord."

11.MunirMezyed2023: So Allâh will protect them from the horror of that day, giving them vivacity and joy,

12.MunirMezyed2023: Rewarding them for what they patiently endured with a Garden and garments of fine silk.

13.MunirMezyed2023: They will recline therein on couches; and they will feel neither excessive heat nor freezing cold.

14.MunirMezyed2023: The shade of the Garden will be closely spread upon them while its fruit will be near and easy to be reached.

15.MunirMezyed2023: There will be made to pass around them, silver dishes and cups of crystal,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Transparent cups made of silver which they will determine the exact measure of drink.

17.MunirMezyed2023: They will be given a drink of pure wine flavoured with ginger

18.MunirMezyed2023: From a fountain called ‘Salsabīl.

19.MunirMezyed2023: They will be served by immortal youths. If you see them, you will think they were scattered pearls.

20.MunirMezyed2023: And if you look there in (Al-Jannah), you will see bliss and a great dominion.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Upon them will be green garments of fine silk and brocade, whereas they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will satisfy their thirst with a pure drink.

22.MunirMezyed2023: (They will be told): “All this is surely a reward for you. And your struggle has been appreciated."

23.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely, it is We who have sent down to you the Qurʾān progressively.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, be patient with the command of your Lord. Do not yield to the whims of any one of them- whoever is either a sinner or an impious.

25.MunirMezyed2023: And celebrate the (Glorious) Names of your Lord night and day.

26.MunirMezyed2023: And prostrate before Him during part of the night and glorify Him all night long.

27.MunirMezyed2023: Surely those (Polytheists) are in love with this worldly life, leaving behind them a heavy day.

28.MunirMezyed2023: It is We Who created them and perfectly shaped their bodies. But if  We will, We can easily replace them with others.

29.MunirMezyed2023: Surely this is an enlightenment quote, therefore, whoever wills, let him then take a way to his Lord.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Yet you will not, unless Allâh wills. Most certainly Allâh is ever All-knowing, All-wise.

31.MunirMezyed2023: He admits whom He wills into His (divine) Mercy. But those who have voluntarily and consciously abandoned the Full Knowledge of the Truth in favour of their own whims, He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the emissary winds that are sent forth one after another:

2.MunirMezyed2023: By the raging winds that blow violently:

3.MunirMezyed2023: By the winds that spread clouds in the sky:

4.MunirMezyed2023: By the those Angels who distinguish (truth from falsehood):

5.MunirMezyed2023: By those (Angels) who bring down the Revelation Knowledge

6.MunirMezyed2023: To verify or to warn:

7.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely what you are promised will come to pass!

8.MunirMezyed2023: So When the stars are obliterated,

9.MunirMezyed2023: And the sky is rent asunder,

10.MunirMezyed2023: And the mountains crumble into dust,

11.MunirMezyed2023: The Messengers (of Allâh) are gathered to their appointed time.

12.MunirMezyed2023: For what day are (these Portents) postponed?

13.MunirMezyed2023: For the Day of Decision.

14.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Day of Decision is?

15.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually dead.

16.MunirMezyed2023: Did We not destroyed the ancients (for their evil deeds)?

17.MunirMezyed2023: Then We let them be followed by later generations.

18.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We deal with the Ungodly Sinners.

19.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually dead!

20.MunirMezyed2023: Have We not created you from despicable water?

21.MunirMezyed2023: Then We placed it in a safe abode (i.e. womb)

22.MunirMezyed2023: Till an appointed time.

23.MunirMezyed2023: We perfectly decreed its process of developing. How Brilliant are We in doing so!.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually dead and blind!

25.MunirMezyed2023: Have We not made the earth an abode

26.MunirMezyed2023: For the living and the dead?

27.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not placed high mountains upon it and given you sweet fresh water to drink?

28.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are Spiritually blind!

29.MunirMezyed2023: So (they will be told): “Go forth to that doom which you were inclined to deny.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Go forth to a shadow of smoke ascending in three columns,

31.MunirMezyed2023: Which gives the impious neither shade nor shelter from the Blazing Flame.”

32.MunirMezyed2023: It throws sparks as huge as a palace

33.MunirMezyed2023: As if they were dark yellow camels.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually blind!

35.MunirMezyed2023: This is the day on which they will not speak,

36.MunirMezyed2023: Neither will it be permitted for them to give excuses.

37.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually blind!

38.MunirMezyed2023: Such is the Day of Decision. We will bring you along with the ancients together.

39.MunirMezyed2023: Now, if you have a stratagem (by which you can save yourselves from the punishment), go ahead and use it against Me!

40.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually blind!

41.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, the Pious will dwell amid shades and fountains,

42.MunirMezyed2023: And fruits such as they desire.

43.MunirMezyed2023: Eat and drink in full enjoyment for what you used to do.

44.MunirMezyed2023: This is how We reward those who pursue righteousness and perfection in Faith.

45.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually blind!

46.MunirMezyed2023: Eat and enjoy yourselves for a while! Surely you are Ungodly Sinners.

47.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that day, those who are spiritually blind!

48.MunirMezyed2023: When they are told to bow in prayer, they do not bow.

49.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide, on that, those who are spiritually blind!

50.MunirMezyed2023: In what Message other than the Qur’ān will they then come to Faith?

1.MunirMezyed2023: What are they arguing about?

2.MunirMezyed2023: About the Marvelous News: (the Revelation of the Qur’ān)

3.MunirMezyed2023: Over which they are disputing

4.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! They will come to know.

5.MunirMezyed2023: And once more, no indeed! They will come to know.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Have We not made the earth as a cradle

7.MunirMezyed2023: And the mountains as stakes?

8.MunirMezyed2023: And We have created you in pairs.

9.MunirMezyed2023: And We appointed your sleep for a rest,

10.MunirMezyed2023: And made the night as raiment

11.MunirMezyed2023: And the day as the means of livelihood.

12.MunirMezyed2023: And We built above you seven might firmaments,

13.MunirMezyed2023: And placed therein a blazing lamp,

14.MunirMezyed2023: And sent down from the rain clouds pouring water

15.MunirMezyed2023: In order to bring forth thereby grain and herbs,

16.MunirMezyed2023: And gardens of thick foliage.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely the Day of Decision is an appointed time.

18.MunirMezyed2023: It is the day when the Trumpet is blown, and you come forth in multitudes.

19.MunirMezyed2023: The sky will split open, becoming gateways,

20.MunirMezyed2023: And the mountains will be removed, becoming a mirage.

21.MunirMezyed2023: Truly, Gehenna is a place of ambush

22.MunirMezyed2023: A dwelling place for the tyrants.

23.MunirMezyed2023: They will dwell therein for ages.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any refreshment.

25.MunirMezyed2023: Except scalding water and purulence:

26.MunirMezyed2023: A fair requital for their deeds.

27.MunirMezyed2023: For Lo! They did not expect such a Judgment;

28.MunirMezyed2023: And they persistently denied the (the divine origin of) Qur’ānic Verses.

29.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! All things We have recorded in a Book.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, taste (the dire consequences of your iniquitous deeds). No increase shall We give you except in punishment.

31.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, for the Pious, there will be a blissful life:

32.MunirMezyed2023: Gardens and vineyards,

33.MunirMezyed2023: And beautiful exotic young women of equal age,

34.MunirMezyed2023: And a full cup of pure wine,

35.MunirMezyed2023: No evil vain talk will they hear therein nor lying:

36.MunirMezyed2023: A reward from your Lord - a generous gift in payment-

37.MunirMezyed2023: The Lord of the heavens and earth, and whatsoever is in between them.  He is the True Merciful (God), none can have direct dialogue with Him.

38.MunirMezyed2023: On that day, when the Spirit and the Angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except one whom the True Merciful (God) allows and who he speaks the right.

39.MunirMezyed2023: That day is the Ultimate Truth. So let whoever wills take then a safe return to his Lord!

40.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on a day when man will behold what his hands have put forth, and the one who is spiritually dead and blind will cry: "Oh, I wish I were dust!"

79.SurahEnglishNames: Those Who Drag Forth, Soul-snatchers, Those Who Pulled Out

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by those (angels) dragging out (the soul of the Impious) violently:

2.MunirMezyed2023: And those taking away (the soul of the Pious) gently:

3.MunirMezyed2023: And those gliding throughout the heavens:

4.MunirMezyed2023: And those taking the lead strenuously:

5.MunirMezyed2023: And those carrying out the Command of Allâh:

6.MunirMezyed2023: (Beware of a day) when the earth-shaking blast will come to pass,

7.MunirMezyed2023: Then followed by a second blast,

8.MunirMezyed2023: So the hearts (of the impious), on that day, will be palpitating

9.MunirMezyed2023: And their eyes downcast.

10.MunirMezyed2023: They say: “What! Are we really brought back to our former state?

11.MunirMezyed2023: How can this possibly happen after we have become decayed bones?’

12.MunirMezyed2023: Adding: “Then such a return would be a perditious return for us!”

13.MunirMezyed2023: But verily, it will be no more than a mighty blast.

14.MunirMezyed2023: Then suddenly they are awakened.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Has there come to you the anecdote of Moses

16.MunirMezyed2023: When his Lord called upon him in the Scared Valley of Towa?

17.MunirMezyed2023: "Go to Pharaoh: Surely he has become inordinate.”

18.MunirMezyed2023: And Say to him: “Would you be willing to purify yourself (or to attain positive spiritual growth),

19.MunirMezyed2023: And that I show you the path to your Lord so that you may show honor and reverence for (him)?“

20.MunirMezyed2023: Moses showed him the Mighty Sign,

21.MunirMezyed2023: But he denied and refused to yield to the truth.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Then He turned away (in aversion), striving (to convince his people not to follow Mosses).

23.MunirMezyed2023: Then he summoned his people and proclaimed:

24.MunirMezyed2023: “I am your lord, the most high."

25.MunirMezyed2023: So Allâh seized him with punishment of the Hereafter and the former life.

26.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely in (this punishment), there is a lesson for whoever shows honor and reverence for Allâh.

27.MunirMezyed2023: What! (Do you think) you are harder to create than the sky which he has constructed it?

28.MunirMezyed2023: He raised its height and perfectly proportioned it.

29.MunirMezyed2023: And He darkened its night and brought forth its daylight.

30.MunirMezyed2023: Then after that He spread out the earth,

31.MunirMezyed2023: Bringing forth its water and vegetation,

32.MunirMezyed2023: And setting firmly the mountains.

33.MunirMezyed2023: All this was done as a means of sustenance for you and your grazing livestock to enjoy.

34.MunirMezyed2023: Therefore, when the Great Catastrophe comes,

35.MunirMezyed2023: Then Man will remember, on that day, what he used to strive for,

36.MunirMezyed2023: And Hellfire will be made manifest to the one who sees.

37.MunirMezyed2023: So as for the one who transgresses,

38.MunirMezyed2023: And prefers this worldly life (over the Hereafter),

39.MunirMezyed2023: Then surely Hell shall be the abode.

40.MunirMezyed2023: But as for he who stands in awe of the absolute majesty and glory of his Lord, and guards himself against all temptation,

41.MunirMezyed2023: Then Al-Jannah will most definitely be (his) eternal home.

42.MunirMezyed2023: They ask you about the Hour: “When will it take place?”

43.MunirMezyed2023: About what! That is outside the scope of your knowledge.

44.MunirMezyed2023: Its ultimate knowledge belongs solely to your Lord.

45.MunirMezyed2023: Your duty is only to warn whoever turns to Allâh in Faith seeking salvation.

46.MunirMezyed2023: On the day when it is made manifest to them, it will be as if they had but tarried for an evening or its morn.

1.MunirMezyed2023: He frowned and walked away

2.MunirMezyed2023: When the blind man came to him, (interrupting).

3.MunirMezyed2023: How would you know? Probably he came to you seeking spiritual growth,

4.MunirMezyed2023: Or to receive Enlightenment that would save him.

5.MunirMezyed2023: But the one who considers himself free from need,

6.MunirMezyed2023: You gave him too much attention.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Yet it is not your concern if he has no intention of purifying himself

8.MunirMezyed2023: But, as for the one who came to you seeking positive spiritual growth,

9.MunirMezyed2023: And who has fear (of the dire consequences of yielding to his whims),

10.MunirMezyed2023: You ignored him.

11.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! Surely this Sūrat is an admonishment.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, let whosoever will pay close heed to it:

13.MunirMezyed2023: It is in Honorable Books,

14.MunirMezyed2023: Exalted, purified,

15.MunirMezyed2023: (Written) by the hands of scribes,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Noble and obedient.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! Man is keen to pursue destruction. How impious he is!

18.MunirMezyed2023: From what substance did He create him?

19.MunirMezyed2023: He created him from a drop of sperm and then proportioned him.

20.MunirMezyed2023: Then He enlightens his path to achieve a blissful life

21.MunirMezyed2023: Then He causes him to die and assigns a grave to him.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Then when He wills, He will certainly bring him back to life .

23.MunirMezyed2023: No Indeed! Man has failed to comply with what Allâh commanded.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, let man look at his food:

25.MunirMezyed2023: How We pour down water in abundance,

26.MunirMezyed2023: And then We cleave the earth in rifts.

27.MunirMezyed2023: Then We cause the grain to grow therein,

28.MunirMezyed2023: Grapes and fresh vegetation,

29.MunirMezyed2023: Olive and date palms,

30.MunirMezyed2023: Gardens of thick foliage,

31.MunirMezyed2023: Different types of fruits and grass,

32.MunirMezyed2023: A provision for you and your cattle.

33.MunirMezyed2023: But when the Deafening Blast comes to pass:

34.MunirMezyed2023: On the day when a man runs away from his brother,

35.MunirMezyed2023: From his mother and father,

36.MunirMezyed2023: From his wife and children.

37.MunirMezyed2023: For everyone, that day, will be preoccupied with his own problems.

38.MunirMezyed2023: Some faces, on that day, will be so bright,

39.MunirMezyed2023: Laughing and rejoicing at the glad tidings

40.MunirMezyed2023: And the other faces, on that day, will have dust upon them

41.MunirMezyed2023: Veiled in darkness.

42.MunirMezyed2023: Those are the impious, flagrantly wicked.

1.MunirMezyed2023: When the sun is darkened:

2.MunirMezyed2023: When the stars are made to fall down and lose their luster:

3.MunirMezyed2023: When the mountains are set in motion:

4.MunirMezyed2023: When the pregnant camels are forgotten and unattended:

5.MunirMezyed2023: When the wild beasts are gathered in one place:

6.MunirMezyed2023: When the seas are set on fire:

7.MunirMezyed2023: When all human beings are paired:

8.MunirMezyed2023: When the infant female who was buried alive be asked

9.MunirMezyed2023: For what crime she was slain:

10.MunirMezyed2023: When the scrolls are laid open:

11.MunirMezyed2023: When the sky is stripped away:

12.MunirMezyed2023: When the Hellfire is put in flames:

13.MunirMezyed2023: And when Al-Jannah is brought near:

14.MunirMezyed2023: Then, each human person will know what he has put forward.

15.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! I swear by the planets

16.MunirMezyed2023: As they run their course and hide.

17.MunirMezyed2023: By the night when it departs:

18.MunirMezyed2023: And by the morning when it breathes:

19.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly It is the Word of an honored Messenger,

20.MunirMezyed2023: Endued with mighty power, and an honorable place with the Lord of the Throne,

21.MunirMezyed2023: Obeyed (by the Angels) and trustworthy.

22.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! Your companion is not insane.

23.MunirMezyed2023: He truly saw him- (Archangel Gabriel)- on the clear horizon.

24.MunirMezyed2023: He is not niggardly of the Unseen.

25.MunirMezyed2023: This Qurʾān is not the word of outcast devil.

26.MunirMezyed2023: So where will you go?

27.MunirMezyed2023: This Qurʾān is not but a Book of Enlightenment for all the beings,

28.MunirMezyed2023: For whoever desires among you to walk on the right path (to salvation).

29.MunirMezyed2023: You are unable to choose or do anything unless Allâh, the Lord of all the beings, wills it to be so.

82.SurahEnglishNames: The Cleaving, The Cleaving Asunder, Bursting Apart

1.MunirMezyed2023: When the sky is cleft asunder,

2.MunirMezyed2023: And the planets are dispersed,

3.MunirMezyed2023: And the seas are made to gush forth,

4.MunirMezyed2023: And the tombs are overturned,

5.MunirMezyed2023: Every human person will come to know what he has sent forth and left behind.

6.MunirMezyed2023: O’ man, what has deceived you into not paying attention to your duty towards your Lord, the Most Generous,

7.MunirMezyed2023: Who created you, fashioned you perfectly and gave you an upright shape?

8.MunirMezyed2023: In whatever form He wills, He assembles you.

9.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! In fact, you persist in denying the Last Judgment.

10.MunirMezyed2023: You are truly observed by Angelic Guards,

11.MunirMezyed2023: Noble, recording everything.

12.MunirMezyed2023: They know whatever you do.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely those who are Pure in Heart will be in eternal bliss,

14.MunirMezyed2023: And most surely the impious will be in Hellfire,

15.MunirMezyed2023: Burning therein on the Day of Doom.

16.MunirMezyed2023: And they shall by no means be absent from it.

17.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Day of Doom is?

18.MunirMezyed2023: And once more, what will make you know exactly what the Day of Doom is?

19.MunirMezyed2023: It is the Day when no one will be of any benefit to another as the Absolute Authority on that day belongs to Allâh.

83.SurahEnglishNames: Defrauding, The Defrauders, The Cheats, Cheating

1.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide the defrauders

2.MunirMezyed2023: Who, when they take the measure (of their dues) from the people, they demand it full,

3.MunirMezyed2023: And when they have to give by measure or weight (to the people), they give less than its due.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Do they not know that they will be resurrected (for reckoning)

5.MunirMezyed2023: On a Great Day?

6.MunirMezyed2023: The day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of all the beings.

7.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! The record of deeds of the impious from among the defrauders is certainly in Sijjeen- (in Hades or the lower world).

8.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what Sijjeen is?

9.MunirMezyed2023: It is a written book.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Woe on that day betide those who are spiritually blind-

11.MunirMezyed2023: Who persist in denying the Day of Judgment.

12.MunirMezyed2023: None will venture to deny it except for every sinful transgressor.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Whenever the Qur'ānic Verses are recited to him, he says: “Myths of the ancient world."

14.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! In fact, their hearts have been tarnished by that which they were inclined to commit!

15.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! From (the Mercy of their) Lord, that day, they will surely be banned.

16.MunirMezyed2023: Then indeed, they will burn in the Hellfire.

17.MunirMezyed2023: And then be told: "This is the torment of the Fire that you were inclined to deny."

18.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! The record of deeds of the Pure in Heart is in Illiyin (a highly exalted place in the seventh heaven).

19.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what Illiyin is?

20.MunirMezyed2023: It is a written book,

21.MunirMezyed2023: Witnessed by those who are brought near (to the Lord).

22.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, those who are Pure in Heart will be in eternal bliss,

23.MunirMezyed2023: On adorned couches, gazing around.

24.MunirMezyed2023: You will perceive in their faces the glow of delight.

25.MunirMezyed2023: They will be given to drink of sealed, brilliant wine

26.MunirMezyed2023: Whose seal emanates from it the scent of musk. So let whoever is eager to taste this strive diligently.

27.MunirMezyed2023: With it will be given a mixture of Tasnîm:

28.MunirMezyed2023: A fountain from which those who nearest to Allâh will drink.

29.MunirMezyed2023: Surely the Ungodly Sinners used to laugh at the ones who live by Faith.

30.MunirMezyed2023: And when they passed by them, they winked at one another in derision.

31.MunirMezyed2023: When they returned to their families, they would return exultantly;

32.MunirMezyed2023: And when they saw them, they would say: "Indeed, theses are the ones who have gone astray.”

33.MunirMezyed2023: Yet We have not appointed them to watch over them.

34.MunirMezyed2023: But on that day, those who live by Faith will be laughing at the Ungodly Sinners.

35.MunirMezyed2023: (They are) on adorned couches, gazing around.

36.MunirMezyed2023: Surely those who are spiritually dead and blind are requited for what they used to do?

1.MunirMezyed2023: (Mention) When the sky is split asunder,

2.MunirMezyed2023: Listening attentively to its Lord since it is obliged to do so,

3.MunirMezyed2023: And when the earth is stretched out,

4.MunirMezyed2023: Casting out that which is within it until it becomes empty,

5.MunirMezyed2023: Listening attentively to its Lord since it is obliged to do so.

6.MunirMezyed2023: O’ man, indeed you are striving strenuously towards your Lord, whom you will inevitably meet along with what you used to strive.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Then, as for the one who is given his record of deeds in his right hand,

8.MunirMezyed2023: He will be judged with an easy reckoning.

9.MunirMezyed2023: And He will return to his family, rejoicing!

10.MunirMezyed2023: But, as for the one who is given his record of deeds behind his back,

11.MunirMezyed2023: He will yearn for (his own) destruction,

12.MunirMezyed2023: And will burn in the blazing Fire.

13.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, he used to live a happy life among his family.

14.MunirMezyed2023: He thought that he would not be returned to his Lord.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Yes indeed! His Lord was ever watchful of his actions!.

16.MunirMezyed2023: So I swear by the twilight glow:

17.MunirMezyed2023: By the night and all the creatures it envelops:

18.MunirMezyed2023: And by the moon when it becomes full:

19.MunirMezyed2023: You will surely embark on a stage after another.

20.MunirMezyed2023: So what is the matter with them that they are not willing to come to Faith.

21.MunirMezyed2023: And when the Qurʾān is recited to them, they do not prostrate?

22.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, those who refuse to yield to the Truth persist in denying It.

23.MunirMezyed2023: And Allâh has full knowledge of whatsoever they have stored up in their hearts.

24.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, inform them of a painful punishment.

25.MunirMezyed2023: But as for those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts, they will have a never-ending reward.

85.SurahEnglishNames: The Mansions of the Stars, The Constellations

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the sky which is  fraught with constellations:

2.MunirMezyed2023: And by the Promised Day of Judgment:

3.MunirMezyed2023: By the witness and what is witnessed!

4.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide the makers of the ditch

5.MunirMezyed2023: Of fire fiercely burning (for those who live by Faith)

6.MunirMezyed2023: When they seated themselves around it

7.MunirMezyed2023: Watching what they were doing against those who live by Faith.
