11.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts, they will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the most ultimate success and the supreme one.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Most assuredly the assault of your Lord is extremely severe

13.MunirMezyed2023: For He is certainly the One Who originates and brings again.

14.MunirMezyed2023: And He is the Oft-forgiving, the All- Loving,

15.MunirMezyed2023: The Glorious Lord of the Throne,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Doer of whatever He desires.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Has there come to you the anecdote of the soldiers,

18.MunirMezyed2023: Of Pharaoh and (the tribe of) Thamūd?

19.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, those who refuse to yield to the Truth persist in denying It.

20.MunirMezyed2023: And Allâh encompasses them on every side.

21.MunirMezyed2023: In fact, it is a Glorious Qurʾān,

22.MunirMezyed2023: Kept in Preserved Tablet!

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by firmament and the Night Visitor!

2.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Night Visitor is?

3.MunirMezyed2023: It is the piercing star.

4.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by these that every one has Angelic Guards.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Let man, then, consider of what he is created:

6.MunirMezyed2023: He is created from gushing water

7.MunirMezyed2023: Emerging from between the backbone and ribs.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Surely He is Most Capable of bringing him back to life after death,

9.MunirMezyed2023: On the Day when the secrets of the heart are laid bare.

10.MunirMezyed2023: Then man will have neither power nor any helper.

11.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the firmament that sends back the rain again,

12.MunirMezyed2023: And by the earth that bursts open:

13.MunirMezyed2023: Surely this Qurʾān is the decisive word.

14.MunirMezyed2023: And It’s not an idle tale.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Those who (indulge in hypocrisy) are but plotting an elaborate plot

16.MunirMezyed2023: But I, too, devise plans

17.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefor, grant those who are spiritually dead and blind a respite: And let them alone for a while.

87.SurahEnglishNames: The Most High, Glory to your Lord in the Highest

1.MunirMezyed2023: Glorify the Name of your Guardian Lord, the Most High!

2.MunirMezyed2023: He is the One Who creates everything and fashions it perfectly,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Who measured all things precisely and inspired suitably,

4.MunirMezyed2023: And Who brings forth the green pasture,

5.MunirMezyed2023: And then turns it into dark stubble.

6.MunirMezyed2023: We will make you recite the Qur’ān so that you shall not forget,

7.MunirMezyed2023: Except for what Allâh has willed. He has full knowledge of whatever is apparent and whatever is hidden.

8.MunirMezyed2023: And We will ease your way to the state of ease.

9.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, enlighten (with Qur’ān) since enlightenment profits (those who pursue the truth & Salvation).

10.MunirMezyed2023: Surely the one who shows reverence for Allâh will be enlightened

11.MunirMezyed2023: But it will be eschewed the most wretched,

12.MunirMezyed2023: Who will (enter &) burn in the Greatest Fire

13.MunirMezyed2023: Where he will neither die therein nor live.

14.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely the one who will ultimately achieve a blissful life is he who indulges in purity,

15.MunirMezyed2023: Who celebrates the Name of his Lord and prays.

16.MunirMezyed2023: Yet you prefer the worldly life,

17.MunirMezyed2023: Whereas the Hereafter is far better and everlasting.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed! This is written in the early Scriptures.

19.MunirMezyed2023: The Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

88.SurahEnglishNames: The Overwhelming, The Overwhelming Calamity, The Pall

1.MunirMezyed2023: Has there come to you the chronicle of the overwhelming event?

2.MunirMezyed2023: Some faces, on that day, will be downcast,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Labouring, toiling,

4.MunirMezyed2023: Scorched by blazing fire,

5.MunirMezyed2023: Drinking from a fiercely boiling spring,

6.MunirMezyed2023: No food for them except bitter thorny plant,

7.MunirMezyed2023: Neither nourishes nor satisfies the hunger cravings.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Other faces, on that day, will be radiant with delight,

9.MunirMezyed2023: Fully content with their endeavor,

10.MunirMezyed2023: In a High Garden

11.MunirMezyed2023: Where they will hear no evil vain talk.

12.MunirMezyed2023: Wherein is a running fountain,

13.MunirMezyed2023: Wherein in are uplifted couches,

14.MunirMezyed2023: Goblets put in their place,

15.MunirMezyed2023: Cushions set in rows,

16.MunirMezyed2023: And fine carpets spread out.

17.MunirMezyed2023: Do they not contemplate how the camel was created,

18.MunirMezyed2023: How the sky was lifted up,

19.MunirMezyed2023: How the mountains were firmly fixed,

20.MunirMezyed2023: And how the earth was outstretched?

21.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, admonish, for you have been sent only to admonish.

22.MunirMezyed2023: You are not appointed to be in control of them.

23.MunirMezyed2023: As for the one who takes no heed and acts impiously-

24.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh will punish him with the greatest punishment.

25.MunirMezyed2023: Verily to Us will be their return,

26.MunirMezyed2023: Then verily with Us will be their reckoning.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the dawn:

2.MunirMezyed2023: By the ten nights:

3.MunirMezyed2023: By the even and odd:

4.MunirMezyed2023: And by the night when it passes away:

5.MunirMezyed2023: Is this not a sufficient oath for highly intelligent one?

6.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with‘Ād,

7.MunirMezyed2023: With Iram, the city of the pillars,

8.MunirMezyed2023: The like of which had never been created in the land?

9.MunirMezyed2023: And with Thamūd, who hewed out the rocks in the valley?

10.MunirMezyed2023: And with Pharaoh, lord of stakes?

11.MunirMezyed2023: All of them went beyond the bounds (of moral & divine principles) in the lands,

12.MunirMezyed2023: And increased therein the corruption.

13.MunirMezyed2023: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

14.MunirMezyed2023: Most certainly your Lord is Ever Watchful.

15.MunirMezyed2023: As for man, whenever his Lord tries him, then treats him with honor and gives him great comfort and extravagant living, he would say: "My Lord has honored me".

16.MunirMezyed2023: But, whenever He tries him differently by straitening his means of livings, he says: "My Lord has undeservedly humiliated me!"

17.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! In fact, you do not honor the orphan,

18.MunirMezyed2023: Neither do you exhort one another to feed the poor.

19.MunirMezyed2023: You devour greedily the inheritance of others indiscriminately,

20.MunirMezyed2023: And you have immense love for wealth.

21.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! When the earth is made to crumble into dust,

22.MunirMezyed2023: And your Lord will come with Angels, rank on rank,

23.MunirMezyed2023: And Gehenna is brought out. On that day man will remember (his obligations towards his Lord). But how will the remembrance then profit him?.

24.MunirMezyed2023: He will regretfully say: "Alas! I wish I had sent forth righteous acts for my life!"

25.MunirMezyed2023: No one will be able to chastise as the way He is going to chastise on that day.

26.MunirMezyed2023: No one will be able to bind as the way He is going to bind.

27.MunirMezyed2023: As for you,“O' tranquil soul!

28.MunirMezyed2023: Return to your Lord, highly gratified and well-pleasing to Him!

29.MunirMezyed2023: So join My (pious) servants,

30.MunirMezyed2023: And peacefully enter My Paradise!”

1.MunirMezyed2023: I (do not need to) swear by this town (Mecca):

2.MunirMezyed2023: You are free in this town.

3.MunirMezyed2023: And I swear by the father and that which he begets:

4.MunirMezyed2023: We have certainly created man to cope with adversity.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Does he think that no one has power over him?!

6.MunirMezyed2023: He says (boastfully): "I have squandered huge fortunes."

7.MunirMezyed2023: Does he think that no one sees him?

8.MunirMezyed2023: Have We not made for him two eyes,

9.MunirMezyed2023: A tongue, and two lips,

10.MunirMezyed2023: And shown him the two ways?

11.MunirMezyed2023: Yet he tried not to break through the ‘Steep Path’.

12.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the ‘Steep Path’ is?

13.MunirMezyed2023: It is setting a slave free

14.MunirMezyed2023: Or feeding hungry people in the days of famine,

15.MunirMezyed2023: An orphan near of kin,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Or a needy man living in misery,

17.MunirMezyed2023: Then he (who used to boast) becomes of those who live by Faith and exhort one another to patience and compassion.

18.MunirMezyed2023: Those are the companions of the right side

19.MunirMezyed2023: Those who give no credence to our Signs are the Owners of the left .

20.MunirMezyed2023: Upon them will be Fire closed over.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear By the sun and its early morning brightness:

2.MunirMezyed2023: By the moon when it follows the sun:

3.MunirMezyed2023: By the day when it reveals the sun and its luminosity:

4.MunirMezyed2023: By the night when it blurs it:

5.MunirMezyed2023: By the sky and the One Who has built it:

6.MunirMezyed2023: By the earth and the One Who has spread it out.

7.MunirMezyed2023: By the Human Person and the One Who has perfectly fashioned him,

8.MunirMezyed2023: And inspired him the knowledge of good and evil:

9.MunirMezyed2023: Indeed, He who indulges in purity will ultimately achieve a blissful life / or gain eternal salvation.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And verily he who plunges himself into iniquity is doomed to perdition.

11.MunirMezyed2023: (The tribe of) Thamūd denied the Truth out of arrogance,

12.MunirMezyed2023: When the most wretched one among them rose up to kill the she-camel.

13.MunirMezyed2023: The Messenger of Allah said unto them: “Beware! It is the She-camel of Allâh. Do not Exclude her from having her share of drinking!”

14.MunirMezyed2023: But they were inclined to deny him and so they hamstrung her. So their Lord destroyed them for their iniquitous deeds and made them equal in destruction.

15.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely He does not fears its consequence.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the night when it covers:

2.MunirMezyed2023: By the day when it shines:

3.MunirMezyed2023: By the One Who created male and female:

4.MunirMezyed2023: Your endeavors are indeed in vain.

5.MunirMezyed2023: As for the one who gives charity, acts piously

6.MunirMezyed2023: And confirms the belief of the best word,

7.MunirMezyed2023: We will lead him easily towards ease.

8.MunirMezyed2023: But the one who refrains from giving alms, considers himself free of need

9.MunirMezyed2023: And denies the best word,

10.MunirMezyed2023: We will facilitate for him the path of adversity.

11.MunirMezyed2023: And his wealth will not avail him when falls (into hellfire).

12.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, it is incumbent on Us to guide to the Truth.

13.MunirMezyed2023: And surely unto Us belong the End and the Beginning.

14.MunirMezyed2023: So I have warned you of fiercely blazing fire.

15.MunirMezyed2023: It scorches none but the most wretched one,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Who denies the Truth and takes no heed.

17.MunirMezyed2023: But the most pious one can elude from it

18.MunirMezyed2023: Since he gives from his wealth to purify himself,

19.MunirMezyed2023: Without expecting anything in return,

20.MunirMezyed2023: Only seeking the countenance of his Lord, the Most High.

21.MunirMezyed2023: And he shall certainly be well-pleased.

93.SurahEnglishNames: The Morning Hours, The Early Hours, Morning Bright

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the brilliant morning light!

2.MunirMezyed2023: And the night when it grows still and intensely dark!

3.MunirMezyed2023: You Lord has not forsaken you, nor has He detested you.

4.MunirMezyed2023: And surely the Hereafter is far better for you than this one.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Your Lord will bestow upon you (the best of both worlds), and you will feel fully fulfilled and content:

6.MunirMezyed2023: Did He not find you an orphan and then gave you shelter?

7.MunirMezyed2023: And did He not find you wandering and then revealed to you the Knowledge of the Truth?

8.MunirMezyed2023: And did He not find you poor and then enriched you?

9.MunirMezyed2023: So as for the orphan, do not oppress him.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And as for the beggar, do not drive away.

11.MunirMezyed2023: But as for the blessing of your Lord, do proclaim it!

1.MunirMezyed2023: Have We not comforted your heart,

2.MunirMezyed2023: Relieved you of your burden,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Which had weighed so heavily upon your back

4.MunirMezyed2023: And elevated high your eminence for you?

5.MunirMezyed2023: Surely with every adversity comes ease!

6.MunirMezyed2023: Surely with that adversity comes more ease !

7.MunirMezyed2023: So, when you have finished your prayer, exert yourself in supplication

8.MunirMezyed2023: And turn eagerly to your Lord.

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the fig and the olive:

2.MunirMezyed2023: By the Mount Sinai:

3.MunirMezyed2023: By this secure town (Mecca):

4.MunirMezyed2023: We certainly created man in the best looking form.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Then We returned him to the lowest of the low

6.MunirMezyed2023: Except for those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts, they will have endless earnings.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Who, then, can venture to belie you about the Last judgment?

8.MunirMezyed2023: Is not Allâh the Most Upright of all judges?

1.MunirMezyed2023: Now read in the Name of your Lord who created!

2.MunirMezyed2023: He created man from a clinging substance.

3.MunirMezyed2023: Read! Your Lord is the Most Generous,

4.MunirMezyed2023: Who taught by the pen,

5.MunirMezyed2023: Taught man that he knew not.

6.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! In Fact, man is keen to infringe beyond the bounds (of moral & divine principles)

7.MunirMezyed2023: When he sees himself self-sufficient.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, to your Lord, (O' man), is the return.

9.MunirMezyed2023: Have you seen the one who forbids

10.MunirMezyed2023: A servant when he intends to pray?

11.MunirMezyed2023: What if (this servant) is on the right way,

12.MunirMezyed2023: Or advocates piety?

13.MunirMezyed2023: Have you seen (this tyrant) how he persisted in denial and turned away?

14.MunirMezyed2023: Does he not know that Allâh sees (whatever he does)?

15.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock,

16.MunirMezyed2023: Lying, sinful forelock!

17.MunirMezyed2023: Then let him call his associates.

18.MunirMezyed2023: We will call the Angels of Hell.

19.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! Do not obey him but prostrate and draw near!

1.MunirMezyed2023: Verily, We revealed the Qurʾān on the Night of Ordainment.

2.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Night of Ordainment is?

3.MunirMezyed2023: The Night of Ordainment is more worthy than a thousand months.

4.MunirMezyed2023: The Angels and the Spirit (-Archangel Gabriel) descend therein by the permission of their Lord with every command.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Peace! it is until the rising of the dawn.

98.SurahEnglishNames: The Clear Proof, Evidence, The Proof

1.MunirMezyed2023: It was not possible for those who fall away from the Faith among the People of the Book and the Polytheists to quit their perversion till the irrefutable Sign came to them:

2.MunirMezyed2023: A Messenger from Allâh reciting (to them) Purified Scriptures,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Containing valuable writings.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Those who were given the Scripture did not fall into division till the irrefutable Sign came to them.

5.MunirMezyed2023: Yet they were not commanded except to worship Allâh (in the way He wants us to worship Him), establish the regular Prayer and pay Zakāt. That is the true Religion.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! those who persistently refuse to yield to the Truth among the people of the Book and the Polytheists will abide in the Fire of Hell. They are the worst of the creatures.

7.MunirMezyed2023: And Lo! those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts are the best of the creatures.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Their reward from their Lord: Gardens of Eden underneath which rivers flow wherein they will dwell forever. Allâh is so pleased with them and they are with Him. This is for him whoever shows honor and reverence for his Lord.

1.MunirMezyed2023: When the earth is quivered violently with its (last) earthquake,

2.MunirMezyed2023: And when the earth brings forth its burdens,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Then man will say: "What is wrong with it?"

4.MunirMezyed2023: On that day it will relate its chronicles

5.MunirMezyed2023: As your Lord has inspired it.

6.MunirMezyed2023: On that day, the people will proceed forth in various groups to see their deeds.

7.MunirMezyed2023: So whoever does an atom’s weight of  righteous deed will see it,

8.MunirMezyed2023: And whoever does an atom's weight of iniquitous deed will see it.

100.SurahEnglishNames: The Courser, The Chargers, The Assulters

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by (the war horses) running with panting (breath),

2.MunirMezyed2023: And striking sparks of fire,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Rushing to assault at dawn,

4.MunirMezyed2023: Stirring up waves of dust.

5.MunirMezyed2023: They penetrate in the center collectively.

6.MunirMezyed2023: Most surely man is an impious toward his Lord

7.MunirMezyed2023: And lo! he is a witness to that.

8.MunirMezyed2023: And most surely he is intensely in love with wealth.

9.MunirMezyed2023: Does he not then know that when that which is in the graves is strewn,

10.MunirMezyed2023: And the secrets of hearts are laid bare?

11.MunirMezyed2023: Most certainly,  their Lord, on that day, will be Fully Aware of them.

101.SurahEnglishNames: The Calamity, The Stunning Blow, The Disaster, The Terrible Calamity

1.MunirMezyed2023: The Calamity!

2.MunirMezyed2023: What is the Calamity?

3.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Calamity is?

4.MunirMezyed2023: It is the day when the people will be like scattered moths,

5.MunirMezyed2023: And the mountains will be like fluffed wool.

6.MunirMezyed2023: As for the one whose deeds weigh heavy in the scales,

7.MunirMezyed2023: He will achieve a blissful life.

8.MunirMezyed2023: But the one whose deeds weigh light in the scales,

9.MunirMezyed2023: Abyss will be his eternal home.

10.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Abyss is?

11.MunirMezyed2023: It is Raging Fire!

102.SurahEnglishNames: Rivalry in World Increase, Competition, Worldly Gain

1.MunirMezyed2023: The competition to increase keeps diverting you away (from serving your Lord)

2.MunirMezyed2023: Until you visit the graves.

3.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! You will soon come to know (the dire consequences of your iniquitous deeds).

4.MunirMezyed2023: And once more, you will soon come to know (the dire consequences of your evil deeds).

5.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! If you were to know with absolute certainty (that you will be resurrected and judged, you would not have acted impiously)

6.MunirMezyed2023: You will definitely see the Hellfire.

7.MunirMezyed2023: Then you will definitely see the Hellfire with the Eye of Certainty.

8.MunirMezyed2023: Then, on that day, you will surely be questioned about the worldly pleasures you enjoyed.

103.SurahEnglishNames: The Declining Day, Eventide, The Epoch, Time

1.MunirMezyed2023: I swear by the time!

2.MunirMezyed2023: Lo! Man is keen to pursue perdition,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Except for those who live by Faith and strive to do righteous acts, exhorting each other to Truth and Patience.

104.SurahEnglishNames: The Traducer, The Gossipmonger, The Slanderer

1.MunirMezyed2023: Woe betide every backbiter, slanderer,

2.MunirMezyed2023: Who amassed enormous amounts of wealth and continuously counts it,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Thinking that his wealth will eternalize him.

4.MunirMezyed2023: No indeed! Such a person will certainly be flung into the Crusher.

5.MunirMezyed2023: And what will make you know exactly what the Crusher is?

6.MunirMezyed2023: It is the kindled Fire of of Allâh,

7.MunirMezyed2023: Which leaps (directly) to the hearts (of the impious).

8.MunirMezyed2023: Verily Hellfire will be closed and sealed upon them

9.MunirMezyed2023: In outstretched pillars.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant?

2.MunirMezyed2023: Did He not make their stratagem to be in vain?

3.MunirMezyed2023: He unleashed against them many flocks of birds

4.MunirMezyed2023: Pelting them with stones of baked clay.

5.MunirMezyed2023: And He made them like chewed up straws.

1.MunirMezyed2023: In gratitude for solidarity among Quraysh,

2.MunirMezyed2023: Their solidarity during the regularity of the caravans journey in the winter to (Yemen) and in the summer to (the Levant).

3.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, let them worship the Lord of this Sacred House,

4.MunirMezyed2023: Who fed them against hunger and made them safe from fear.

107.SurahEnglishNames: Small Kindnesses, Almsgiving, Have you Seen, The Daily Necessaries

1.MunirMezyed2023: Do you see the one who persistently denies the Day of Judgment?

2.MunirMezyed2023: That is the one who who harshly repulses the orphans.

3.MunirMezyed2023: And he does not even advocate the feeding of the needy.

4.MunirMezyed2023: Woe, then, betide, those who (make a false profession of faith) when they stand to pray.

5.MunirMezyed2023: They are totally heedless and negligent of their prayers.

6.MunirMezyed2023: They pray only to be seen and praised by people

7.MunirMezyed2023: Yet withhold good.

1.MunirMezyed2023: We have assuredly given you a river in Al-Jannah

2.MunirMezyed2023: Now, therefore, pray to your Lord and sacrifice.

3.MunirMezyed2023: Verily it is your enemy who is the severed one.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "O' you who are spiritually blind!

2.MunirMezyed2023: I do not idolize (those fabled gods) which you deify:

3.MunirMezyed2023: Nor do you serve (the One True God) Whom I serve:

4.MunirMezyed2023: Nor am I going to serve (those fabled gods) which you serve:

5.MunirMezyed2023: Nor are you going to serve (the One True God) Whom I serve:

6.MunirMezyed2023: You adhere to polytheism, whereas I Adhere to Absolute Monotheism.”

1.MunirMezyed2023: When the help of Allâh has come, and you enter (Mecca) victoriously,

2.MunirMezyed2023: And you see the people embracing the religion of Allâh in multitudes,

3.MunirMezyed2023: Then celebrate the praise of your Lord and declare His glory, and seek His forgiveness. Most certainly He is the One Who accepts repentance and forgives (the iniquitous deeds).

1.MunirMezyed2023: May both hands of Abu Lahab perish! He will indeed perish!

2.MunirMezyed2023: Neither his wealth nor whatsoever he earns will avail him.

3.MunirMezyed2023: He will burn (forever and ever) in an inferno of blazing flames!

4.MunirMezyed2023: And his wife (too), the carrier of the firewood,

5.MunirMezyed2023: Will have upon her neck a rope of palm fiber.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "He is Allâh, the Unique One of Absolute Oneness.

2.MunirMezyed2023: Allâh is the Eternal- the Ultimate Cause of all creation.

3.MunirMezyed2023: He begets not, nor is He begotten,

4.MunirMezyed2023: And there is none comparable to Him.

1.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "I seek earnestly the protection of the Lord of the daybreak,

2.MunirMezyed2023: From the evil of whatever He created,

3.MunirMezyed2023: The evil of darkness when it accumulates,

4.MunirMezyed2023: The evil of the witches who blow on the knots,

5.MunirMezyed2023: And from the evil of the envious one when he envies."

1.MunirMezyed2023: Say: "I seek earnestly the protection of the Lord of mankind,

2.MunirMezyed2023: The King of mankind,

3.MunirMezyed2023: The God of mankind,

4.MunirMezyed2023: From the evil of the invisible lurking whisperer,

5.MunirMezyed2023: Who whispers evil thoughts into the hearts of mankind,

6.MunirMezyed2023: From (the evil of the) jinn and the mankind."
